T02D1401:1b-1: s'a dha na ni d'a na shr'i tsakra samba ra n'a ma panytsi k'a / bod skad du /
T02D1401:1b-2: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi zhes bya ba /
T02D1401:1b-3: bcom ldan 'das [dd] dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1401:1b-4: mgon po sku gsum bde ba'i bdag / he ru ka dpal la btud de //
T02D1401:1b-5: bla ma brgyud rim las 'ongs pa //
T02D1401:1b-6: dad pas cung zad bri bar bya //
T02D1401:1b-7: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni //
T02D1401:1b-8: rgyud 'di rgyud gzhan gyi mtha' dang yang dag par ldan pa ste /
T02D1401:1b-9: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni sngon gyi rgyud la ltos pa yin no //
T02D1401:1b-10: 'dis ni rgyud 'di bar chad med par gsal bar byed do //
T02D1401:1b-11: gang gi phyir 'bum phrag gsum pa zhes bya bar 'di skad bdag gis zhes gsungs te /
T02D1401:1b-12: de nyid kyis na dang po gleng gzhi'i tshig rab
T02D1401:1b-13: tu sbyor ba med de sngon rab tu sbyar ba'i
T02D1401:1b-14: phyir / rgyud ces bya ba ni rab tu 'brel pa ste /
T02D1401:1b-15: rgyu'i rgyud dang thabs kyi rgyud dang 'bras bu'i rgyud do //
T02D1401:1b-16: rgyu'i rgyud ni rigs te 'dir shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i sgrub pa po nyid do //
T02D1401:1b-17: thabs kyi rgyud ces bya ba ni /
T02D1401:2a-0: sngon du dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa'i rim pas @2a * //
T02D1401:2a-5: sngags kyi rab tu sbyor ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1401:2a-6: 'bras bu'i rgyud ces bya ba ni gnyis su med pa gsal ba gcig tu gnas pa ste /
T02D1401:2a-7: ngag gi spyod yul ma yin pa dang /
T02D1401:2a-8: sems kyi yul las ring ba nyid do //
T02D1401:2a-9: rab tu 'brel ba de ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1401:2a-10: gang 'dir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don te /
T02D1401:2a-11: 'di'i phyag rgya ni yi ge aa'o //
T02D1401:2a-12: aas sdom pas na yi ge thams cad aa las byung ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1401:2a-13: dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las kyang /
T02D1401:2a-14: snying ga'i dbus na mi shigs pa //
T02D1401:2a-15: rab tu 'bar ba mar me bzhin //
T02D1401:2a-16: mi 'gyur mchog tu phra ba yi //
T02D1401:2a-17: aa ni gtso bo dam pa'o //
T02D1401:2a-19: yang brtag pa'i rgyal po gnyis pa las /
T02D1401:2a-20: lte bar phyag rgya chen po gnas //
T02D1401:2a-21: 'bar ba mar me'i rtse lta bu //
T02D1401:2a-22: dbyangs yig dang po'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1401:2a-23: blo zhes sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtag / ces gsungs so //
T02D1401:2a-24: de phyir zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:2a-25: yi ge aa las bshad pa thams cad 'byung ba'o zhes bya bar spyar ro //
T02D1401:2a-27: gsang ba zhes bya ba la 'di'i rigs rnams gsal bar ma byas pa'o //
T02D1401:2a-28: gsal bar ma byas pa de ci zhe na /
T02D1401:2b-1: de nyid gsal bar bshad pa ste /
T02D1401:2b-2: gsang ba de nyid yul dang ni //
T02D1401:2b-4: gsang ba sbas pa bden pa ste //
T02D1401:2b-5: gsang ba gsang ba'i padma ste //
T02D1401:2b-6: gsang ba sa bon gyis dga' ba //
T02D1401:2b-7: gsang ba thams cad 'dus pa ste //
T02D1401:2b-8: gsang ba bar chad med bde ba'o //
T02D1401:2b-10: mdor bsdus pa'o zhes bya ba ni yang dag par bsdu pa ste gzhung gi tshad la bya'o //
T02D1401:2b-12: sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:2b-13: de nyid ni sdom pa ste /
T02D1401:2b-14: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni thams cad 'dzin zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:2b-15: dpal he ru ka yang dag sbyor //
T02D1401:2b-17: dpal he ru ka ni bdag nyid do //
T02D1401:2b-18: rdo rje phag mo ni phyag rgya ste /
T02D1401:2b-19: de dag gi yang dag par sbyor ba ni phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1401:2b-20: 'dod par bya bas na 'dod pa ste /
T02D1401:2b-21: 'dod pa'i don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T02D1401:2b-22: 'dis sangs rgyas nyid dang rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
T02D1401:2b-23: sgrub par byed pas na 'dod pa'i don kun nas
T02D1401:2b-26: bla ma las kyang bla ma ste //
T02D1401:2b-27: zhes bya ba la bla ma'i don gsungs te /
T02D1401:2b-28: sems can mos pa sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa'i dbye
T02D1401:2b-29: ba'i dbang gis 'jig tshogs la lta ba dag par
T02D1401:2b-30: bya ba'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi
T02D1401:2b-32: de las kyang bla mar gyur pa nyid snying la
T02D1401:2b-33: gnas pa'i de kho na nyid bla na med pa
T02D1401:2b-34: ste / rdo rje can dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas
T02D1401:2b-35: rnams kyis so so rang gis rig pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1401:2b-36: nyid tshig gi lam las 'das pa nyid do //
T02D1401:2b-38: bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang ni //
T02D1401:2b-40: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T02D1401:2b-41: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1401:2b-42: zhes bya ba ni 'khor phun sum tshogs pa gsungs te /
T02D1401:2b-46: na ma mkhar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1401:2b-47: d'a zhes bya ba'i sgra la gsungs pa'o //
T02D1401:2b-48: aa ka ni gya gyur 'gro ba ste /
T02D1401:2b-49: 'dir thams cad du 'gro ba ni gya gyur 'gro ba'o //
T02D1401:2b-50: des na nam mkhar 'gro ba'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pas na mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ste /
T02D1401:3a-0: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sku'i rdzu 'phrul gyis thams @3a * //
T02D1401:3a-1: cad du cig car 'gro bas zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:3a-2: de rnams kyi dra ba ste /
T02D1401:3a-3: tshogs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T02D1401:3a-4: sngom pa ni bde ba'i mchog ste /
T02D1401:3a-5: de rnams kyi lhan cig tu skad cig re re
T02D1401:3a-6: la bde bas yang dag par tshim pa'i phyir ro
T02D1401:3a-7: // gsang ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1401:3a-8: stong pa nyid bcu drug gi rang bzhin gyi brda'i
T02D1401:3a-9: // yi ge ste / thams cad kyi sgra ni de rnams gsungs pa yin no //
T02D1401:3a-10: ra ni mtshal chen po yi khams //
T02D1401:3a-11: ha ni ri las skyes pa ste //
T02D1401:3a-12: ri skyes zhes pa mgo skyes so //
T02D1401:3a-13: sa ni dri yi snod yin te //
T02D1401:3a-14: lus la dri ni ji lta bar //
T02D1401:3a-15: sa ni rlung du gsungs pa sta //
T02D1401:3a-16: ra ni dri nyid yin par gsungs //
T02D1401:3a-17: yi ge me ni me tog ste //
T02D1401:3a-18: ra ni de bzhin lan tshva'o //
T02D1401:3a-19: me ni sha chen por 'dod de //
T02D1401:3a-20: sa ni rab tu sbyor ba nyid //
T02D1401:3a-21: rba ni mgo bor rab tu gsungs //
T02D1401:3a-22: lha mo me ni rkang yin te //
T02D1401:3a-23: ni ni dri yi mar khu'o //
T02D1401:3a-24: sa ni so dang sen mo ste //
T02D1401:3a-25: da ni rgya mtsho las skyes so //
T02D1401:3a-26: sthi ni kha ba'i snying po ste //
T02D1401:3a-27: ta ni ga pur bstan pa'o //
T02D1401:3a-29: gcig tu thams cad mkhyen pa ste //
T02D1401:3a-30: kun du 'gro ba shin tu phra //
T02D1401:3a-31: snying gi gsang chogs mnyam pa ste //
T02D1401:3a-32: sgyu ma'i rang bzhin stong pa nyid //
T02D1401:3a-33: sems kyi rang bzhin bsam me khyab //
T02D1401:3a-34: yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba bzhin //
T02D1401:3a-35: shes rab ming du de brjod do //
T02D1401:3a-36: gsang ba zhes kyang bshad pa yin //
T02D1401:3a-37: mchog ni don dam nyid kyis te //
T02D1401:3a-38: chos kyi sku zhes de brjod do //
T02D1401:3a-39: lhag mthong kun mkhyen ye shes kyi //
T02D1401:3a-40: dgyes pa zhes ni bshad pa yin //
T02D1401:3a-41: bsam gyis mi khyab brtan pa dang //
T02D1401:3a-42: g-yo ba'i dngos po thams cad kyi ;
T02D1401:3a-43: / rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa yi //
T02D1401:3a-45: thams cad bdag nyid ces bya ni //
T02D1401:3a-46: dbang po kun dang rnam shes sems //
T02D1401:3a-47: thams cad nas ni thams cad du //
T02D1401:3a-48: yid kyi rnam shes zhes bshad cing //
T02D1401:3a-49: shes rab blo gros blor yang brjod //
T02D1401:3a-50: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1401:3a-52: da lta'i bdag nyid can gyi mchog /'di yis skye dang 'jig spangs 'di //
T02D1401:3a-53: khyab nyid rdo rje'i sku nyid de //
T02D1401:3a-54: dbang du byed cing rtag shar nyid //
T02D1401:3a-55: dus kun can nyid bshad pa yin //
T02D1401:3a-57: kun nas sems can thams cad kyi //
T02D1401:3b-0: @3b khams kun la ni thams cad du //
T02D1401:3b-1: lus kun la ni mnyam khyab par //
T02D1401:3b-2: sems kyi rgyun nyid yang dag gnas //
T02D1401:3b-3: zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab //
T02D1401:3b-4: dri ma med cing bdag gis med //
T02D1401:3b-5: rang nyid stong pa mkha' mnyam pas //
T02D1401:3b-6: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02D1401:3b-7: thog ma tha ma med zhi ba //
T02D1401:3b-8: chos rnams kun gyi dbang phyug sku //
T02D1401:3b-9: kun gyi rang bzhin 'dzin pas na //
T02D1401:3b-10: bden pa gnyis la yang dag brten //
T02D1401:3b-11: ji ltar shing la rab brten pa //
T02D1401:3b-12: me yi sa bon rnam gnas dang //
T02D1401:3b-13: ji ltar til gyi 'bru rnams la //
T02D1401:3b-14: til gyi mar khu de ltar ni //
T02D1401:3b-15: khams gsum la ni rnam gnas pa //
T02D1401:3b-16: phyag rgya chen por shes par bya //
T02D1401:3b-18: mkha' 'gro kun dngos sems dpa' ni //
T02D1401:3b-20: mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi sgras ni rab tu gtum mo la sogs par 'dod la /
T02D1401:3b-21: de rnams kyi phra rab yongs su bsgrubs pas na /
T02D1401:3b-22: de rnams kyi dngos kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1401:3b-25: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i bye brag gi gnyis so //
T02D1401:3b-26: sems can rgyu ba zhes bshad la //
T02D1401:3b-27: snod kyi 'jig rten mi rgyu ba'o //
T02D1401:3b-29: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba mchog / ces bya ba la /
T02D1401:3b-30: mi phyed pas na rdo rje ste /
T02D1401:3b-31: rdo rje dang chos mthun pas gzhan rnams 'bigs pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1401:3b-32: / de bas na sems dpa' ste /
T02D1401:3b-33: dngos bo thams cad gcig tu gyur pa nyid do //
T02D1401:3b-34: rdo rje yang yin la sems dpa' yang yin pas rdo rje sems dpa' ste /
T02D1401:3b-35: dngos bde dngos po med pa bde //
T02D1401:3b-36: rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod //
T02D1401:3b-37: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni des par gzung ba ste /
T02D1401:3b-38: de nyid bcom ldan rang 'byung zhes bya ba la /
T02D1401:3b-39: brtan pa dang g-yo ba dang grol ba ma lus pa rnams rang 'byung bas na /
T02D1401:3b-41: 'di la bcom pa yod pas na bcom ldan te /
T02D1401:3b-42: bcom pa'i sgras dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams pa drug gzung ngo //
T02D1401:3b-43: yang na 'joms pas na bcom zhes gzung ste /
T02D1401:3b-44: nyon mongs pa'i bdud la sogs pa bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:3b-45: de yang nyon mongs shes rab kyis 'joms pas /
T02D1401:3b-46: de'i phyir shes rab kyis 'joms zhes gsungs so //
T02D1401:3b-47: nyon mongs pa dang bral bas na dpa' ba'o //
T02D1401:3b-48: rtsa yi 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis bsdams pas na //
T02D1401:3b-49: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom pa ste //
T02D1401:4a-1: mchog sdom pa 'khor lo'i yin par bshad //
T02D1401:4a-3: yang na bla ma las kyang zhes bya ba la
T02D1401:4a-4: sogs pa la bla ma ni khams bcu drug yin
T02D1401:4a-5: la / de las kyang bla mar gyur pa ni mkha' 'gro nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1401:4a-6: de rnams kyi tshogs ni dra ba ste /
T02D1401:4a-7: de rnams nyid rtsa ba'i 'khor lo'i tshul gyis bsdams pas na sdom pa ste /
T02D1401:4a-8: shin tu yang sbas pa'i gleng gzhi'i tshig gsal bar bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1401:4a-9: ji ltar 'byung ba gsungs pa la /
T02D1401:4a-10: gsang ba zhes pa ni 'di skad do //
T02D1401:4a-12: dgyes pa ni thos pas so //
T02D1401:4a-13: thams cad bdag nyid du ni gsum pa'i don gyis bdun pa ste /
T02D1401:4a-14: gzhan dang gzhan gyis ma yin no zhes pa'i don no //
T02D1401:4a-15: dus nam gyi tshe zhe na /
T02D1401:4a-16: rtag tu bzhugs pa'i tshe na'o //
T02D1401:4a-18: bde ba chen po'i gnas su'o //
T02D1401:4a-19: de yang gang zhig ce na /
T02D1401:4a-23: gsang pas yi khams yin te //
T02D1401:4a-24: de bzhin mchog ni chu yin la //
T02D1401:4a-25: dgyes pa me zhes rnam par bshad //
T02D1401:4a-26: thams cad bdag nyid rtag 'gro ba //
T02D1401:4a-27: rtag tu bzhugs pa nam mkha'i khams //
T02D1401:4a-29: gang yang sems can gyi khams thams cad ni mkha' 'gro ma kun gyi rang bzhin te /
T02D1401:4a-30: de nyid rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1401:4a-31: bde ba ni bde ba chen po ste /
T02D1401:4a-32: mchog ni phul du byung ba'o //
T02D1401:4a-33: ji lta bur gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad do zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1401:4a-36: de'i chags pa chen po'i rjes su dpag par bya ba'i phyir 'byung ba'o ;
T02D1401:4a-37: / de bas na sgra'i tshul la zhes pa ste /
T02D1401:4a-38: rdo rje nor bu'i nang du chud pa'i h'um gi
T02D1401:4a-39: sgra'i tshul nges par byung ba ni dus gsum dang
T02D1401:4a-40: khams gsum pa'i ma lus pa'i dpa' bo dang rnal
T02D1401:4a-41: 'byor ma'o // de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'dus par 'dod pa ste /
T02D1401:4a-42: rdo rje dang padma lhan cig tu mnyam par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:4a-43: yul dang dbang po bcu gnyis po rnams kyis nye bar longs spyod pa ni spyod pa ste /
T02D1401:4a-44: so so rang gis rig pa'i tshul gyis rang gi
T02D1401:4a-45: sems kyi spyod yul thob pa'i rnam par shes pa'i
T02D1401:4a-46: mtshan nyid ni spyod yul lo //
T02D1401:4a-47: thog ma ni gsang ba la sgrib pa lnga spangs shing /
T02D1401:4b-0: nam mkha' ltar dag pa dbus dang @4b mtha' dri
T02D1401:4b-1: ma med pa shin tu gnas pa nyid kyi ye
T02D1401:4b-2: shes la 'khrul pa tsam zhig gzhom par bya'o //
T02D1401:4b-3: gzhan du na rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:4b-4: bsrub bya bsrub bya'i sbyor ba bzhin //
T02D1401:4b-5: de bzhin zhes bya ba 'di lta ste /
T02D1401:4b-6: gtsub gtan dang gtsub shing dang skyes bu'i lag pa'i
T02D1401:4b-7: rtsol ba las du ba rab tu skye zhing me
T02D1401:4b-9: me de yang gtsub shing la yang med gtsub gtan
T02D1401:4b-10: la yang med skyes bu'i lag pa dag la yang
T02D1401:4b-11: med yongs su brtags na gcig la'ang mi gnas so
T02D1401:4b-12: // me 'di ji lta ba bzhin du /
T02D1401:4b-14: bsrub bya'i chos 'byung rab tu gsung //
T02D1401:4b-15: bsrub pa rdo rjer brjod pa'o //
T02D1401:4b-16: de yang dag par sbyor ba las /
T02D1401:4b-17: de bzhin du bdud rtsi lta bu'i ye shes 'byung ba ni /
T02D1401:4b-18: mngon par sangs rgyas pa nyid kyi byed pa po ste /
T02D1401:4b-19: shes rab lus 'byung ye shes ni //
T02D1401:4b-20: mkha' mnyam thabs dang lhan cig nyid //
T02D1401:4b-21: bde chen rnam pa gcig pu ni ;
T02D1401:4b-22: / yang dag dbang bskur las shes bya //
T02D1401:4b-23: sngags bzlas bsam gtan la sogs ldan //
T02D1401:4b-24: rgyud 'di bshad kyis nyan par gyis //
T02D1401:4b-25: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po la gsungs pa'o //
T02D1401:4b-26: rgyud kyi sgras ni 'dir rab tu brjod pa rdo rje'i nges pa'i tshig ma lus pa rnams te /
T02D1401:4b-27: de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa nas yongs
T02D1401:4b-28: su rdzogs pa'i mthar thug pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i
T02D1401:4b-29: don bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:4b-30: yid skyob par gyur pas na sngags te ye shes so //
T02D1401:4b-31: bsam gtan ni sems rtse gcig pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1401:4b-32: yang na a'a li dang k'a li'i don ni sngags kyi bzlas par bshad la /
T02D1401:4b-33: byang chub sems la rab brtson na //
T02D1401:4b-34: rnal 'byor dbang phyug rang nyid gtso //
T02D1401:4b-35: byang chub sems 'di rdo rje ste //
T02D1401:4b-36: sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1401:4b-37: dbugs 'byung bar ma mchog ngag dang //
T02D1401:4b-38: zhes bya ba la dang por bcud kyi len gyi
T02D1401:4b-39: don du lo bcu gcig pa'i bdag nyid padma bskul
T02D1401:4b-40: ba'o // gnyis pa lo bcu gnyis pa dang /
T02D1401:4b-41: dam tshig gi don du shin tu dga' bar bya'o //
T02D1401:4b-42: gsum pa lo bcu drug pa'i me tog dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1401:4b-43: dngos grub kyi don du sngags la dang por goms par bya'o //
T02D1401:5a-0: bzhi pa lo nyi shu ma'i shes rab kyi bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' la spyod @5a * //
T02D1401:5a-2: lnga pa lo nyi shu rtsa lnga ma'i bdag nyid
T02D1401:5a-3: kyis ni dbang bskur ba'i don du'o zhes bya ba'i
T02D1401:5a-4: bar du ni me long lta bu la sogs pa'i
T02D1401:5a-5: ye shes lnga rnam par dag pa'i rim pa bzhin
T02D1401:5a-6: du bstan to // dbugs 'byung zhes bya ba ni
T02D1401:5a-7: rang gtso bo'i lhas legs par sbyangs pa'i btsun mo
T02D1401:5a-8: dang lhan cig spyod pa la rjes su 'jug pa'o
T02D1401:5a-9: du bstan to // // rigs ldan ni rigs kyi bu mo'o //
T02D1401:5a-10: med na gzhan yang gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1401:5a-11: legs par 'dus pa la byang chub kyi sems gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1401:5a-12: dri zhes bya ba ni me tog sna tshogs la sogs pa dang /
T02D1401:5a-13: gos dang rgyan la sogs pa rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o ;
T02D1401:5a-14: / chus zhes bya ba ni chang rnam pa sna tshogs par shes par bya ste /
T02D1401:5a-15: rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan las skyes pa
T02D1401:5a-16: rnams la phan pa'i rjes su mthun pa'i sbyin pas
T02D1401:5a-17: mchod pa ste / mchod pa'i bdag nyid du gyur
T02D1401:5a-18: pas sangs rgyas rnams kyi bdag nyid mchog tu dga'
T02D1401:5a-19: ba'i skus phyogs bcu gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1401:5a-20: ye shes sgron mas mngon par byang chub par mdzad do //
T02D1401:5a-21: kyang gi sgras ni nges par shes par mdzad pa'i don no //
T02D1401:5a-22: rtag tu ni rgyun mi 'chad par de kho na nyid bsgom pa la gzhol ba'o //
T02D1401:5a-23: yang na dbugs dbyung ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:5a-24: g-yon dang g-yas kyi dbugs gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'i
T02D1401:5a-25: dbugs de rnams lte ba'i rtsa bar yang dag par
T02D1401:5a-26: 'du ba'i dus su phyag rgya mi 'gyur ba'i mchog
T02D1401:5a-27: go // gang du bar ma mchog dang zhes bya
T02D1401:5a-28: ba'i tshig gzhan yod pa der brjod par bya ste
T02D1401:5a-29: go // / dang po dang tha ma dag ste /
T02D1401:5a-30: gzhon nu ma dang rgan mo dag gi bar du gyur pa'i rdul ni bar ma zhes bya'o //
T02D1401:5a-31: bar ma mchog dang bsdus pa'i tshogs ni des mtshon pa'o //
T02D1401:5a-32: de nyid kyis na gsungs pa /
T02D1401:5a-33: dri yi chu dang bcas pas kyang //
T02D1401:5a-35: dri'i chu ni sihla kam ngo //
T02D1401:5a-36: de dang bcas pa ni ga pur te /
T02D1401:5a-37: de lta bur gyur pas rigs ldan rnams la mchod par bya zhes so //
T02D1401:5a-38: dus kyi khyad par gyis zhes bya ba la /
T02D1401:5a-39: dus kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1401:5a-40: de 'dod chags la sogs pas mi 'phrog par 'jug par bya ba'i phyir /
T02D1401:5a-41: sngon du nyi ma'i dus las dus drug yang dag par gsal bar bya ste /
T02D1401:5b-0: 'dod @5b lhas mnyam du 'ong ba'i dus te /
T02D1401:5b-1: dus rnams gsal bar shes par byas la /
T02D1401:5b-2: las thams cad brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1401:5b-3: tho rangs dgun smad las 'ongs pa //
T02D1401:5b-4: dpyid dang dbyar gnyis nyin cha gnyis //
T02D1401:5b-5: nyin phyed sa gar mkhas pas sbyar //
T02D1401:5b-6: srod na de bzhin ston ka ste //
T02D1401:5b-7: dgun stod mtshan mo'i cha yin no //
T02D1401:5b-9: 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin yongs su shes par byas la /
T02D1401:5b-10: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa dang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1401:5b-11: rdo rje sems dpa' dgun smad de //
T02D1401:5b-12: rnam par snang mdzad thub pa dpyid //
T02D1401:5b-13: kye ho rta mchog so ga ste //
T02D1401:5b-14: de bzhin dbyar ni he ru ka /
T02D1401:5b-15: rdo rje nyi ma ston ka la //
T02D1401:5b-16: padma gar dbang dgun stod do //
T02D1401:5b-17: so ga mar me bza' bya ste //
T02D1401:5b-18: de bzhin du ni dbyar kha chu //
T02D1401:5b-19: ston gyi dus su mar khu ste //
T02D1401:5b-20: de bzhin dgun stod me tog go //
T02D1401:5b-21: kye ho dgun smad ga pur te //
T02D1401:5b-22: de bzhin dpyid ni bzhi mnyam mo //
T02D1401:5b-23: de rnams sman ni chen po ste //
T02D1401:5b-24: dus drug dus ni shes par bya //
T02D1401:5b-25: dus tshod 'di dang mnyam med de //
T02D1401:5b-26: sbyor ba kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02D1401:5b-27: de dag rang bzhin grub pa ru //
T02D1401:5b-32: pho nya zhes bya ba ni mchod pas mnyes par 'gyur ba rnams so //
T02D1401:5b-33: mchog dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sngar bstan pa rnams te /
T02D1401:5b-34: des ni lhan cig gang skyes pa de yid ni nang du chud pa yis te /
T02D1401:5b-35: bsgom par bya ba ni rtag tu de'i rang bzhin du bya ba'o //
T02D1401:5b-36: 'dod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dngos grub bo ;
T02D1401:5b-37: / ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i sgra'i don no //
T02D1401:5b-38: rang rdzas ni ga pur ro //
T02D1401:5b-39: mchod par bya zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1401:5b-40: sbrang rtsi ni sbrang rtsi chen po'o //
T02D1401:5b-42: ga pur bcas zhes bya ba ni ga pur dang lhan cig par yod pa'i me tog ste /
T02D1401:5b-43: mi phyed pa'i rim pas so //
T02D1401:5b-45: sbyar zhes bya ba ni bshang ba la sogs pa
T02D1401:5b-46: dang bcas pas mnyam med drug po bcud kyis len
T02D1401:5b-47: no // rdo rje mtshan ma ni chos kyi 'byung gnas las byung ba'o //
T02D1401:5b-48: yang na thams cad rdo rje ni bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka yin la /
T02D1401:6a-2: 'dzin pa ni de la rang gi lag pas blang bar bya ba ste /
T02D1401:6a-3: ming med ni sa gzhir byas la /
T02D1401:6a-4: mthe bo ni ri rab tu sbyar bar bya ba'o //
T02D1401:6a-5: rgya mtsho bsrubs pa'i bdud rtsi bzhin //
T02D1401:6a-6: rtog pa gsum du shes par bya //
T02D1401:6a-9: ha zhes bya bas snyigs ma 'phrog / yi ge ho: yis dre 'joms la //
T02D1401:6a-10: gang zhig me 'bar hr'i: yig ste //
T02D1401:6a-11: pa ba ka zhes rab tu bsgrags //
T02D1401:6a-12: mkhas pas bsgrubs pa'i bdud rtsi myang //
T02D1401:6a-13: dang por bla mar dbul bya ste //
T02D1401:6a-14: de yi rjes su he ru ka / rdo rje can gyis sbyor dbul lo //
T02D1401:6a-15: phyag rgya la ni phul nas ni //
T02D1401:6a-16: bdag nyid kyis ni yang dag myang //
T02D1401:6a-17: sbyor ba kun gyi snying po yis //
T02D1401:6a-18: bdud rtsi rnam pa ldar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:6a-19: 'di lta bu yi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1401:6a-20: rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam 'gyur //
T02D1401:6a-21: yang na ga pur bcas pa ni //
T02D1401:6a-22: byang chub sems dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1401:6a-23: tshogs kyi dbus su gzhag par bya //
T02D1401:6a-25: mig la sogs pa dbang po thams cad kyi tshogs te /
T02D1401:6a-26: grangs bdun par gyur pa dbang po gnyis kyi bye brag tu tshogs te de rnams 'dus pa'o //
T02D1401:6a-27: gnyis po de gang zhe na /
T02D1401:6a-28: mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1401:6a-29: mthe bong ni rdo rje yin la /
T02D1401:6a-31: de dag gi sbyar ba ni mthe bong srin lag rtse sbyar ba'o //
T02D1401:6a-32: myang zhes bya ba ni rig par bya zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:6a-33: mchod bzhi de bzhin rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1401:6a-34: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje bzhi yis te /
T02D1401:6a-35: dang por stong pa'i byang chub po //
T02D1401:6a-36: gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu //
T02D1401:6a-37: gsum ba la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs //
T02D1401:6a-38: bzhi pa la ni yi ge dgod //
T02D1401:6a-40: bum pa'i steng gi thod pa bzhi rnams dang /
T02D1401:6a-41: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams te /
T02D1401:6a-42: 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bdag nyid mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:6a-44: dba' bo gnyis med snyoms 'jug pa'i //
T02D1401:6a-47: de la dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni nyi shu
T02D1401:6a-48: rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu spyod pa snyoms par
T02D1401:6a-49: 'jug pa'o // 'dir dad pa la sogs pa rnam
T02D1401:6a-50: rnam par dag pa'i khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa
T02D1401:6b-0: 'jug pa'o // rnams so // @6b dpa' bo'i sgras ni thams cad gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1401:6b-1: dper na rgyal po zhes bstan pas /
T02D1401:6b-2: 'khor thams cad yongs su gzung ba bzhin no //
T02D1401:6b-3: byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rim pa'i sgom pa
T02D1401:6b-4: pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes par bya ste
T02D1401:6b-5: / de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i
T02D1401:6b-6: lha mo rnam par thar pa bzhi'i bdag nyid can
T02D1401:6b-7: rnams dus bzhi pa rnams su dpa' bo dang gnyis
T02D1401:6b-8: su med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pas mchod par bya'o
T02D1401:6b-9: / // gzhan yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i rim pas sgrub pa pos ni /
T02D1401:6b-10: thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i nga rgyal gyis
T02D1401:6b-11: gnas pa'i dus kyis nges pa med par 'gyur bas
T02D1401:6b-12: ci zhig bya ba gsungs pa ji lta ba'i phyag
T02D1401:6b-13: rgya dang lhan cig snyoms par zhugs pa'i sbyor ba
T02D1401:6b-14: dang ldan pas thams cad du khyab pa'i rdo rje
T02D1401:6b-15: 'dzin pa chen po'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad du
T02D1401:6b-16: rab tu gnas pa'i kun du bzang po thams cad
T02D1401:6b-17: kyi bdag nyid sangs rgyas kyi byang chub khams gsum
T02D1401:6b-18: pa brjod pa dang bral ba bsgom par bya ste
T02D1401:6b-19: / ji ltar nyi ma phyed du song ba'i nyi
T02D1401:6b-20: ma ni dman pa dang bar ma dang mchog tu
T02D1401:6b-21: 'byung bar mi rtog pa bzhin du thams cad du
T02D1401:6b-22: snang bar byed pa de ltar rnal 'byor bas kyang
T02D1401:6b-23: kun du rab tu snang ba'i ye shes kyis mu
T02D1401:6b-25: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa shin tu
T02D1401:6b-26: mnan nas snang ba med par nam zhig tu gyur
T02D1401:6b-27: pa de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyis
T02D1401:6b-28: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams kun du de
T02D1401:6b-29: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyis khams gsum
T02D1401:6b-31: rtog pa med cing mi rtog pa ji lta ba
T02D1401:6b-32: bzhin shes par byas pa ni de nyid ting nge
T02D1401:6b-33: 'dzin zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don no //
T02D1401:6b-35: ji ltar mi rnams kyi bdag nyid kyi bde ba
T02D1401:6b-36: gong bur bsdus par byas nas zhes shes par bya'o
T02D1401:6b-37: // rdo rje phra mo 'di dang rnal 'byor gzhan
T02D1401:6b-38: la brten pa sgrin par bya bar 'dod pa de'i
T02D1401:6b-39: // tshe / bcu drug char yang mi phod do //
T02D1401:6b-40: zhes bya ba ni nye bar mtshon pa tsam ste /
T02D1401:6b-41: char yang mi bzod bgrang bar yang mi bzod dper
T02D1401:6b-42: yang mi bzod rgyur yang mi bzod do zhes pa'o
T02D1401:6b-43: // da ni gnas phun sum tshogs pa gsungs pa /
T02D1401:6b-44: ri sul zhes bya ba sogs pa ste /
T02D1401:6b-45: sgra ji bzhin pa ni go sla ba kho na ste /
T02D1401:7a-0: @7a * // brda yis ni sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya chu skyes
T02D1401:7a-1: chen po yon tan dang ldan pa khyad par gyi
T02D1401:7a-2: gsang ba'i gnas bstan pa'i phyir ri sul zhes bya
T02D1401:7a-3: ba gsungs te / don ni nags tshal 'khrigs shing dben pa'i yul te /
T02D1401:7a-4: der gnas pa zhes 'dir gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1401:7a-5: 'dir gtso bor bzung bas 'khor rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o zhes so //
T02D1401:7a-6: yang bud med kyi phyag rgya ni 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nags tshal gyis 'khrigs pa'o //
T02D1401:7a-7: de nyid thabs kyi rnam par dag pa ni byang chub kyi lam du gyur pa'o //
T02D1401:7a-8: de'i rnam par dag pa ni rab kyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:7a-9: yul ni chos 'byung du bstan te de nyid de
T02D1401:7a-10: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsngags pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1401:7a-11: rigs la sogs pa'i khyad par can gyi bu mo
T02D1401:7a-12: skye bo las byung ba'i phyir dben pa'o //
T02D1401:7a-13: yang na de kho na nyid kyi bde ba chen po'i bdag nyid ni mi g-yo ba'i ri ste /
T02D1401:7a-14: mu stegs can ngan pa las rab tu byung ba'i rlung gis mi sgul ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:7a-15: dman pa'i sems can gyis gting dpag mi nus pas na tshang tshing ngo //
T02D1401:7a-16: rgyal ba'i bdud rtsis yongs su gang pa'i khu bar gyur pas na phug go //
T02D1401:7a-17: chu bo chen po'i 'gram rnams zhes bya ba la
T02D1401:7a-18: de nyid thabs dang shes rab yang dag par sbyor
T02D1401:7a-19: bas zab pa dang rgya che ba'i shes rab kyi
T02D1401:7a-20: chu'i gnas su gyur pas na /
T02D1401:7a-22: gdod nas grub pa ni rtag tu yongs su grub pa ste /
T02D1401:7a-23: 'char ba dang nub pa spangs shing yongs su rdzogs pa rtag tu nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1401:7a-24: de yang 'dod chags kyi me 'bar bas nyan thos
T02D1401:7a-25: la sogs pa'i byang chub bsregs pas na dur khrod
T02D1401:7a-26: do // yang na sems can thams cad kyi rgyud
T02D1401:7a-27: la mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas pas na dur khrod
T02D1401:7a-28: do // ces bya'o // der ni zhes bya ba ni de lta bu'i khyad par du'o //
T02D1401:7a-29: dkyil 'khor ni snying po de len zhing 'dzin par byed pas na dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1401:7a-30: bri bar bya zhes bya ba ni yid kyis bsgom par bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:7a-31: phyi rol ni go sla ba nyid do //
T02D1401:7a-32: dkyil 'khor de nyid dam pa ste //
T02D1401:7a-33: he ru ka dpal ye shes che //
T02D1401:7a-34: phag mo'i lus las byung ba yin //
T02D1401:7b-1: dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog yin te //
T02D1401:7b-3: kha sbyor gnyis su med pa nyid //
T02D1401:7b-4: bdag gi de nyid mnyam gzhag dang //
T02D1401:7b-5: lha yi de nyid kyang de bzhin //
T02D1401:7b-6: sngags kyi de nyid phyag rgya dang //
T02D1401:7b-7: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
T02D1401:7b-8: yan lag kun bsgom las 'das pa //
T02D1401:7b-9: rtog pa'i rnam rtog spangs pas ni //
T02D1401:7b-10: gug skyed thig le dang bral ba //
T02D1401:7b-11: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
T02D1401:7b-12: chos dang chos min rnam dpyad na //
T02D1401:7b-13: rnam dag nam mkha' lta bu ni //
T02D1401:7b-14: chos kun nye bar mi dmigs pa //
T02D1401:7b-15: de ni dkyil 'khor zhes byar bshad //
T02D1401:7b-16: chags dang chags min rnam 'phro ba //
T02D1401:7b-18: shin tu chags shing chags pa'i sems //
T02D1401:7b-19: de ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no //
T02D1401:7b-20: bcu drug khams na rnam bzhugs shing //
T02D1401:7b-21: gzugs dang gzugs med dri med pa //
T02D1401:7b-22: rtog pa po dang skul byed sems //
T02D1401:7b-23: de ni dkyil 'khor zhes su brjod //
T02D1401:7b-24: dkyil 'khor lus su gsungs pa dang //
T02D1401:7b-25: bha ga'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang ni //
T02D1401:7b-26: byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor te //
T02D1401:7b-28: 'di ltar sa 'og sa stengs sa bla dang ;
T02D1401:7b-29: / rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor ro zhes brjod do //
T02D1401:7b-30: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:7b-31: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u dang po'i rnam
T02D1401:7b-33: / de la zhes bya ba ni sgra ji bzhin pa'i gnas su'o //
T02D1401:7b-34: lci ba zhes bya ba ni sa la ma lhung ba'i byug pa ste /
T02D1401:7b-35: der brtsam par bya zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T02D1401:7b-36: 'di'i rab tu byed pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi thabs kyi cho gar shes par bya'o //
T02D1401:7b-37: dur khrod du ni kun spyod bya //
T02D1401:7b-38: zhes pa ni dur khrod kyi bdag nyid las byung
T02D1401:7b-39: ba'i tshon sna lnga mngon par 'du bya ba ste
T02D1401:7b-40: / tshon sngon po ni ro bsregs pa'i sol ba'i phye mas so //
T02D1401:7b-41: tshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag gis so //
T02D1401:7b-42: tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye mas so //
T02D1401:7b-43: tshon ser po ni yung ba dang mi rus kyi phye mas lhan cig sbyar bas so //
T02D1401:8a-0: tshon ljang gu ni mi rus kyi phye ma @8a * //
T02D1401:8a-1: dang lo ma ljang gu'i phye ma dang ldan pas so //
T02D1401:8a-2: des dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D1401:8a-3: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i 'byung gnas pas na 'jigs pa'o //
T02D1401:8a-4: slob dpon mtshan nyid bzang dang ldan //
T02D1401:8a-5: zhes bya ba ni rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga la mkhas pa'o /
T02D1401:8a-6: sbyor ba shes pa ni bsam gtan la gnas pa'o //
T02D1401:8a-7: pha rol 'gro zhes bya ba gsungs pa /
T02D1401:8a-8: dang po stong pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul ma
T02D1401:8a-9: lus pa'i sdig pa bkrus pas nam mkha' ltar dri
T02D1401:8a-10: ma med cing snying rje chen po dang byams pa
T02D1401:8a-11: nas brtsams nas / brtson 'grus kyi spro ba dang
T02D1401:8a-12: dga' ba dang ldan pas bdag nyid dpal he ru
T02D1401:8a-14: thod pas spyi bor brgyan byas pas //
T02D1401:8a-15: zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i gzugs
T02D1401:8a-16: bris pa'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyi ral pa'i cod
T02D1401:8a-17: pa na la shin tu brgyan pa'o //
T02D1401:8a-18: yan lag thams cad byugs pa ni ro bsregs pa'i thal ba dang /
T02D1401:8a-19: bdud rtsi lnga bsres pas so //
T02D1401:8a-20: dum gcig ces pa ni sor mo lnga'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1401:8a-21: rus pa'i phreng ba rnam 'phyang dang //
T02D1401:8a-22: zhes bya ba ni mgo bo lnga bcu tham pa la byas pa'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1401:8a-25: kha tv'am ga zhes bya ba ni lag pa g-yon par te thod pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1401:8a-26: g-yas pa ni rdo rje gsor bar bya'o //
T02D1401:8a-27: bdag nyid ces bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:8a-28: de ltar byas nas bri bar bya'o zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1401:8a-29: ro'i skud pa zhes bya ba ni mi ro dang
T02D1401:8a-30: lhan cig dur khrod du bskyal ba'i skud pas la
T02D1401:8a-31: ma lhung ba gzung la mi 'chi bcu phyed bcas
T02D1401:8a-32: pa'i khrag chen pos bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1401:8a-33: yang na ro'i skud pa zhes bya ba ni mi ro'i rgyus pa las byas pa'i thig skud do //
T02D1401:8a-34: khru gang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni khru
T02D1401:8a-35: gang nas brtsam pa nas nyi shu'i bar du ste
T02D1401:8a-36: / de las lhag par mi bya'o //
T02D1401:8a-37: sngags pas nyis 'gyur rnam par spyad //
T02D1401:8a-38: ces bya ba ni bgo ba'i thig skud kyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1401:8a-39: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog mchod //
T02D1401:8a-40: ces bya ba ni mchod pa bya ba'o //
T02D1401:8a-41: gang gis gzhal zhing gdab pa gsungs pa /
T02D1401:8a-42: cha 'phen pa yi rim nyid kyis //
T02D1401:8a-43: blo bzang dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya //
T02D1401:8a-44: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1401:8b-0: cha gsum @8b po rnams kyis 'phen pa ni cha 'phen pa ste /
T02D1401:8b-1: de'i rim pa ni cha 'phen pa'i rim pa'o //
T02D1401:8b-2: cha 'phen pa'i rim pa des dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
T02D1401:8b-3: dkyil 'khor tshad gzhal sa la ni //
T02D1401:8b-4: shar nas nub tu gzung bya ste //
T02D1401:8b-5: nyis 'gyur gyis ni thig btab nas //
T02D1401:8b-6: de 'og bya rog rjes btsal bya //
T02D1401:8b-7: shar nas lho ru phyin bya zhing //
T02D1401:8b-8: nub nas kyang ni de bzhin te //
T02D1401:8b-9: byang gi phyogs su des gzhal nas //
T02D1401:8b-10: tshangs pa'i thig ni gdab par bya //
T02D1401:8b-11: shar phyogs la sogs bzung nas ni //
T02D1401:8b-12: thig bzhi dag ni btab byas nas //
T02D1401:8b-13: phyi nas phyogs ni re re zhing //
T02D1401:8b-14: cha brgyad brgyad du 'di btab nas //
T02D1401:8b-15: der ni cha chen tshad du bya //
T02D1401:8b-16: slar yang cha bzhir bgo byas la //
T02D1401:8b-17: re mig drug cu bzhir ldan pa'i //
T02D1401:8b-18: mtshams nas thig ni gdab par bya //
T02D1401:8b-19: so so'i mtshams nas thig btab pas //
T02D1401:8b-20: 'dus pa'i thig skud mchog yin no //
T02D1401:8b-21: phyi nas cha ni re re zhing //
T02D1401:8b-22: cha gnyis su ni gzhal bar bya //
T02D1401:8b-23: thig btab 'di yi tshad gzhal nas //
T02D1401:8b-24: dbang po la sogs gnyis gnyis bya //
T02D1401:8b-25: thig skud tshad ldan bzung nas ni //
T02D1401:8b-26: ji snyed btsal ba kha sbyar bya //
T02D1401:8b-27: de snyed bde chen 'khor lo dang //
T02D1401:8b-28: sku gsung thugs kyi tshad du bya //
T02D1401:8b-29: re mig bdun bdun ldan pa ni //
T02D1401:8b-30: thig skud bskor ba mchog yin no //
T02D1401:8b-31: 'khor lo snying po de las drug / rtsibs kyis mdzes pa de ltar bya //
T02D1401:8b-32: lte ba dang ni padma rnams //
T02D1401:8b-33: re mig bzhi dang gsum du bya //
T02D1401:8b-34: tshangs pa yi ni ngos gnyis su //
T02D1401:8b-35: rtsibs kyi nang du mdzes par bya //
T02D1401:8b-36: gsum po nyid ni thams cad du //
T02D1401:8b-37: rtag tu rdzogs pa nyid du bya //
T02D1401:8b-38: thugs ni rdo rje phreng bas bskor //
T02D1401:8b-39: de bzhin gsung ni pad phreng gis //
T02D1401:8b-40: sku yi 'khor lo phreng bas bskor //
T02D1401:8b-41: lhag ma ji ltar mdzes pas so //
T02D1401:8b-42: de la shar phyogs su dbang po'i gnas su shi ri'i shing la lha'i tshogs dkar po'o //
T02D1401:8b-43: lho phyogs su ni tsu ta'i shing la gshin rje nag po'o //
T02D1401:8b-44: nub phyogs su ni mya ngan 'tshang la gnas pa sprin gyi rgyal po dmar po'o //
T02D1401:8b-45: byang phyogs su ni byang chub kyi shing la gnod spyin gyi sde dpon ser po'o //
T02D1401:9a-0: me yi mtshams su ni ka ranydza la gnas pa drang srong @9a * //
T02D1401:9a-2: srin po'i mtshams su ni la ta dz'a ti la srin po'i tshogs sngon po'o //
T02D1401:9a-3: rlung gi mtshams su ni rlung gi bdag po srid sgrub la gnas pa ljang gu'o //
T02D1401:9a-4: dbang ldan gyi mtshams su ni n+ya gro dha la
T02D1401:9a-5: gnas pa'i yi dags kyi tshogs du ba'i mdog tu
T02D1401:9a-6: gnas pa ni dur khrod chen po rab tu 'jigs
T02D1401:9a-7: pa zhes bya'o // lte bar dgod bya dpa' po ni //
T02D1401:9a-8: zhes bya ba ni lha'i dgod pa bstan no //
T02D1401:9a-9: gzi brjid ldan zhing zhes bya ba ni drag po
T02D1401:9a-10: bas kyang shin tu drag pos 'jigs par byed pa
T02D1401:9a-11: ste / zhal dang po char sprin gyi mdog lta
T02D1401:9a-12: bu rin po che aindra n'i la chen po'i tshogs
T02D1401:9a-13: spungs pa ltar 'od zer 'bar ba la bskal ba'i
T02D1401:9a-14: me ltar shin tu 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrigs pa'i
T02D1401:9a-15: ste / spyan gsum pa / mche ba gtsigs shing
T02D1401:9a-16: rngam pa dang bcas pa 'jigs pa dag kyang 'jigs
T02D1401:9a-17: ste / spyan gsum pa / par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1401:9a-18: ha ha zhes bzhad ces bya ba la lha mo
T02D1401:9a-19: dang kun du 'khyud pas dga' ba dang bcas shing
T02D1401:9a-20: zhal padma lta bur rgyas pa cher bzhad cing rnam
T02D1401:9a-21: par 'phro ba'i nor bu'i tshigs spungs pa lta bu'i
T02D1401:9a-22: tshems kyi 'od kyis g-yo ba dang mi g-yo ba
T02D1401:9a-23: la gsal bar mdzad cing ro'i mchog gi rgyal po
T02D1401:9a-24: lhun po'i rtse mor sna tshogs padma dang /
T02D1401:9a-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la zhabs gnyis kyis bsnun cing
T02D1401:9a-26: h'um yig gis h'um zhes mdzad pa dang bcas pa'o
T02D1401:9a-27: // zhal g-yas pa gser bsregs pa lta bur shin
T02D1401:9a-28: tu ser zhing rab tu dga' ba'i spyan rgyas pas
T02D1401:9a-29: 'jig rten gsum snang bar mdzad pa'o //
T02D1401:9a-30: zhal g-yon pa rin po cha margada ltar rab tu
T02D1401:9a-31: gsal zhing 'od zer ljang gu 'khrigs pa 'phro bas
T02D1401:9a-32: rnam par bzhad pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1401:9a-33: nub phyogs kyi zhal bandu ka dang /
T02D1401:9a-34: da di ni'i me tog ltar shin tu dmar zhing
T02D1401:9a-35: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ka'i mdog lta bu'i 'od
T02D1401:9a-36: zer sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan zhing rnam par rol
T02D1401:9a-37: pas bu mo mchog rnam par chags par mdzad pa'o
T02D1401:9a-38: // de lta bu phyag bcu gnyis pa bri bar bya ste /
T02D1401:9a-41: gzhan ni sngar bshad pa bzhin te /
T02D1401:9a-42: kha tv'am ga thod par bcas pas ni gcig gis so //
T02D1401:9a-43: de yi zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1401:9a-44: de yi sku mdog mtshon cha 'chang /
T02D1401:9b-1: mi bskyod pa gtso bor gyur pa'i tshe'o //
T02D1401:9b-2: rdo rje sems dpa'i tshe mdog dmar po phyag na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1401:9b-3: de'i rjes su 'khor lo gsum gyi go rims bzhin
T02D1401:9b-4: du rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo rnams dgod
T02D1401:9b-5: par bya'o // khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa yang ji lta bu'i mtshan ma ste /
T02D1401:9b-6: mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1401:9b-7: de nas bum pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:9b-8: rgyal dang bkra shis ni shar gyi phyogs kyi sgor ro //
T02D1401:9b-9: dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul dag ni byang du'o //
T02D1401:9b-10: rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba dag ni nub phyogs su'o //
T02D1401:9b-11: grub pa dang srub pa ni lho phyogs su'o //
T02D1401:9b-12: dgu pa ni dngos grub thams cad rnam par rgyal ba ste mdun du dgod par bya'o //
T02D1401:9b-13: bdag nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ni tshon
T02D1401:9b-14: gyi las zin nas dkyil 'khor gyi sgrub ba brtsam
T02D1401:9b-15: par bya'o // mar me zhes bya ba ni me dang /
T02D1401:9b-18: / lha bshos la sogs pa dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1401:9b-19: de nas lo grangs bcu drug pa //
T02D1401:9b-20: me tog bcas dang lhan cig des //
T02D1401:9b-21: phyag rgya dang sbyor legs gnas nas //
T02D1401:9b-22: dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub par bya //
T02D1401:9b-23: bde ba las byung dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1401:9b-24: 'dod pa kun ldan mchod byas te //
T02D1401:9b-25: sngags pas lte bar bsam bya ba //
T02D1401:9b-26: rlung dang me yi dbus su ste //
T02D1401:9b-27: de dbus a'a li k'a li'o //
T02D1401:9b-28: dbus su stong pa'i ri mo ni //
T02D1401:9b-29: so sor rtog 'gyur dam pa dang //
T02D1401:9b-30: de nyid bya grub sgrub pa'o //
T02D1401:9b-31: shin tu rnam par dag bshad cing //
T02D1401:9b-33: chos rnams ro gcig byed ba yi //
T02D1401:9b-34: rang gi 'khor lo blta bar bya //
T02D1401:9b-35: ma lus 'gro ba gsum bskyed pa //
T02D1401:9b-36: rmi lam dang ni sgyu ma dang //
T02D1401:9b-37: gzugs brnyan bzhin du bsgom bya ste //
T02D1401:9b-38: brtse ldan sna tshogs pa yi gnas //
T02D1401:9b-39: dgod ces bya ba ni gnas ji lta ba bzhin
T02D1401:9b-40: du 'og nas 'byung ba ltar sku la sogs pa
T02D1401:9b-41: byin gyis brlab par bya zhing /
T02D1401:9b-42: mig la sogs pa yang byin gyis brlab pa bya ste /
T02D1401:9b-43: mig gnyis su padma dang zla ba la gnas pa'i
T02D1401:9b-44: yi ge aom yongs su gyur pa'i 'khor lo las
T02D1401:9b-45: gti mug rdo rje zhal gsum pa /
T02D1401:9b-46: phyag drug pa ral ba'i dbu rgyan can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ni thams cad kyi'o //
T02D1401:10a-0: @10a * // khyad par du zhal g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas pa
T02D1401:10a-1: ljang gu 'khor lo dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag
T02D1401:10a-2: gnyis kyis gzugs rdo rje la 'khyud cing /
T02D1401:10a-3: phyag gzhan gyis gti mug gi bdag nyid kyi tshangs pa dral ba'i pags pa rgyab na bsnams pa /
T02D1401:10a-4: gzhan gyis rde'u chung kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa ste thams cad la sbyor ro //
T02D1401:10a-5: kun kyang sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa
T02D1401:10a-6: nyid de rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbu rgyan can
T02D1401:10a-7: no // rnam gnyis su ni padma dang nyi ma
T02D1401:10a-8: la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1401:10a-9: rdo rje las zhe sdang rdo rje ste /
T02D1401:10a-10: yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal sngon po /
T02D1401:10a-11: g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas ba ljang gu rdo rje
T02D1401:10a-12: dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis sgra rdo
T02D1401:10a-14: gzhan gyis zhe sdang gi bdag nyid kyi khyab 'jug dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa /
T02D1401:10a-15: mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D1401:10a-16: / sna bug gnyis su padma dang nyi ma la
T02D1401:10a-17: gnas pa'i yi ge tr'am yongs su gyur pa'i rin
T02D1401:10a-18: po che las ser sna rdo rje ste /
T02D1401:10a-19: rtsa ba'i zhal ser po zhal g-yas pa sngo zhing
T02D1401:10a-20: g-yon dmar ba rin po che dang dril bu bsnams
T02D1401:10a-21: pa'i phyag gnyis kyis dri rdo rje la 'khyud cing
T02D1401:10a-22: / gzhan gyis ser sna'i bdag nyid kyi 'dod pa'i
T02D1401:10a-23: lha dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa rin chen 'byung
T02D1401:10a-24: ldan gyi dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1401:10a-25: lce'i rtsa bar padma dang nyi ma la gnas pa'i
T02D1401:10a-26: yi ge a'a: yongs su gyur pa la padma de
T02D1401:10a-28: rtsa ba'i zhal dmar po g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas
T02D1401:10a-29: pa dkar po padma dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag
T02D1401:10a-30: gnyis kyis ro rdo rje dang mnyam par ldan pa
T02D1401:10a-31: / gzhan gyis 'dod chags kyi bdag nyid kyi dbang
T02D1401:10a-32: phyug chen po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa snang
T02D1401:10a-33: ba mtha' yas kyi dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o
T02D1401:10a-34: / // dpal bar padma dang nyi ma la gnas
T02D1401:10a-35: pa'i yi ge bam yongs su gyur pa'i ral gri
T02D1401:10a-36: las phrag dog rdo rje ste /
T02D1401:10a-37: zhal gsum phyag drug pa ral pa'i thor tshugs can
T02D1401:10a-38: yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal ljang gu
T02D1401:10a-40: g-yas pa sngo ba ral gri dang dril bu bsnams
T02D1401:10a-41: pa phyag gnyis kyis reg rdo rje la 'khyud cing
T02D1401:10b-0: / @10b gzhan gyis phrag dog gi bdag nyid kyi
T02D1401:10b-1: tshogs kyi bdag po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa
T02D1401:10b-2: / / don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1401:10b-4: nyi ma la gnas pa'i yi ge h'um yongs su
T02D1401:10b-5: gyur pa'i rdo rje las dbang phyug rdo rje ste
T02D1401:10b-6: / yan lag thams cad dang rtsa ba'i zhal dkar
T02D1401:10b-7: po g-yon pa ser zhing g-yas pa sngo ba rdo
T02D1401:10b-8: rje dang dril bu bsnams pa'i phyag gnyis kyis chos
T02D1401:10b-9: kyi dbyings rdo rje dang shin tu snyoms par 'jug
T02D1401:10b-10: pa gzhan gyis dbang phyug thams cad kyi bdag nyid
T02D1401:10b-11: dbang po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams pa mi bskyod
T02D1401:10b-12: pa'i dbu rgyan can bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1401:10b-13: tha bas ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab
T02D1401:10b-14: ste de la 'khyud pa'i rtsa ba'i phyag gis me
T02D1401:10b-19: chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya rnams bsnams pas
T02D1401:10b-20: 'khyud pa go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs
T02D1401:10b-21: rdo rje la sogs pa blta bar bya'o //
T02D1401:10b-22: de'i rjes su go cha'i phyag rgya bsam par bya ste /
T02D1401:10b-23: thugs rdo rje'i 'og tu snying ga'i padma dang zla
T02D1401:10b-24: ba la gnas pa'i aom ha yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1401:10b-25: rdo rje las rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po dmar
T02D1401:10b-26: po'i mdog can phag mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1401:10b-27: mgo bor sku rdo rje'i steng du padma dang zla
T02D1401:10b-28: ba la gnas pa'i na ma hi yongs su gyur
T02D1401:10b-29: pa'i 'khor lo las rnam par snang mdzad ser po
T02D1401:10b-30: sngon po'i mdog can gshin rje ma la 'khyud pa'o
T02D1401:10b-31: // spyi gcug [*gtsug] tu padma dang nyi ma la
T02D1401:10b-32: gnas pa'i sv'a h'a hu yongs su gyur pa'i padma
T02D1401:10b-33: las padma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po dkar po'i
T02D1401:10b-34: mdog can rmongs byed ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1401:10b-35: phrag pa gnyis su padma dang nyi ma la gnas
T02D1401:10b-36: pa'i booshta he yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje las
T02D1401:10b-37: he ru ka sngon po ljang ba'i mdog can skyod
T02D1401:10b-39: mig gnyis su ni padma dang nyi ma la gnas
T02D1401:10b-40: pa'i h'um h'um ho yongs su gyur pa'i rin po
T02D1401:10b-41: che las rdo rje nyi ma dmar po du ba'i
T02D1401:10b-42: mdog can skrag byed ma la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1401:10b-43: yan lag thams cad du padma dang nyi ma la
T02D1401:10b-44: gnas pa'i phat ham yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs
T02D1401:10b-45: rdo rje las rta mchog yan lag thams cad rlung
T02D1401:10b-46: gi khams ltar khyab pa ljang gu du ba'i mdog
T02D1401:11a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams
T02D1401:11a-3: ni zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa spyan gsum ba
T02D1401:11a-4: zhal mche ba rnam bar gtsigs shing rgyan thams cad
T02D1401:11a-5: kyis brgyan pa ral pa'i cod pan la dar gyis
T02D1401:11a-6: bcings shing g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pa dang ldan zhing
T02D1401:11a-7: rtsa ba'i phyag gis rim pa bzhin du rdo rje
T02D1401:11a-8: dang 'khor lo dang padma dang rdo rje sngon po
T02D1401:11a-9: gdengs pa dang rin po che dang sna tshogs rdo
T02D1401:11a-10: rje rnam par bsnams pas 'khyud par blta'o //
T02D1401:11a-11: thams cad kyi g-yon pas ni dril bu ste phyag
T02D1401:11a-12: gzhan gnyis kyis rde'u chung dang kha tv'am ga dang
T02D1401:11a-14: phag mo la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni de
T02D1401:11a-15: dang 'dra bar zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi ba spyan
T02D1401:11a-16: gsum pa gcer bu skra grol ba la phyag rgya
T02D1401:11a-18: g-yon pas dril bu dang kha tv'am ga dang thod
T02D1401:11a-19: pa 'dzin pa g-yas na rde'u chung dang zangs gri
T02D1401:11a-20: / gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba la snyoms par zhugs shing /
T02D1401:11a-21: shin tu chags pas 'dus pa'i bde ba dam pa'o //
T02D1401:11a-22: rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs ba'i lha thams cad ni mi bskyod pa'i dbu rgyan can no //
T02D1401:11a-23: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag
T02D1401:11a-24: mo'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyang ye shes sems
T02D1401:11a-25: dpa' dang bcas par aom a'a: bam h'um gis byin
T02D1401:11a-26: gyis brlab par bya zhing mig la sogs pa rnams
T02D1401:11a-27: kyang ji ltar bstan pa'i gti mug rdo rje la
T02D1401:11a-28: sogs pas so // de'i lte bar ni aom bam gyis rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02D1401:11a-29: snying gar ni ham yom gis gshin rje ma'o //
T02D1401:11a-30: khar ni hrim mom gis rmongs byed ma'o //
T02D1401:11a-31: mgor ni hrem hrim gis skyod byed ma'o //
T02D1401:11a-32: spyi gtsug tu ni h'um h'um gis skrag byed ma'o //
T02D1401:11a-33: yan lag thams cad la ni phat phat ste gtum mo'o //
T02D1401:11a-34: de'i rjes la rang gi sa bon las 'od zer spros te /
T02D1401:11a-35: dza: h'um bam ho:'i sbyor bas rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa'i rim pas bsang gtor dang /
T02D1401:11a-36: zhal bsil dang mchod yon la sogs pa phul la

T02D1401:11b-28: rjes su chags par bya ste /

T02D1401:12a-0: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dga' @12a * //

T02D1401:12a-15: bu sdug de rnams gdong la zhes bya ba ni go sla ba kho na'o //

T02D1401:12a-27: dbang dang dgug pa dang phun sum tshogs pa dang /

T02D1401:12a-33: dgra rnams bzlog cing pham par bya ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gyi byang sgor ro //
T02D1401:12a-34: de yi snyim pas me tog gtor //
T02D1401:12a-35: zhes bya ba ni dad pa 'phel zhing sems tshim par bya ba'i don du dbab par bya ste /

T02D1401:12a-38: snying gar rlung dang sa dang me ste rlung gi sa bon gyis bskyod cing /

T02D1401:12b-6: ye shes can gyis rang gi yan lag lnga de

T02D1401:13b-9: g-yas ba dang ni g-yon ba'i rtsar //

T02D1401:13b-15: g-yas ba dang ni g-yon pa'i rgyu'o //
T02D1401:13b-16: nyi khri dgu brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga las kyang /

T02D1401:14a-28: stobs chen ma ste mchi ma 'bab pa'o //

T02D1401:14b-1: khanda ka p'a li na pra tsand'i ye hum h'um phat /
