T02D1401:14b-20: stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1401:14b-21: / de rnams kyi 'byung gnas pas na 'dir chos kyi 'byung gnas zhes bya'o //
T02D1401:14b-22: sna tshogs ni brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1401:14b-23: gang gi lta bar mi shigs dge / zhes bya
T02D1401:14b-24: ba la mi shigs dge ba ni rdo rje 'dzin
T02D1401:14b-25: pa ste / dge ba rnams 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:14b-27: chos kun gcig tu bsdu bar bya //
T02D1401:14b-28: zhes bya ste bri bar bya zhes bya ba dang 'grel to //
T02D1401:14b-29: 'dir zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'byung gnas la'o //
T02D1401:14b-30: der gnas zhes bya ba ni 'khor lo gsum gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1401:14b-31: rab rgyas zhes bya ba ni yi ge rnams phreng du bya ba'o //
T02D1401:14b-32: bzhi pa yi ni lnga pa dang //
T02D1401:14b-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sngags kyi tshigs bcad brgyad pa dang /
T02D1401:14b-34: ka ra ka ra zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang bcas pas rtsa ba'i sngags btu ba'o //
T02D1401:14b-35: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:14b-36: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u lnga pa'i rnam
T02D1401:14b-38: / gzhan yang yi ge nyi shu gnyis //
T02D1401:14b-39: snying po yig bdun nye snying po //
T02D1401:14b-40: zhes bya ba ni 'og nas bshad par bya'o //
T02D1401:14b-41: ya tshan brgyad pa'i sa bon zhes bya ba ni ha yig bcu gnyis so //
T02D1401:14b-42: dor byas pa zhes bya ba ni dbyangs yig ring po rnams dang /
T02D1401:14b-43: lhan cig gyur pa'i dbus na gnas pa rnams te /
T02D1401:15a-0: aom ha na ma: hi sv'a h'a @15a * //
T02D1401:15a-1: h'u boo shat he hum h'um ho phat ham rnams so //
T02D1401:15a-2: snying gar yi ge ha dang rdo rje yongs su
T02D1401:15a-3: gyur pa las rdo rje sems dpa' dkar po zhal
T02D1401:15a-4: gcig ba phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas na rdo rje
T02D1401:15a-5: dang rde'u chung / g-yon pa na dril bu dang kha tv'am ga dang thod pa 'dzin pa /
T02D1401:15a-6: rdo rje phag mo mdog dmar mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1401:15a-7: mgo bor yi ge hi dang 'khor lo yongs su
T02D1401:15a-8: gyur pa las rnam par snang mdzad ser po phyag
T02D1401:15a-9: g-yas na 'khor lo gzhan ni sngar bstan pa bzhin
T02D1401:15a-10: te / gshin rje ma mdog sngon mo la 'khyud pa'o //
T02D1401:15a-11: spyi gtsug tu yi ge h'um dang padma yongs su
T02D1401:15a-12: gyur pa las padma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar po
T02D1401:15a-13: phyag g-yas na padma bsnams pa rmongs byed ma mdog
T02D1401:15a-14: dkar mo'i mgrin pa nas 'dzin pa ste /
T02D1401:15a-15: gzhan ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1401:15a-16: phrag pa gnyis su ni yi ge he dang rdo
T02D1401:15a-17: rje yongs su gyur pa las he ru ka mdog
T02D1401:15a-18: sngon po phyag g-yas na rdo rje gdengs pa bsnams
T02D1401:15a-19: pa yang dag par skyod ma mdog ljang gu la
T02D1401:15a-20: 'khyud pa'o // lhag ma sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1401:15a-21: mig gnyis su ni yi ge ho dang rin po
T02D1401:15a-22: che yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje nyi ma
T02D1401:15a-23: gser bsregs pa'i mdog can phyag g-yas na rin po
T02D1401:15a-24: che bsnams pa / skrag byed ma nam mkha' ltar mthing skya'i mdog can la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1401:15a-25: lhag ma ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1401:15a-26: dpral bar yi ge hi dang sna tshogs rdo rje
T02D1401:15a-27: yongs su gyur ba las rta mchog phyag g-yas na
T02D1401:15a-28: sna tshogs rdo rje bsnams pa /
T02D1401:15a-29: gtum mo du ba'i mdog can la 'khyud ba ste /
T02D1401:15a-31: thams cad kyang rgyan kun gyis brgyan zhing g-yas brkyang
T02D1401:15a-32: ba'i gnas pas gnas pa ral ba'i cod pan dar
T02D1401:15a-33: gyis bcings pa'o // dpal he ru ka zhes bya
T02D1401:15a-34: ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las
T02D1401:15a-35: le'u drug pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:15a-37: // / de nas dbyangs yig ces bya ba la le'u
T02D1401:15a-38: lnga par bstan pa'i gsal byed dang dbyangs su sbyar
T02D1401:15a-39: bar bya ste / bcu gsum nyid ces bya ba ni yi ge ao'o //
T02D1401:15a-40: yi ge gnyis pa zhes ba ni /
T02D1401:15a-41: rim pa ji lta ba bzhin yi ge ma'o //
T02D1401:15a-42: dbyangs yig bcu gcig ni ae'o //
T02D1401:15a-43: yi ge drug pa ni ta ste rim pa 'di
T02D1401:15b-0: nyid kyis thams cad la sbyar @15b bar bya'o zhes
T02D1401:15b-1: so // dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka'
T02D1401:15b-2: 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bdun
T02D1401:15b-5: // / de nas rang gi bdag nyid gyi [*kyi] //
T02D1401:15b-6: zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad gdod nas skye
T02D1401:15b-7: ba med cing bdag med pa'i rang bzhin yongs su
T02D1401:15b-8: dag cing rang bzhin dang bral bas kun du bsam
T02D1401:15b-9: pa'o // dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1401:15b-10: mkha' 'gro kun gyi dra ba sdom //
T02D1401:15b-12: snying rje chen po sprul pa'i rang bzhin te //
T02D1401:15b-13: rang gi bdag nyid snying po'i sngags yig ni //
T02D1401:15b-14: yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog / skad cig ye shes kyis rdzogs pa //
T02D1401:15b-15: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1401:15b-16: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan ba ste //
T02D1401:15b-17: dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa //
T02D1401:15b-18: dar dang me tog phreng 'phyang ba //
T02D1401:15b-19: phyi yi dkyil 'khor bstan par bya //
T02D1401:15b-20: dbus su rtsibs brgyad 'khor lo la //
T02D1401:15b-21: sna tshogs padma bri bar bya //
T02D1401:15b-22: zla ba nyi ma'i dbus gnas par //
T02D1401:15b-23: h'um gi ye shes rdzogs ba las //
T02D1401:15b-24: bde chen bde ba'i 'byung gnas te //
T02D1401:15b-26: 'jigs chen ha ha zhes bzhad pas //
T02D1401:15b-28: zhal brgyad pa la spyan gsum pa //
T02D1401:15b-29: bcu drug phyag gis brgyan pa ste //
T02D1401:15b-30: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1401:15b-31: sna tshogs rdo rje mtshan pa yi //
T02D1401:15b-32: dbu la zla phyed ral pa 'dzin //
T02D1401:15b-33: phyag rgya drug gis rgyas btab sku //
T02D1401:15b-34: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag //
T02D1401:15b-35: g-yas brkyang ba yis yang dag mnan //
T02D1401:15b-36: rdo rje dril bus snyoms 'jug cing //
T02D1401:15b-37: phag mo'i nu ma 'dzin par byed //
T02D1401:15b-38: tshangs pa dral ba'i bags pa ni //
T02D1401:15b-39: rlon pa bzung ste sku la mnabs //
T02D1401:15b-40: rtse gsum mdung dang dgra sta dang //
T02D1401:15b-41: ral gri dad ni cang te'u ste //
T02D1401:15b-42: zangs kyi lcags kyu phyag g-yas na'o //
T02D1401:15b-43: g-yon pa de bzhin thod pa dang //
T02D1401:15b-44: kha dang mgo dang zhags pa dang //
T02D1401:15b-45: tho ba sdigs mdzub phyag gzhan na //
T02D1401:15b-46: sngo dkar dmar ser ljang gu dang //
T02D1401:15b-47: du ba rdul dang thal kha mdog / de lta bu yin la ldan pa //
T02D1401:15b-48: bcom ldan 'das kyi sku chen po //
T02D1401:15b-49: shes rab ye shes las rdzogs pa //
T02D1401:16a-2: / byin pa gnyis kyis yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1401:16a-3: spyan gsum skra ni grol ba ste //
T02D1401:16a-4: thod pa'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1401:16a-5: de yi zhal dang dbyibs 'dra ba //
T02D1401:16a-6: dum bus mtshan pa'i ska rags can //
T02D1401:16a-7: zhal gyi mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1401:16a-8: phyogs gos chags pa'i lta ba dang //
T02D1401:16a-9: ro smad cha ni rnam rgyas pa //
T02D1401:16a-10: tshangs pa'i pags pa yongs lha mo //
T02D1401:16a-11: skal bzangs ldan ma mda' gzhu 'dzin //
T02D1401:16a-12: yi ge aom gyi shar 'dab la //
T02D1401:16a-13: phyag mtshan mkha' 'gro ma dgod bya //
T02D1401:16a-14: ba yi byang gi 'dab ma la //
T02D1401:16a-15: rgod ma'i mkha' 'gro ma dgod bya //
T02D1401:16a-16: dzra yis nub 'dab snyan grags ma //
T02D1401:16a-17: drag shul mkha' 'gro ma dgod bya //
T02D1401:16a-18: he yis gser ldan ma zhes pa //
T02D1401:16a-19: mkha' 'gro chen mo lho phyogs dgod //
T02D1401:16a-20: ser po ljang gu sngon po dang //
T02D1401:16a-21: sngo bsangs dang ni dkar dang dmar //
T02D1401:16a-22: dkar dang ljang gu sngon po dang //
T02D1401:16a-23: de bzhin dmar dang sngo dang ljang //
T02D1401:16a-24: thams cad zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1401:16a-26: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02D1401:16a-27: phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba //
T02D1401:16a-28: g-yas brkyang ro yi steng gnas pa //
T02D1401:16a-30: drag po'i thod pa'i phreng pa can //
T02D1401:16a-31: padma dang ni nu rgyas ma ;
T02D1401:16a-32: / zur gyis lta zhing bzhad pa dang //
T02D1401:16a-33: snying rjes chags pa'i bde dam pa //
T02D1401:16a-34: mda' dang gzhu ni 'dzin mdzad cing //
T02D1401:16a-35: zhags pa lcags kyu phyag gzhan na //
T02D1401:16a-36: g-yon na kha tv'am thod pa ste //
T02D1401:16a-37: g-yas pas cang te'u brdung bar mdzad //
T02D1401:16a-38: mtshams bzhir bum par thod pa la //
T02D1401:16a-39: byang chub 'o mas yongs bkang ba'o //
T02D1401:16a-40: shar phyogs kyi rtsibs la ni yi ge hi yis rtse byed ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1401:16a-41: byang gi rtsibs la ni yi ge ru yis gdu bum zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1401:16a-42: nub tu ni yi ge ru yis dung phreng can zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1401:16a-43: lho phyogs su ni kam kis keng rus can ma zhes bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1401:16a-44: me yi mtshams su h'um gis h'um byed ma'o //
T02D1401:16a-45: srin mo'i mtshams su phat mdzad ma'o //
T02D1401:16a-46: rlung gi mtshams su ni mdzes can ma'o //
T02D1401:16a-47: dbang ldan du ni k'i li k'i li zhes bya ba'i ma mo'o //
T02D1401:16a-48: ma mo brgyad po de rnams ni //
T02D1401:16b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal @16b mdog sku //
T02D1401:16b-1: zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa la //
T02D1401:16b-2: thod pa kha tv'am dril bu 'dzin //
T02D1401:16b-3: kun kyang cang te'u zangs gri can //
T02D1401:16b-4: phyogs kyi gos can g-yas brkyang gnas //
T02D1401:16b-5: de bzhin thod pa'i phreng ba can //
T02D1401:16b-6: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1401:16b-7: ro yi steng gnas bsgom bya ste //
T02D1401:16b-8: drag cing rno la 'jigs rngams pa'o ;
T02D1401:16b-9: / dbang ldan mtshams su sngon byung ma //
T02D1401:16b-10: rlung mtshams su ni khyung mchog ma //
T02D1401:16b-11: srin mo'i mtshams su gsus 'phyang ma //
T02D1401:16b-12: me mtshams su ni ri khrod ma //
T02D1401:16b-13: ser po ljang gu sngon po dang //
T02D1401:16b-14: bzhi pa cung zad dmar po'o //
T02D1401:16b-15: zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1401:16b-16: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin /
T02D1401:16b-17: zangs gri cang te'u phyag gzhan na //
T02D1401:16b-18: bzhi pa la ni rdo rje'i mdung //
T02D1401:16b-19: phyogs kyi dre gas pa'i bde dang ldan //
T02D1401:16b-20: gsus pa 'phyang zhing gtsigs pa ste //
T02D1401:16b-21: ska rags ring zhing rgyas pa'o //
T02D1401:16b-22: spyan gsum rnam 'gyur mi bzad pa //
T02D1401:16b-23: skra grol ba la 'jigs mdzad ma //
T02D1401:16b-24: thod pa'i phreng ba'i cod pan can //
T02D1401:16b-25: rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1401:16b-27: bam gyis mi bzad drag shul can //
T02D1401:16b-30: yi ge ras rol rtsed drag can //
T02D1401:16b-33: sv'a yis rang 'od dra ba mchog / ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1401:16b-35: h'a yis rgyal ba'i do shal mchog / ces bya ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1401:16b-36: de rnams zhal gsum phyag drug ma'o //
T02D1401:16b-37: sngo dang dmar dang dkar po ste //
T02D1401:16b-38: thod pa kha tv'am ga dang ni //
T02D1401:16b-39: mgo dang sdigs mdzub phyag g-yon la //
T02D1401:16b-40: lcags kyu dang ni zangs gri dang //
T02D1401:16b-41: cang te'u g-yas pa'i phyag na'o //
T02D1401:16b-42: lho zhal dkar sngo ljang gu ste //
T02D1401:16b-43: thod pa kha tv'am zangs gri 'og / sdigs mdzub g-yon te zhags pa dang //
T02D1401:16b-44: lcags kyu cang te'u g-yas na'o //
T02D1401:16b-45: nub phyogs dmar sngo ljang gu ste //
T02D1401:16b-46: lcags sgrog cang te'u zangs gri dang //
T02D1401:16b-47: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am ga / mgo bo dang ni sdigs mdzub po //
T02D1401:16b-48: byang phyogs ljang dang dkar po dang //
T02D1401:16b-49: ser dang dmar 'dres dgyes pa'i zhal //
T02D1401:16b-50: 'bebs dang cang te'u gri sdigs mdzub //
T02D1401:16b-51: thod pa dang ni mgo bo 'dzin //
T02D1401:16b-52: kun kyang skra grol drag chen mo //
T02D1401:16b-53: spyan gsum rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal //
T02D1401:17a-2: g-yas brkyang pa yis rnam par bzhugs //
T02D1401:17a-3: thod pa'i phreng brgyan dri ma med //
T02D1401:17a-4: phyogs kyi gos can dag dang ldan //
T02D1401:17a-5: ro dang padma nyi dbus gnas //
T02D1401:17a-6: mi bskyod pa yi dbu rgyan can //
T02D1401:17a-7: zur mig blta zhing g-yo ba dang //
T02D1401:17a-8: snying rjes chags pa'i bde ba can //
T02D1401:17a-9: byang phyogs sgo la phyogs par ni //
T02D1401:17a-10: snying po ye shes gnas dgod bya //
T02D1401:17a-11: aom shri badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um
T02D1401:17a-12: phat d'a ki ni dz'a la sam pa ram sv'a
T02D1401:17a-13: h'a / sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig tu //
T02D1401:17a-14: go cha drug gis brgyan pa ste //
T02D1401:17a-15: zhal ni rnam thar brgyad dag pa //
T02D1401:17a-16: phyag ni stong pa bcu drug go //
T02D1401:17a-17: de'i rjes la snying po nye ba'i snying po yi
T02D1401:17a-18: ge bdun pa'i bdag nyid kyi sngags chen po rdo
T02D1401:17a-19: rje mchog gi dkyil 'khor brjod par bya ste /
T02D1401:17a-20: h'um gi yi ge yongs rdzogs las //
T02D1401:17a-21: rdo rje mkha' 'gro bde ba che //
T02D1401:17a-22: a'a li k'a li dngos 'byung ba //
T02D1401:17a-23: gtso bo zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1401:17a-24: spyan gsum mtshan rnams kun gyis mtshan //
T02D1401:17a-25: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ldan //
T02D1401:17a-26: phag mo dang ni gnyis med bde //
T02D1401:17a-27: stong nyid snying rje 'khrigs pa yis //
T02D1401:17a-28: rdo rje dril bu snyoms 'jug cing //
T02D1401:17a-29: phyag gzhan mi yi pags pa'i gos //
T02D1401:17a-30: thod pa kha tv'am ga dang ni //
T02D1401:17a-31: drug pa la ni mdung rtse gsum //
T02D1401:17a-32: thod pa'i phreng bas spras pa ste //
T02D1401:17a-33: rgyan rnams thams cad klubs pa yi //
T02D1401:17a-34: sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed dag / ral pa 'dzin zhing g-yas brkyang ba //
T02D1401:17a-35: sna tshogs padma nyi dbus su //
T02D1401:17a-36: chung mar bcas pa'i 'jigs byed mnan //
T02D1401:17a-38: de'i phyi rol du 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa bris la //
T02D1401:17a-39: rnal 'byor ma drug der dgod par bya'o //
T02D1401:17a-40: rtsibs drug 'khor lo'i dbus su ni //
T02D1401:17a-41: myur du dngos grub sbyin byed ma //
T02D1401:17a-42: shar phyogs la sogs g-yon skor gyis dgod par bya ste /
T02D1401:17a-43: yi ge phat kyis ni dpal rol rtsed ma ste lha mo dang po'o //
T02D1401:17a-44: yi ge h'um gis ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ste gnyis pa'o //
T02D1401:17a-45: yi ge ha yis ni gtum drag ma ste gsum pa'o //
T02D1401:17a-46: yi ge ho yis ni rdo rje snang byed ma ste bzhi pa'o //
T02D1401:17a-47: yi ge hr'i: yis ni rdo rje drag mo ste lnga pa'o //
T02D1401:17a-48: yi ge aom gyis ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ste drug pa'o //
T02D1401:17b-0: lha @17b mo de rnams zhal gcig pa //
T02D1401:17b-1: phyag bzhi drag chen spyan gsum ste //
T02D1401:17b-2: skra grol phyogs kyi gos dang ldan //
T02D1401:17b-3: thams cad yi dags nyi steng gnas //
T02D1401:17b-4: de rnams sngo dang ser ba dang //
T02D1401:17b-5: ljang gu dmar dang dud ka dkar //
T02D1401:17b-6: kun kyang cang te'u dril bsnams shing //
T02D1401:17b-7: mi yi pags pa gnyis kyis 'jon //
T02D1401:17b-8: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D1401:17b-9: g-yas brkyang pa yi gnas pas bzhugs //
T02D1401:17b-10: yi ge drug las yang dag byung //
T02D1401:17b-11: dngos grub nye bar byed pa mo //
T02D1401:17b-12: mgon po'i sku mdog ji lta bar //
T02D1401:17b-13: de bzhin du ni phag mo ste //
T02D1401:17b-14: dbyibs dang phyag rgya de dang mtshungs //
T02D1401:17b-15: mi yi pags pa spangs nas su //
T02D1401:17b-16: lha mo mda' gzhu bsnams par mdzad //
T02D1401:17b-17: yan lag kun dang rtsa zhal sngo //
T02D1401:17b-18: g-yas dang g-yon ni ser dang ljang //
T02D1401:17b-19: rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02D1401:17b-20: lha mo'i pus mo gnyis 'khyud pas //
T02D1401:17b-21: mchog tu dga' bas myos pa mo //
T02D1401:17b-22: snying gar ye shes gnas bsams shing //
T02D1401:17b-23: sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlabs pa //
T02D1401:17b-24: go cha gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1401:17b-25: spro dang bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D1401:17b-26: shin tu mnyam gzhag sngags bzlas bya //
T02D1401:17b-27: aom hri: ha ha hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:17b-28: yi ge drug po de rnams kyis //
T02D1401:17b-29: mkha' 'gro ma drug byang chub kyi //
T02D1401:17b-30: yan lag drug mchog bsgom bar bya //
T02D1401:17b-31: bdun pa dbus su gyur pa ni //
T02D1401:17b-32: yi ge h'um mdzad he ru ka / dran pa byang chub yan lag sogs //
T02D1401:17b-34: aom dhi dhi dhim h'um phat /
T02D1401:17b-35: yi ge pom dang yom dang ni //
T02D1401:17b-36: yi ge mom dang hrim nyid dang //
T02D1401:17b-37: h'um dang phat ces bshad pa ni //
T02D1401:17b-38: rnal 'byor ma ni drug tu grags //
T02D1401:17b-39: yi ge re re yang dag gnas //
T02D1401:17b-40: zhes bya ba de la 'di'i cho ga rim pa bzhin dgod par bya'o //
T02D1401:17b-41: padma 'dab ma lnga pa lte ba dang ge sar
T02D1401:17b-42: gyis 'khrigs pa bris la de'i dbus su ni yi
T02D1401:17b-43: ge bam las yang dag bar byung ba'i phag mo
T02D1401:17b-44: ni / sku mdog dmar mo 'od 'bar ma //
T02D1401:17b-45: zhal gsum phyag drug zhi ba ste //
T02D1401:17b-46: spyan gsum pa la skra grol ba //
T02D1401:17b-47: thod pa'i phreng ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D1401:17b-48: phyogs gos phyed krung bcas pa'i gar //
T02D1401:17b-49: phyag rgya drug gis btab pa'i sku //
T02D1401:17b-50: mgo bo'i me tog phreng ba can //
T02D1401:17b-51: dus mtshan 'og tu byas nas su //
T02D1401:18a-0: @18a * // rkang pas mnan par gyur pa na //
T02D1401:18a-1: sdang ba kun dang lha bdud dgra / me ltar 'bar ba dmar chen ma //
T02D1401:18a-2: g-yas dang g-yon ni sdo dang ljang //
T02D1401:18a-3: thod pa nyid dang kha tv'am ga / zhags pa lcags kyu de bzhin te //
T02D1401:18a-4: mgo dang zangs gri 'dzin pa ni //
T02D1401:18a-5: dngos grub thams cad sbyin byed pa'o //
T02D1401:18a-6: shar phyogs la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams ni g-yon skor gyis bsam par bya ste /
T02D1401:18a-9: hr'im gis yang dag skyod ma'o //
T02D1401:18a-11: phat kyis ni gtum mo ste /
T02D1401:18a-12: de rnams thams cad zhal gcig dang //
T02D1401:18a-13: phyag bzhi spyan gsum skra grol ba //
T02D1401:18a-14: phyogs kyi gos can gar gyi mchog / phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan byas shing //
T02D1401:18a-15: mgo yi phreng ba'i do shal byas //
T02D1401:18a-16: rang rig snang ba'i dbu rgyan can //
T02D1401:18a-17: snying rjes 'khrug pa'i bde dam pa //
T02D1401:18a-18: sngo dang dkar dang ser po dang //
T02D1401:18a-19: ljang dang du ba skya bo ste //
T02D1401:18a-20: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02D1401:18a-21: dril bu dang ni cang te'u gri //
T02D1401:18a-23: gnyis med sbyor ba snyoms zhugs pas //
T02D1401:18a-24: rdo rje sems sogs thams cad ni //
T02D1401:18a-25: 'khyud la sogs pa'i rim pa bzhin //
T02D1401:18a-26: phyag dang mtshon cha mdog sngo gsung //
T02D1401:18a-27: lte ba snying ga mgrin pa mgo //
T02D1401:18a-28: spyi gtsug yan lag kun mtshon cha //
T02D1401:18a-30: de rjes lha mo'i snying po yi //
T02D1401:18a-31: sngags kyi yi ge yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1401:18a-32: dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog / ji ltar go rims bzhin 'byung bshad //
T02D1401:18a-33: yi ge so so yongs rdzogs las //
T02D1401:18a-34: drag po bcu dang gsum bdag nyid //
T02D1401:18a-35: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba'o //
T02D1401:18a-36: chos kyi dbyings las 'byung ba yi //
T02D1401:18a-37: gzhal yas khang pa yid dga' ba //
T02D1401:18a-38: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1401:18a-39: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa ste //
T02D1401:18a-40: dra ba dra phyed kyis spras pa //
T02D1401:18a-41: dar dang me tog phreng 'phyang ba'i //
T02D1401:18a-42: dbus su padma dmar po ni //
T02D1401:18a-44: lte ba la ni phag mo ste //
T02D1401:18a-45: 'dab mar lha mo rnams ni dgod //
T02D1401:18a-46: mtshams kyi sgo yi phyogs rnams su //
T02D1401:18a-47: lha mo rnams kyi snying po bsgom //
T02D1401:18a-48: phyag 'tshal ba dang rgod ma'i kha //
T02D1401:18a-49: dzra gi ni dang drag can ma //
T02D1401:18a-50: shar dang byang gi phyogs dang ni //
T02D1401:18b-0: nub @18b dang lho phyogs sgo ru'o //
T02D1401:18b-1: khros ma dang ni gtso mo nyid //
T02D1401:18b-2: kha ba ma dang gser ldan ma //
T02D1401:18b-3: de rnams mtshan gyi lha mo ste //
T02D1401:18b-4: me la sogs pa dgod bar bya //
T02D1401:18b-5: h'um mdzad lha mo byin za'i ming //
T02D1401:18b-6: phat mdzad ma dang sbas mdzad ma //
T02D1401:18b-7: shar dang de bzhin byang dang ni //
T02D1401:18b-8: nub dang lho yi 'dab lha mo //
T02D1401:18b-9: yi ge ha las dbus gtso mo //
T02D1401:18b-10: sngo zhing drag shul gzi brjid che //
T02D1401:18b-11: shin tu drag po bdud kun 'joms //
T02D1401:18b-12: mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing //
T02D1401:18b-13: rdo rje phag mo zhes bya ba //
T02D1401:18b-14: dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba //
T02D1401:18b-15: sngo dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D1401:18b-16: steng dkar zhi dang zhal lnga pa //
T02D1401:18b-17: bcu gnyis phyag dang zhal gsum ste //
T02D1401:18b-18: rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs pa ste //
T02D1401:18b-19: g-yas brkyang pa la legs gnas pa //
T02D1401:18b-20: zhabs mnan mdzad nas 'jigs byed dang //
T02D1401:18b-21: ts'a mu nd'i yang 'jigs pas brgyal //
T02D1401:18b-22: thod pa'i phreng can sna tshogs pa'i //
T02D1401:18b-23: rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa'o //
T02D1401:18b-24: gsus pa 'phyang zhing skra grol ma //
T02D1401:18b-25: phyogs kyi gos can rang 'od kyi //
T02D1401:18b-26: thabs dang bde la legs gnas pa //
T02D1401:18b-27: snying rje 'khrugs shing myos pa yi //
T02D1401:18b-28: rdo rje dril bu snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1401:18b-29: thod pa kha tvr'am mdung dang ni //
T02D1401:18b-30: zangs gri cang te'u zhags pa dang //
T02D1401:18b-31: lcags kyu tshangs pa'i mgo dang ni //
T02D1401:18b-32: dgra sta dang ni sdigs mdzub bsnams //
T02D1401:18b-33: phyag gnyis mi yi pags pa yi //
T02D1401:18b-35: ser dang ljang dang dmar dang sngo //
T02D1401:18b-36: 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams kyi mdog / sngo dang ljang dang dkar dang ser //
T02D1401:18b-37: sgo bzhi por ni gnas pa'o //
T02D1401:18b-38: dmar dang dud dang sngo dang dkar //
T02D1401:18b-39: me sogs dbang ldan bar gnas pa'i //
T02D1401:18b-40: bcu gnyis de rnams zhal gcig pa //
T02D1401:18b-41: phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum ste //
T02D1401:18b-42: rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa'o //
T02D1401:18b-43: yi dags kyi ni gdan stengs su //
T02D1401:18b-44: phyed krung bcas pas shin tu gnas //
T02D1401:18b-45: phyogs kyi gos can skra grol ba //
T02D1401:18b-46: nu ma gnyis 'phyang gzugs bzang ba //
T02D1401:18b-47: yid dga' rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal //
T02D1401:18b-48: zur gyis blta zhing g-yo ba ste //
T02D1401:18b-49: g-yas pa rdo rje cang te'u 'dzin //
T02D1401:18b-50: g-yon pa kha tv'am khrag gis ni //
T02D1401:18b-51: gang ba'i snod dang dril bu'o //
T02D1401:19a-1: mo zhes bya ba rnams kyi gdan la /
T02D1401:19a-2: shar phyogs kyi ni dbang po'o //
T02D1401:19a-3: byang phyogs kyi ni gnod sbyin no //
T02D1401:19a-4: nub phyogs su ni chu bdag go //
T02D1401:19a-6: de rnams kyi snying ga'i g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas pa /
T02D1401:19a-7: spyan gsum pa skra gyen du 'greng ba thod pa'i
T02D1401:19a-8: phreng ba can sprul gyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan
T02D1401:19a-9: pa ste / rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du lcags kyu dang zhags pa dang /
T02D1401:19a-10: lcags sgrog dang 'bebs pa rnams gtso bo'i phyag tu'o //
T02D1401:19a-11: gzhan gyis rdo rje gsor ba dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang mgo bo 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1401:19a-12: zhal rnam par 'gyur zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba kun kyang mgo ba'i phreng bas brgyan pa ste /
T02D1401:19a-14: byang chub sems kyi gzi brjid bskyed cing myos pa ste /
T02D1401:19a-15: dkyil 'khor thams cad du rang gi 'od kyis thabs dang mchog tu dga' bas gang ba'o //
T02D1401:19a-16: sku dang gsung dang thugs dang snying gar ye shes kyi gnas dang /
T02D1401:19a-17: go cha gnyis rnam par brgyan la dbang bskur te mchod nas bstod la /
T02D1401:19a-18: sngags kyi bzlas pas spro bar bya ste /
T02D1401:19a-19: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02D1401:19a-20: sa steng na ni rin chen bzhi //
T02D1401:19a-21: phreng ba'i sngags ni dam pa yin //
T02D1401:19a-23: de rnams ni yid bzhin nor bu ltar 'gro ba
T02D1401:19a-24: ma lus pa'i 'dod pa'i don sgrub par byed pa'o
T02D1401:19a-25: zhes pa'o // dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i
T02D1401:19a-26: dka' 'grel sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u
T02D1401:19a-27: brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:19a-29: // / las mchog go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D1401:19a-30: zhes bya ba la bsam gtan tsam gyis grub par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1401:19a-31: kha cig ni bsam gtan dang sngags kyis grub par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D1401:19a-32: la las ni bsam gtan dang sngags dang 'khrul 'khor gyi bya bas 'grub pa ste /
T02D1401:19a-33: rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po //
T02D1401:19a-34: bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas //
T02D1401:19a-35: 'jig rten gsum bo gang cung zad //
T02D1401:19a-36: zhi sogs yid la 'dod tsam gyis //
T02D1401:19a-37: sngags mchog cho ga shes bas ni //
T02D1401:19a-38: de kun skad cig de la 'grub //
T02D1401:19a-39: klu thams cad kyi sgras ni chu bdag dang mtha' yas la sogs pa bzung ste /
T02D1401:19a-40: sngags lan cig bzlas pa dang /
T02D1401:19b-0: bsam gtan gyis bskul @19b nas bka' bkug ste /
T02D1401:19b-1: de dag shin tu 'jigs pas myos nas rdzu 'phrul
T02D1401:19b-2: chen po dang ldan pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis bar
T02D1401:19b-3: snang gi nam mkha' la song ste chu'i tshogs kyi
T02D1401:19b-9: rdzing bu'i 'gram rnams su rdo rje bya khyung gzi
T02D1401:19b-10: brjid chen bo'i gtso bo des klu rnams la bka'
T02D1401:19b-12: blo bzang pos khro bas 'khrug cing bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1401:19b-13: padma 'dab ma brgyad pa nyams dga' zhing lte ba
T02D1401:19b-14: dang ge sar gyi phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i dbus su
T02D1401:19b-15: / rdo rje chen po mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs pa dang bcas shing /
T02D1401:19b-16: phyag brgyad pa zhal bzhi pa ste /
T02D1401:19b-17: zhal dang po sprin gyi mdog lta bur sngo zhing khro ba dang bcas pa /
T02D1401:19b-18: g-yas pa du ba lta bu g-yon pa sngo bsangs
T02D1401:19b-19: steng du bya khyung gi zhal shin tu dmar ba
T02D1401:19b-20: nyi ma bcu gnyis kyi 'od ltar gzi brjid rno
T02D1401:19b-21: ba mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1401:19b-22: g-yas pas rdo rje mchog gsor ba dang /
T02D1401:19b-23: g-yon pas sdigs mdzub mdzad cing zhags pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1401:19b-24: gzhan gnyis kyis dbang po'i pags pa'i na bza' mnabs pa /
T02D1401:19b-25: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am ga / lcags kyu dang ni mdung 'dzin zhing //
T02D1401:19b-26: brgyad pa cang te'u ru ni 'dod //
T02D1401:19b-27: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis gnon pa ni //
T02D1401:19b-29: zla phyed ral pa bcings pa la //
T02D1401:19b-30: sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar brgyan //
T02D1401:19b-31: phyag rgya drug po sku la brgyan //
T02D1401:19b-32: mgo bo'i phreng bas rnam par brgyan //
T02D1401:19b-33: stag lpags kyi ni sham thabs can //
T02D1401:19b-34: mche bas ma mchu sdebs mdzad cing //
T02D1401:19b-35: khro bo'i lta bas gzigs mdzad cing //
T02D1401:19b-36: 'dab ma brgyad la klu'i rgyal po brgyad bri bar bya'o //
T02D1401:19b-37: shar phyogs su ni mtha' yas so //
T02D1401:19b-38: byang phyogs su ni nor rgyas bu'o //
T02D1401:19b-40: dbang ldan du ni padma chen po'o ;
T02D1401:19b-41: / me mtshams su ni dung skyong ngo //
T02D1401:19b-42: srin por ni stobs kyi rgyu'o //
T02D1401:19b-43: rlung mtshams su ni ma dros pa ste /
T02D1401:19b-44: dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D1401:19b-45: ser dang dud ka skya ljang ser //
T02D1401:19b-46: rin chen ldan pa'i gdengs ka mtho //
T02D1401:19b-47: thal mo mchog tu sbyar byas nas //
T02D1401:20a-2: /'jigs pa'i sa ni bka' nod cing //
T02D1401:20a-3: skrag pa dang bcas blta bar bya //
T02D1401:20a-4: yang na phyag bcu gnyis ba'i bde ba chen po bsgom bar bya ste /
T02D1401:20a-5: sngon du bstan pa bzhin te /
T02D1401:20a-6: chu bdag chung ma bcas pa mdog dkar po mnan pa'o //
T02D1401:20a-7: klu rnams dang chu bdag ni snying gar h'um n'am h'um bri'o //
T02D1401:20a-8: bris sku la dmigs shing shar du bltas pas rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1401:20a-9: 'bum gyis na mngon du gyur nas /
T02D1401:20a-10: rdo rje khro bo bya khyung zhes bya ba'i gtso
T02D1401:20a-11: bo chen po'i bka' tsam gyis char 'bebs par 'gyur
T02D1401:20a-12: ro // aom aam aa nand'a ya h'um n'a h'um sv'ah'a /
T02D1401:20a-17: aom sam sam kha p'a la /
T02D1401:20a-19: aom aom aa na ba ta ba ta /
T02D1401:20a-20: aom bam ba ru na ya n'a g'a dhi pa
T02D1401:20a-21: ta ye n'a g'a n'am barsha pa ya h'um n'am
T02D1401:20a-22: h'um sv'a h'a / zhes bya ba ni thams cad blta bar bya'o //
T02D1401:20a-23: khro bo chen po sgom pas thams cad khri phrag tu bzlas pa dbul lo //
T02D1401:20a-24: mi smra bar gyur cing shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas tshangs par spyod cing 'o ma dang /
T02D1401:20a-25: s'a lu'i 'bras chan bza' bar bya ste /
T02D1401:20a-26: klu'i gtor ma dang ldan zhing /
T02D1401:20a-27: 'o mas khrus byas la 'o ma'i sbyin sreg dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1401:20a-28: 'o ma can gyi shing las skyes pa'i yam shing
T02D1401:20a-29: mtho gang pa dang lhan cig bsreg par byas la
T02D1401:20a-30: bum pa 'o mas bkang ste 'o ma dang bcas
T02D1401:20a-31: pa'i gtor ma phyogs bcur rab tu sbyin no //
T02D1401:20a-32: de lta bu'i tshogs mchod la /
T02D1401:20a-33: dus bzhir stong phrag bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1401:20a-34: zhag bdun gyis nges par sa gzhi thams cad du char 'bab par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:20a-35: yang na 'dir chu dang yungs kar dngul gyi snod
T02D1401:20a-36: du blugs la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so
T02D1401:20a-37: // sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gdung dang bcas pa la /
T02D1401:20a-39: 'o mar bsres pas khrus byas la chu 'gram gnyis
T02D1401:20a-40: kyi sa gcig tu byas nas klu'i gzugs bya ste
T02D1401:20a-41: / mgo dgu pa nub tu bltas ba gzhag go //
T02D1401:20a-42: de nas khrus byas la mchong de /
T02D1401:20a-43: de dang khrus kyi chur bcas pa chu klung du gtor bar bya'o //
T02D1401:20a-44: de ma thag tu klu rnams mgu nas 'dzam bu'i
T02D1401:20a-45: gling thams cad du char rgyun mi 'chad pa 'bebs
T02D1401:20a-46: par 'gyur / sa gzhi 'bru dang ldan par 'gyur zhing /
T02D1401:20a-47: sems can thams cad bde ba'i reg pa'i gnas pas gnas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:20b-0: de nas @20b 'khrul 'khor gyi rab tu sbyor bar bya ste /
T02D1401:20b-2: gdengs ka'i dbang phyug 'khor lo'i ming //
T02D1401:20b-3: mchog tu rmad byung brtag pa yang //
T02D1401:20b-4: thos pa tsam gyis skrag byed na //
T02D1401:20b-5: ming dang bcas par bris pa yis //
T02D1401:20b-6: gdengs ka thams cad smos ci dgos //
T02D1401:20b-9: 'khor lo gsum po rim ji bzhin //
T02D1401:20b-11: dug dang lan tsha ske tshe dang //
T02D1401:20b-12: tsha ba gsum dang dur khrod sol //
T02D1401:20b-13: sna tshogs g-yon gyi skor phyogs su //
T02D1401:20b-14: shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
T02D1401:20b-15: shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dang ni //
T02D1401:20b-16: dbang ldan phyogs kyi mtshams nas brtsam //
T02D1401:20b-17: ka ra ka ra la sogs pa'i //
T02D1401:20b-18: sngags 'di dag nas brtsam nas ni //
T02D1401:20b-19: rab gtum mo la sogs pa dang //
T02D1401:20b-20: brtson chen mtha' mar rab tu gnas //
T02D1401:20b-21: rang ming bcas par bri bya ste //
T02D1401:20b-22: h'um h'um phat dang sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:20b-23: aom ni thams cad gsal byed cing //
T02D1401:20b-24: grub sbyin 'dod pa thams cad gsal //
T02D1401:20b-25: 'khor lo gsum gyis yongs bskor ba'i //
T02D1401:20b-26: rtsibs mchan mu khyud klu brgyad po //
T02D1401:20b-27: mtha' yas la sogs bri bar bya //
T02D1401:20b-28: 'dab brgyad lte ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D1401:20b-29: h'um n'am h'um sarba n'a ga barsha pa ya sh'i ghram phat /
T02D1401:20b-30: dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyi rol du //
T02D1401:20b-31: rin chen dang ldan gdengs gsum mtho'i //
T02D1401:20b-32: mjug ma phan tshun skye dkris bskor //
T02D1401:20b-33: de rnams kyi ni gdengs ka la //
T02D1401:20b-34: h'um n'am h'um ni rnam dgod bya //
T02D1401:20b-35: grog mo'i mkhar gyi sa dang ni //
T02D1401:20b-36: ba yi rnam lngar bcas pa yis //
T02D1401:20b-37: mtho gang tsam pa'i nor rgyas kyi //
T02D1401:20b-38: gzugs brnyan byas la de yis ni //
T02D1401:20b-39: snying gar 'khor lo gzhug bya ste //
T02D1401:20b-40: dgug sogs byas nas yang dag mchod //
T02D1401:20b-41: ka ra b'i ra'i lcug bkab ste //
T02D1401:20b-42: bar chad med par chus khrus bya //
T02D1401:20b-43: lan cig bzlas pa'i gu gul gyis //
T02D1401:20b-44: bdug pa rgyun mi 'chad par sbyar //
T02D1401:20b-45: gal te 'bab par ma gyur na //
T02D1401:20b-46: de ni nyi ma bdun pa la //
T02D1401:20b-47: dum bu dum bur byas nas su //
T02D1401:20b-48: bum pa'i nang du gzhug byas la //
T02D1401:20b-49: chu bo chen por bskur bar bya //
T02D1401:20b-50: de yis klu kun pham nas ni //
T02D1401:21a-2: lag pa g-yon pa la 'khor lo yid kyis bsams la /
T02D1401:21a-3: ming dngos su bris nas lan cig bzlas pas ni
T02D1401:21a-4: dus su sbrul gyis zin pa slong bar byed do
T02D1401:21a-5: // lag pa bstan pa tsam gyis lha thams cad
T02D1401:21a-6: dang gnod sbyin thams cad dang srin po la sogs
T02D1401:21a-7: pa'i gdon gyis gzir ba las grol bar 'gyur ro
T02D1401:21a-9: kham phor so ni ma btang bar //
T02D1401:21a-10: dug la sogs pas bris byas pa //
T02D1401:21a-11: dkyil 'khor gsum po chu dag gis //
T02D1401:21a-13: dkyil 'khor dam pa bris byas la //
T02D1401:21a-14: lte bar yi ge bam bris nas ;
T02D1401:21a-15: / h'um gnyis kyis ni gzir bar bya //
T02D1401:21a-16: 'dab brgyad la ni de bzhin du //
T02D1401:21a-17: klu brgyad snying po gzir ba bri //
T02D1401:21a-18: de nas sngags 'di gdab par bgyi //
T02D1401:21a-19: mtsho skyes kun du bskur bar bya //
T02D1401:21a-20: aom badzra kro dha ma h'a ba lam /
T02D1401:21a-21: ha na ha na pa tsa pa tsa bi dhvansa ya /
T02D1401:21a-23: sarba ni m'a ra ya h'um phat /
T02D1401:21a-24: de nas dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas yang dag par mchod de /
T02D1401:21a-25: kha sbyar la klu'i sar gzhug ste /
T02D1401:21a-26: gu gul dang sardza ra dang sgog skya bsres pa'i
T02D1401:21a-27: bdug pas bdug cing sngags bzlas na char 'bab po
T02D1401:21a-28: // zlog par byed do zhes bya ba ni bka' yi 'khor lo rab sbyor bas so //
T02D1401:21a-29: yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa'i spyi bor phul ba'i
T02D1401:21a-30: me tog blangs la rtsa ba'i sngags lan bdun btab
T02D1401:21a-31: ste srin lag la bdugs na 'dis nam mkha' la
T02D1401:21a-33: rgya mtsho skems par byed do zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:21a-34: ji ltar gsungs pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D1401:21a-35: sgom pa rgya mtshor bung ba'i sngags pas shin tu
T02D1401:21a-36: khros pa'i gzi brjid chen pos skams par 'dir gdon
T02D1401:21a-37: mi za'o // kha dang kha la yongs su bzlas nas bsnun na chu bo rgyun las bzlog go //
T02D1401:21a-38: thog zlog par byed do zhes bya ba ni sdigs mdzub tsam gyis so //
T02D1401:21a-39: bzlas brjod 'bum byas pas sa g-yo bar byed ces bya ba ni /
T02D1401:21a-40: g-yas brkyang sbyor bas gar mdzad bzhin pa'i dga' ba
T02D1401:21a-41: dang bcas spro ba dang bcas pas mkha' 'gro ma'i
T02D1401:21a-42: 'khor lo rab tu mgu bar byed do //
T02D1401:21a-43: shing la 'dzegs te zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1401:21a-44: ni gang gi tshe sgrub pa po grub par 'gyur
T02D1401:21b-0: ba de'i tshe thams cad @21b byed do zhes bya
T02D1401:21b-1: ba'o // gzugs brgya stong du ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1401:21b-2: phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la gnas pas 'jig
T02D1401:21b-3: rten 'dir gang grub pa'i sangs rgyas de la lta
T02D1401:21b-4: ci smos so // snying rje chen po'i 'jug pa'i
T02D1401:21b-5: smon lam grub pa rnams ni dus rtag tu sems
T02D1401:21b-6: can ji ltar 'dul ba'i dbang gis de dang de'i
T02D1401:21b-8: gzhan yang brtson 'grus dman gyur pa //
T02D1401:21b-9: gang tshe sgrub po dngos grub 'dod //
T02D1401:21b-10: de tshe sngags dang rgyud kyis 'grub //
T02D1401:21b-11: sngags ni yid skyob ces grags pa //
T02D1401:21b-12: rgyud sman bzang po thabs chen thob //
T02D1401:21b-13: su la dngos grub grub mi 'gyur //
T02D1401:21b-14: ma lus gzugs su sgyur bar byed //
T02D1401:21b-15: rang bzhin bsod nams dman pas kyang //
T02D1401:21b-16: tshogs pa rnams ni rnyed 'gyur na //
T02D1401:21b-17: rnam pa sna tshogs la sogs pa'i //
T02D1401:21b-18: sems can rnams ni chags bya'i phyir //
T02D1401:21b-19: bya ba rnams ni skyed par byed //
T02D1401:21b-20: dang po lha'i bdag nyid du gyur par byas la /
T02D1401:21b-21: phyi nas sa bon gyi dngos po grub ste /
T02D1401:21b-22: ji lta bu'i sa bon la sogs pa yin zhe na shing gi tshogs kyis te /
T02D1401:21b-23: ae randa dang smyo byed la sogs pa bshad pa dang de bzhin du sa bon rnams so //
T02D1401:21b-24: de dag la sogs pa yongs su smin pa rnams cho ga bzhin du sgrub par byed de /
T02D1401:21b-25: dkar po ma yin pa'i 'byung po'i nyi ma la
T02D1401:21b-26: rigs ngan gyi me tog gis bsgo zhing bdud rtsi
T02D1401:21b-27: lngas kyang mnyes la nyin mtshan de la skams te
T02D1401:21b-28: / khyi nag po'i thod par dur khrod kyi sas bkang la /
T02D1401:21b-29: mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi la ji ltar
T02D1401:21b-30: bstan pa'i ma mo'i gnas su bskyed nas sgrub pa
T02D1401:21b-32: sngags pas he ru ka dang bla ma mgon po
T02D1401:21b-33: khyad par du mchod pa byas la dur khrod du
T02D1401:21b-35: mngon par bsngags la gang gi gzugs su bsams nas
T02D1401:21b-36: mgrin par bcings nas de'i gzugs su bsgyur te bkrol
T02D1401:21b-37: na slar yang rang gi gzugs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:21b-38: yang gser shing gi sa bon blangs la zla ba
T02D1401:21b-39: mar ngo la sprul nag po'i zhag gis byugs la
T02D1401:21b-41: bcu bzhi la khva nag po'i thod par ji skad
T02D1401:21b-42: bstan pa'i gnas su mnyam par gzhag pas bskyed de
T02D1401:21b-43: / smin ma'i sa bon blangs nas cho ga bzhin bya /
T02D1401:22a-1: gang yin pa'i gzugs su bsams nas mgrin pa bcings na de'i mod la sbed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:22a-2: dang por re zhig cho ga shes pas bram ze
T02D1401:22a-3: mchog gi rigs las byung ba'i gsal shing ngam mtshon
T02D1401:22a-4: gyis brgyab pa yang rung ste de'i thod pa blangs
T02D1401:22a-5: la / grog mkhar gyi sas bkang ste dgongs mo'i
T02D1401:22a-6: dus su dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdo dang
T02D1401:22a-7: sum mdo dang chu bo'i 'gram rnams su sa bon
T02D1401:22a-8: bcug la chus gtor ba dang gtor ma sbyin pa
T02D1401:22a-9: dang nyi ma re re bsrung bar bya ste /
T02D1401:22a-10: dpal he ru ka'i gzugs phyag rgya dang rgyan kun gyis brgyan pa /
T02D1401:22a-11: kha tv'am ga dang thod pa lag pa g-yon pas 'dzin cing /
T02D1401:22a-12: lag pa g-yas pas rde'u chung 'dzin pa'i spyod pa'i
T02D1401:22a-13: gzugs kyi brtul zhugs kyis bsrung bar bsams na sha
T02D1401:22a-14: za la sogs pa rnams kyis tshugs par mi 'gyur
T02D1401:22a-15: la gzhan du na mngon par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:22a-16: sman bzang po rdzogs par bya ba la ni tshes
T02D1401:22a-17: dang skar ma dang gza' bzang po la gzugs pa
T02D1401:22a-19: gang dang 'dra ba'i gzugs su byed par 'dod pa'i sngags pa mnyam par gzhag par byed de /
T02D1401:22a-20: gang dang gang gi khrag gis 'bras bu rnams la
T02D1401:22a-21: mang du gtor zhing de'i sha la sogs pas byugs
T02D1401:22a-22: la de'i zhag gis kyang mnye bar bya ste /
T02D1401:22a-23: de'i thod pa ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin bskyed cing /
T02D1401:22a-24: de'i zhag dang chu dang sha dang khrag gis gtor
T02D1401:22a-25: ma dang bdug pa dang byug pa la sogs pa
T02D1401:22a-26: nan tan du yang dang yang du byas la /
T02D1401:22a-27: smin pa'i dus blang bar bya ste /
T02D1401:22a-28: gcer bu spyi gtsug grol bas bu mo'i lag pa g-yon par thod pa bzhag cing /
T02D1401:22a-29: ci nas kyang 'bras bu sa la ma lhung bar gzung ngo //
T02D1401:22a-30: grub pa'i sa bon de bsgrims te blangs la cha
T02D1401:22a-31: gsum du byas la gcig ni bla ma rdo rje
T02D1401:22a-33: gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang
T02D1401:22a-34: dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams la dbul lo
T02D1401:22a-35: // gsum pa ni bdag nyid kyis bzung la /
T02D1401:22a-36: khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa'i rnal 'byor 'byung po'i
T02D1401:22a-37: ma mo'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gnas te khar
T02D1401:22a-38: bcug na rnal 'byor pa sna tshogs kyi rnam pa
T02D1401:22b-0: cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du nges par @22b de 'dra ba'i gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:22b-1: sbyor ba'i nus pa skyes bu thams cad du mi snang bar 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D1401:22b-2: sa bon gyi dam tshig 'grub pa'i cha tsam yang
T02D1401:22b-3: 'ug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mi mthong na
T02D1401:22b-4: sa la skyes pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci
T02D1401:22b-5: dgos te / blo dang ldan pas ji srid 'dod
T02D1401:22b-6: pa'i bar du mnyam par gzhag na lha'i bu mo
T02D1401:22b-7: rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:22b-8: 'dod na kha nas bton na mthong zhing mi 'dod na mi mthong bar 'gyur te /
T02D1401:22b-9: mi snang ba'i dbang phyug tu 'dod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:22b-10: khang bzangs dang shing gi rtse mo la sogs phye mar byed do zhes bya ba ni //
T02D1401:22b-11: sngags kyi rgyal pos me 'bar ba'i /
T02D1401:22b-12: sta gri bzhin du gtub par bya'o //
T02D1401:22b-13: lag pa g-yon pa zla ba'i 'od ltar dri ma
T02D1401:22b-14: med pa'i 'khor lo 'di bkod na gnas pa dang
T02D1401:22b-15: rgyu ba dang yan lag las skyes pa dang sbyar
T02D1401:22b-16: ba las byung ba'i dug rnams lag pa'i mthil bstan
T02D1401:22b-17: pa tsam gyis bdud rtsir byed cing zla ba'i 'od
T02D1401:22b-18: ltar dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'bar bas dug
T02D1401:22b-19: sna tshogs kyis brgyal ba yang slong bar byed do
T02D1401:22b-20: // bdud rtsi bcud kyis len gsungs te /
T02D1401:22b-21: bdud rtsi za ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D1401:22b-22: dug tu byed do zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa
T02D1401:22b-23: med par gang du sngags nag por byas pa nyid
T02D1401:22b-24: kyis so ; / yang na ku ba khan de'i
T02D1401:22b-25: sa bon blangs la sbrul nag po'i zhag gis byugs
T02D1401:22b-26: kyis so ; te / za ba mar ngo'i gza'
T02D1401:22b-27: ma rungs pa la dgongs ka'i dus su sbrul nag
T02D1401:22b-28: po'i thod par bzhi mdo'i sas bkang la btsugs nas
T02D1401:22b-29: skyes bu'i khu ba'i thig le byas nas gang la
T02D1401:22b-30: bltas pa'i bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba
T02D1401:22b-31: la sogs pa rnams kha zhing sngags dang bcas pa
T02D1401:22b-32: ni dug tu 'gyur la 'dong na rnal mar 'gyur
T02D1401:22b-33: kyis so ; te / ro // zla ba zhes bya ba chang ngo //
T02D1401:22b-34: 'o ma zhes bya ba 'o ma'i btung ba'o //
T02D1401:22b-35: zla ba'i 'od ltar dri ma med pa'i bsam gtan tsam gyis so //
T02D1401:22b-36: yang na shing aarka dkar po dang me sbar la padma'i snal ma phra mo phye mar byas te /
T02D1401:22b-37: 'o ma dang lan mang du btags te sngags kyi
T02D1401:22b-38: sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du dbul nas
T02D1401:22b-39: de'i thal ba blangs la tsing ka'i khu bas sbrus
T02D1401:22b-40: te / grib ma la lan bdun gyi bar du bskam par bya'o //
T02D1401:23a-0: de nas mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi @23a * //
T02D1401:23a-1: sor mo'i nang bkang la chang gi snod kyi nang
T02D1401:23a-2: du thal ba blugs la 'o ma dang kun da
T02D1401:23a-3: dang / zla ba ltar dri ma med par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:23a-4: rtog pas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams la las 'di spyad par bya'o //
T02D1401:23a-5: ji ltar ku su ma'i me tog bskams pa'i phye
T02D1401:23a-6: ma la dzam bi ri 'bras bu'i khu bas lan
T02D1401:23a-7: mang du sbrus la ba'i gcin gyis spangs nas padma'i
T02D1401:23a-8: snod du blugs pas ni'o ma dang chang dang 'dra
T02D1401:23a-9: bar byed do // tsher ma dang bcas pa'i ka
T02D1401:23a-10: ranydza'i 'bras bu'i phye ma dang n'a ri'i pags pa
T02D1401:23a-11: bar byed do // dang bcas pas / ltag pa
T02D1401:23a-12: la sogs pa la byugs na dri 'phrog par byed
T02D1401:23a-13: bar byed do // dang bcas pas / do //
T02D1401:23a-14: de ltar me tog dang shing dang 'bras bu la
T02D1401:23a-15: sogs pa thams cad kyi dri 'phro'o //
T02D1401:23a-16: me tog sna tshogs pa la phan tshun du bdug pa la sogs pas bdugs pa'am bsregs na /
T02D1401:23a-17: gang du 'dod pa dri bro bar byed do //
T02D1401:23a-18: nam mkha' lding gi gdon gyis 'gro ba 'byin par
T02D1401:23a-19: byed cing zhes bya ba la sogs pa la 'khor
T02D1401:23a-20: lo de nyid klu rnams spangs shing zla bas nye
T02D1401:23a-21: bar brgyan pa la lha'i bu mo dang skyes pa
T02D1401:23a-22: gnyis kyi ming dang spel la skar ma rgyal gyi
T02D1401:23a-23: dus su go ro tsa nas bris la mchod pa
T02D1401:23a-24: chen po byas te bzung la bdag nyid dpal he
T02D1401:23a-25: ru ka'i bdag nyid du sbyor zhing /
T02D1401:23a-26: rang gi rig ma ni rdo rje phag mos yongs
T02D1401:23a-27: su brtags pa gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi
T02D1401:23a-28: ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas mtshan thog thag rig
T02D1401:23a-29: pa'i rgyal po bzlas pa byas na rang nyid 'ongs
T02D1401:23a-30: te 'dus pa ni bud med dang 'dus pa zhes
T02D1401:23a-31: bya'o // rig ma las rdul rang byung ste bud med rnams kyang 'dus par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:23a-32: nam mkha' lding gi gdong gis 'gro ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:23a-33: go bzlog 'dug stangs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i padma'i
T02D1401:23a-34: nang du chud pa'i khrag dang bcas pa'i rtsa kha
T02D1401:23a-35: bye ba las 'byin par byed pa ni de bzhin
T02D1401:23a-36: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rigs su
T02D1401:23a-37: 'gyur bas mi mchog ste dpal dang ldan zhing mtshan
T02D1401:23a-39: de'i lag mthil na yod pa'i dpal gang gis kyang 'phrogs mi nus te /
T02D1401:23a-40: 'byung po thams cad kyi mchod gnas su 'gyur bas
T02D1401:23a-41: 'khor los sgyur ba dang mnyam par dpal dang ldan
T02D1401:23b-0: zhing tshe dang nad med par phun @23b sum tshogs
T02D1401:23b-1: pas mtshan pa'o // dran pa tsam gyis gsod par
T02D1401:23b-2: byed do zhes bya ba la 'khor lo de nyid
T02D1401:23b-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi nang du chud par dug
T02D1401:23b-4: dang lan tshva dang ske tshes bris la dur khrod
T02D1401:23b-5: kyi thal ba dang sol bas gzugs brnyan byas la
T02D1401:23b-6: snying gar bcug la bsgrub bya dran bzhin du bkug
T02D1401:23b-7: ste bcug la dur khrod du sbas nas mi'i rus
T02D1401:23b-8: pa'i phur bus snying gar btab nas chu tshan blugs
T02D1401:23b-9: la khro bas sngags bzlas na nyi ma bdun gyis
T02D1401:23b-11: gtum mo spar ba 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i ting nge
T02D1401:23b-12: 'dzin la gnas nas lho phyogs kyi rlung gis brdabs
T02D1401:23b-13: shing bus na gang yin pa der me skyed par
T02D1401:23b-15: rtse gcig pa'i rdo rje gsor zhing sngags bzlas pas ni sa 'og pa rnams 'joms par byed do //
T02D1401:23b-16: lag pa'i mthil du mngon par bsngags nas rlung gi
T02D1401:23b-17: rjes su bsnun na gang du 'dod pa der ser
T02D1401:23b-19: dran pa tsam gyis glog skyed par byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:23b-20: dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1401:23b-21: pa la zla ba mang ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu
T02D1401:23b-22: bzhi la ro bsregs pa'i me la shing aarka bsregs
T02D1401:23b-23: la da du ra'i khu bas me bsad nas sol
T02D1401:23b-24: ba des dug dang lan tshvar bcas pas dur khrod
T02D1401:23b-25: ras la nyi ma'i dbus su chud pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1401:23b-26: bris nas dur khrod kyi thal bas gzugs brnyan byas
T02D1401:23b-27: te / de'i snying gar ming dang spel ba bcug
T02D1401:23b-28: la dgug pa la sogs pa byas la gu gul
T02D1401:23b-29: chen pos bdugs nas gang gi ming nas bzung ste
T02D1401:23b-30: te / / sngags kyis lan cig bzlas te bsnun na de'i mod la ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:23b-31: 'khor lo de nyid sa kva ta ka'i smyu gus
T02D1401:23b-32: sha za'i snying gar cho ga bzhin du bris la
T02D1401:23b-33: ji skad gsungs pa'i thal bsngags dang bcas pas gang
T02D1401:23b-34: gi ming nas smos te bsnun na de sha zas
T02D1401:23b-36: dur khrod kyi sol ba zhes bya ba la gong
T02D1401:23b-37: du bstan pa'i sol bas 'byung po'i nyin zhag gi
T02D1401:23b-38: mtshan mo la spang leb bam rtsig pa'i ngos sam
T02D1401:23b-39: dben pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar gza' rnams kyi
T02D1401:23b-40: phyag mtshan gyi dbus su 'khor lo la bsgrub bya'i
T02D1401:23b-41: ming du spel ba bres nas gu gul chen pos
T02D1401:23b-42: bdugs na de gzas bzung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:24a-0: slar gso ba la ni de dag thams cad @24a * //
T02D1401:24a-1: la yang nan tan du 'o mas bkru zhing zhi ba'i yid kyis bzlas par bya'o //
T02D1401:24a-2: aa ti mukta'i lcug ma zhes bya ba la sogs
T02D1401:24a-3: pa la tsandan dmar po'i rdul las bsgrub bya'i gzugs
T02D1401:24a-4: brnyan byas la dur khrod kyi ras la ro'i sen
T02D1401:24a-5: rtsi dang ro tsa na las sngon du gsungs pa'i
T02D1401:24a-6: 'khor lo zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bris te snying
T02D1401:24a-7: gar bcug la dri'i chus khrus byas nas dgug pa
T02D1401:24a-9: aa ti mukta'i lcug ma la /
T02D1401:24a-10: bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel ba'i sngags lan bdun bzlas
T02D1401:24a-11: nas gang la bsnun na dga' ba chen po'i mdog
T02D1401:24a-12: dmar zhing gcer bu skra grol ba myos shing byang
T02D1401:24a-13: chub kyi sems rgyun du 'bab pa rnga mo la
T02D1401:24a-14: zhom pa dbugs kyi zhags pas bkug ste /
T02D1401:24a-15: rkang pa dag gi mdun du 'gyil [?] bar bsam mo //
T02D1401:24a-16: nyi ma bdun yongs su rdzogs pas rlung gi shugs kyis 'ong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:24a-17: mi ro'i thod tshal la ldong ros dang /
T02D1401:24a-18: yung ba sa gang gi ming dang spel ba'i 'khor
T02D1401:24a-19: lo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bris nas
T02D1401:24a-20: dur khrod dam lam gyi bzhi mdor khru gang tsam
T02D1401:24a-21: du brkos te / kha sbub tu sbas la gseg ma la lan bdun bzlas nas bsnun te /
T02D1401:24a-22: de ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bcings par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:24a-23: gang gi tshe bgrod 'dod pa de'i tshe yang tshub
T02D1401:24a-24: mas khyer ba'i shing lo la mchi ma dang khva'i
T02D1401:24a-25: khrag dang bya rog gi sgro'i rtsa ba la smyu
T02D1401:24a-26: gus ming dang bcas par bris nas gyen du ldang
T02D1401:24a-27: ba'i rlung la bskur na gang du 'dod pa der
T02D1401:24a-29: rengs pa gso ba la ni phyung nas bkru bar bya'o //
T02D1401:24a-30: ra nag po'i yan lag lnga dang til mar chen
T02D1401:24a-31: po dang gu gul chen po rnams cha bsnyams la
T02D1401:24a-32: chang gis sbrus te mchod pa'i dus su lan cig
T02D1401:24a-33: bzlas te bdug par sbyar na de bsnams pa tsam
T02D1401:24a-35: yang dur khrod kyi ras la shing aa sho ka'i
T02D1401:24a-36: smyu gus klu rnams spangs pa'i 'khor lo de nyid
T02D1401:24a-37: la bris la yi ge ae'i dbus su raksha zhes
T02D1401:24a-38: bya ba'i ming dang spel bar byas nas yang dag
T02D1401:24a-39: par mchod cing de khyim gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhag
T02D1401:24a-40: na lus srul po thams cad bcings par 'gyur ro
T02D1401:24a-41: // 'khor lo de nyid du dur khrod kyi ras
T02D1401:24b-0: la bsgrub bya'i ming dang spel te @24b bris nas
T02D1401:24b-1: bud med kyi ro bsregs pa'i thal pa dang tsandan
T02D1401:24b-2: dmar po'i rdul du bsres pas bsgrub bya'i gzugs brnyan
T02D1401:24b-3: byas la dgug pa la sogs pa byas nas snying
T02D1401:24b-4: gar bcug nas yang dag par mchod de ka ra
T02D1401:24b-5: b'i ra'i lcug ma bsgrub bya'i lag pa'i tshad tsam
T02D1401:24b-6: bud med ro bsregs pa'i 'bar ba'i me la bskyur
T02D1401:24b-7: la ji srid ma tshig par de myur du blangs
T02D1401:24b-8: te rig pa'i rgyal po lan cig bzlas nas gang
T02D1401:24b-9: zhig dran bzhin bskor na de 'gugs par byed /
T02D1401:24b-10: ltor bsnun na mngal 'pho bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:24b-11: gzhan yang rkang pa brgyad pa yi //
T02D1401:24b-12: sngags kyi las mchog bshad par bya //
T02D1401:24b-13: nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni //
T02D1401:24b-14: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya //
T02D1401:24b-15: sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo yi //
T02D1401:24b-16: dbus su bde chen 'khor lo bri //
T02D1401:24b-19: phreng bas gsum bskor dbus su ni //
T02D1401:24b-20: sna tshogs rdo rje'i phreng bskor nas ;
T02D1401:24b-21: /'od zer tshogs ni spo bya ste ste //
T02D1401:24b-22: 'on kyang dkar dmar sngo rnam pa //
T02D1401:24b-23: las kyi 'od zer gyis brgyan pa //
T02D1401:24b-24: dbus su dpa' bo'i snying po dang //
T02D1401:24b-25: ji ltar bstan zhing bsgrub bya'i ming //
T02D1401:24b-26: de lta bu yi cho gas bri //
T02D1401:24b-27: 'di ni srung ba chen po ste //
T02D1401:24b-28: srung ba kun gyi dam pa yin //
T02D1401:24b-29: rims dang lto ba na ba dang //
T02D1401:24b-30: dug gi nad dang mkha' 'gro nye bar 'tshe ba dang /
T02D1401:24b-34: gang dag lus srul po la sogs pa dag grib
T02D1401:24b-35: ma la yang 'da' bar mi nus na de'i lus
T02D1401:24b-37: zla gzugs 'dra ba'i yi ge blta //
T02D1401:24b-38: phyogs bcur 'byer bar byed pa yin //
T02D1401:24b-39: dkar po yis ni zhi bar 'gyur //
T02D1401:24b-40: nag po skad cig gsod par 'gyur //
T02D1401:24b-41: dmar pos dbang du byed 'gyur te //
T02D1401:24b-42: de nyid kyis ni nges par 'gugs //
T02D1401:24b-43: ser po yis ni rengs pa dang //
T02D1401:24b-44: dpung tshogs bzhin par bcas pas gnon //
T02D1401:24b-45: rnal 'byo rma yi snying po mchog / gsang ba las kyang shin tu gsang //
T02D1401:24b-46: sngags kyi de nyid rab sbas pa //
T02D1401:24b-47: he ru ka dpal rdo rje che //
T02D1401:24b-48: rgyud ni gang gis mi shes shing //
T02D1401:24b-49: bla ma che la gus med par //
T02D1401:25a-4: phub ma rdung bar byed dang mtshungs //
T02D1401:25a-5: de ni ngal ba don med de //
T02D1401:25a-7: de phyir mchog 'dod gang yin pas //
T02D1401:25a-8: 'bad de rdo rje slob dpon gzung //
T02D1401:25a-10: byin gyi rlabs kyis 'bras bu ster //
T02D1401:25a-12: dpal he ru ka zhes bya bya ba'i dka' 'grel
T02D1401:25a-13: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u dgu pa'i
T02D1401:25a-16: // / de nas sku gsum bshad bya ste //
T02D1401:25a-17: zhes bya ba la sku gsum gyi sgras ni chos
T02D1401:25a-18: dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa rnams so
T02D1401:25a-19: // de la sku dang gsung gi gsang ba zhes
T02D1401:25a-20: bya ba bsod nams kyi rgyu mthun pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1401:25a-21: // ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T02D1401:25a-22: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1401:25a-23: gang zhig rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar zhugs shing
T02D1401:25a-24: khongs su chud pas chad pa med ba rtag pa
T02D1401:25a-25: med pa / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i lam
T02D1401:25a-26: nas 'jug pa'i bsam gtan goms shing byang bas mi
T02D1401:25a-27: dmigs shing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa rnam
T02D1401:25a-28: par byang ba med pa stong pa ma yin zhing
T02D1401:25a-29: lus kyi yul ma yin pa dag gi spyod yul
T02D1401:25a-30: las 'das pa yid kyi rang bzhin gyi yul ma
T02D1401:25a-31: yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
T02D1401:25a-32: kyi nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam par 'jug pa chos
T02D1401:25a-33: med pa / kyi sku'o // de ltar de bzhin
T02D1401:25a-34: gshegs pa rnams kyi don dam pa'i sgro nas sku
T02D1401:25a-36: de rnams kyi sgrub pa bshad par bya ste /
T02D1401:25a-38: he ru ka dpal gnyis med sbyor //
T02D1401:25a-39: zhes bya ba ste gzhal yas khang gi dbus su
T02D1401:25a-40: yi ge bhr'um yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo
T02D1401:25a-41: rtsibs brgyad pa de'i dbus su sna tshogs padma 'dab
T02D1401:25a-42: ma brgyad pa'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i
T02D1401:25a-43: dbus su a'a li k'a li yongs su gyur pa
T02D1401:25a-44: las rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar po zhal
T02D1401:25a-45: gcig phyag bzhi pa phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang
T02D1401:25a-46: rde'u chung / g-yon na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang dril bu 'dzin pa /
T02D1401:25b-0: phag mo mdog dmar mo la 'khyud pa @25b g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas gnas pa ste /
T02D1401:25b-1: bsrub bya srubs pa'i sbyor bas 'dod chags kyi me 'bar bas zhu bar gyur bar blta'o //
T02D1401:25b-2: de'i 'od zer las nges par 'byung ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D1401:25b-3: ma rnams kyi rdo rje'i glus yang dag par bskul
T02D1401:25b-4: bar bsams te / aom h'um aa ma h'a su kha aa la la la ho /
T02D1401:25b-5: ma h'a su kha ra tsa ta stvam /
T02D1401:25b-6: su ra ta su kha bi yog su ra to
T02D1401:25b-7: aa ho ma h'a su kham su kha ma nu
T02D1401:25b-8: siddhi ho / su ra ta sa ma ya soo khya ba yam /
T02D1401:25b-9: aom h'um aa ho aa ho bha ga b'a na ma h'a su kham /
T02D1401:25b-10: autta ra sarbo tha mo soo khya ma ya h'um aa la la la ho /
T02D1401:25b-11: stam ba ra ma su kha ma len du po
T02D1401:25b-12: bo tim ma dza la su kham aa la la
T02D1401:25b-13: la ho / bi ti sva bya ma ya /
T02D1401:25b-14: sgra brnyan dang 'dra ba'i grus bskul ma thag tu de'i ngo byas nas bzhengs te /
T02D1401:25b-15: rig rnams kyi bdag po chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin
T02D1401:25b-16: gyis 'od gsal ba dpal thugs kyi mkha' 'gro bde
T02D1401:25b-17: ba chen po mdog sngo zhing gzi brjid chen po
T02D1401:25b-18: nyi ma bye ba ltar gsal zhing /
T02D1401:25b-19: khro bo'i lta ba dang lo bcu drug lon pa'i
T02D1401:25b-20: rnam pa lta bu mtshan thams cad yongs su rdzogs
T02D1401:25b-21: pa dpe byad thams cad kyis yang dag par brgyan
T02D1401:25b-22: zhing / zhal bzhi pa phyag bcu gnyis pa /
T02D1401:25b-23: g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas bzhugs shing /
T02D1401:25b-24: spyan gsum pa zhal mche ba rnam par gcigs [*gcig] pa ste /
T02D1401:25b-25: zhal g-yon pa dang g-yas pa dkar zhing ser ba nub phyogs kyi zhal dmar po'o //
T02D1401:25b-26: phyag dang po gnyis rdo rje dang dril bu yang
T02D1401:25b-27: dag par ldan pa gzhan gyis khyab 'jug gi mgo
T02D1401:25b-28: bo bzung nas khyab 'jug gi pags pa bsnams pa
T02D1401:25b-29: ste / phyag lhag ma rnams kyis dgra sta dang
T02D1401:25b-30: mdung rtse gsum dang zangs gri dang cang te'u rnams
T02D1401:25b-32: g-yon pas ni zhags pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang sdigs mdzub bo //
T02D1401:25b-33: thod pa'i phreng bas dpa' bo dbu bcings shing /
T02D1401:25b-34: spyi bor mtho ba zla ba phyed pas ral ba bcings te /
T02D1401:25b-35: sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bsnams pa stag gi pags pa mnabs shing /
T02D1401:25b-36: rgyan thams cad kyis klubs pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1401:25b-37: de ni zhal gcig / phyag gnyis pa spyan gsum pa gcer bu mdog sngo ba ste /
T02D1401:26a-0: dum bus mtshan pa'i skar gas can rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing phyag @26a * //
T02D1401:26a-1: g-yon pas 'khyud cing thod pa thogs pa g-yas pa rdo rje gdengs pa dang sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'o //
T02D1401:26a-2: 'dab ma rnams la ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1401:26a-3: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad la ni rab tu gtum mo la sogs pa dang /
T02D1401:26a-4: khva'i gdong ba la sogs pa nas gshin rje 'joms
T02D1401:26a-5: ma'i mthar thug pa 'di ni rnal 'byor ma nyi
T02D1401:26a-6: shu ste zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa la dkar
T02D1401:26a-7: po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu
T02D1401:26a-8: ni mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'o //
T02D1401:26a-9: mtshams rnams su ni dum bu'i thod pas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1401:26a-10: yang dkar po dang ser po dang dmar po dang
T02D1401:26a-11: ljang gu rnams ni g-yon skor gyis phyogs kyis so
T02D1401:26a-12: // sngo skya dang ser po dang ljang gu dang
T02D1401:26a-13: ser po ni g-yas skor gyis mtshams na gnas pa'o
T02D1401:26a-14: // // thod pa'i dum bu can dang rab tu
T02D1401:26a-15: gtum mo la sogs pa'i dpa' bo rnams ni phyag
T02D1401:26a-16: // // bzhi pa'o // rnal 'byor ma rnams ni phyag gnyis pa'o //
T02D1401:26a-17: rdo rje dang dril bu dang kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u ni dpa' bo'i'o //
T02D1401:26a-18: lha mo rnams kyis ni thod pa dang rdo rje dang sdigs mdzub po //
T02D1401:26a-19: thugs la sogs pa byin gyis rlob pa'i dus su ni rdo rje bzhi po 'ba' zhig gis so //
T02D1401:26a-20: sku gsung thugs kyi ting nge 'dzin sems dpa' bsgom pa snga ma bzhin du'o //
T02D1401:26a-21: gsung rdo rje yang mdog dmar zhing dbang phyug chen
T02D1401:26a-22: po'i mgo bo bsnams nas padma dang dril bu bsnams
T02D1401:26a-24: dkar po dang dmar po dang sngon po dang ljang gu ni g-yon skor gyi phyogs kyi'o //
T02D1401:26a-25: ser po dang dkar po dang ljang gu dang nam
T02D1401:26a-26: mkha' ltar sngo bsangs ni g-yas skor gyi mtshams kyi'o
T02D1401:26a-27: // 'khor lo'i shugs ma la sogs pa sku'i rdo rje ma yang snga ma bzhin te /
T02D1401:26a-28: 'khor lo dang dril bu dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo
T02D1401:26a-29: thogs pas tshangs pa'i pags pa bsnams pa ni khyad
T02D1401:26a-30: par ro // sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ma la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1401:26a-31: de yang dkar mo thod ba dang 'khor lo thogs nas sdang ba rnams la sdigs mdzub byed pa'o //
T02D1401:26a-32: sngon po dang ljang gu dang dmar po dang ser
T02D1401:26a-33: po ni g-yon skor gyis ni mkha' 'gro ma la
T02D1401:26a-34: sogs pa'i'o // nag po dang ser po dang dmar
T02D1401:26a-35: po dang ljang gu dang zla ba ltar dkar ba
T02D1401:26b-0: dang dud ka dang skya bo @26b dang dkar po
T02D1401:26b-2: aom shr'i badzra he he ru ru kam h'um h'um phat /
T02D1401:26b-3: d'a ki n'i dz'a la sam ba ra sv'a h'a /
T02D1401:26b-5: aom ham bha ga dha ka a'a ro li ka
T02D1401:26b-6: d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra h'um phat sv'a
T02D1401:26b-8: aom a'a ro li ka dzim h'um phat /
T02D1401:26b-10: / aom padma d'a ki n'i hr'i: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1401:26b-11: aom sarba padma d'a ki n'i ye a'a: h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1401:26b-12: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1401:26b-13: aom shr'i d'a ki n'i dz'a la samba ra ru lu ru lu bhr'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1401:26b-14: aom bhr'um aam bhr'um h'um phat /
T02D1401:26b-15: sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1401:26b-16: aom bu ddha d'a ki n'i ye bee ro tsa n'i ye bhr'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02D1401:26b-17: aom h'um sarba buddha d'a gi n'i ye h'um bh'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1401:26b-18: lha mo'i snying po dang nye ba'i snying po'o //
T02D1401:26b-19: rnal 'byor pa dman pa rnams kyi rab tu sbyor ba shes par bya ste /
T02D1401:26b-20: sngags pas yungs kar gyi 'bras bu mang po la 'gegs pa'i ro'i khrag dang /
T02D1401:26b-21: zhag gis yang dang yang byugs la tshes brgyad kyi
T02D1401:26b-22: skar ma rgyal la nyi ma tsha ba'i dus su
T02D1401:26b-23: gzhi la gzugs par bya ste /
T02D1401:26b-24: gsang ba'i zhing sa zhag dang khrag gis bran pa dang de'i thod par bkug ste /
T02D1401:26b-25: bskyed la smin pa'i sa bon ci rigs pa blangs te /
T02D1401:26b-26: blo dang ldan pas mar khu'i rgyu me la ma
T02D1401:26b-27: reg par btsir nas mar khu sa la ma reg
T02D1401:26b-28: par bzhag ste sngags dang rnal 'byor gyis bsrung ngo
T02D1401:26b-29: // de nas yang 'gegs pa'i tshil las mar ngo'i nyin zhag khyad par can la /
T02D1401:26b-30: mdun du mandala byas la sngags pas cho ga bzhin
T02D1401:26b-31: du mchod nas dpal he ru ka dang gnyis su
T02D1401:26b-32: med pa yi dags rnams la gtor ma sha dang
T02D1401:26b-33: khrag dang ldan pa byin la he ru ka'i spyod
T02D1401:26b-34: pas rnal 'byor chen po ngal so zhing sngags bzlas
T02D1401:26b-35: la byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1401:26b-36: yi ge h'um gi snying po 'jigs pa'i sgra bsgrags par bya'o //
T02D1401:26b-37: de nas rlung gis me bskyod ba'i rlung gi dkyil
T02D1401:26b-38: 'khor gyi steng du rkang pa la h'um bkod pa'i
T02D1401:26b-39: rgyal mtshan bsams la sngar bstan pa'i mar khus byug
T02D1401:26b-40: par bya'o // de nas rkang mthil nas brtsams nas
T02D1401:26b-41: mgo bo'i bar du gu gul chen po'i bdug pas
T02D1401:26b-42: rgyun mi 'chad par bdugs la mandala gyi me tog
T02D1401:27a-1: sngags bzlas shing dril bu sgra drag tu dkrol nas
T02D1401:27a-2: skye gnas kyi phyag rgya bdag gi dpral bar bzhag
T02D1401:27a-4: de'i tshe ro'i lus la bgegs sna tshogs 'byung ste bar chod byed do //
T02D1401:27a-5: de la sngags chen po grub pa'i rdzas kyis bgegs
T02D1401:27a-6: bzlog par bya ba'i phyir 'jigs par mi bya zhing
T02D1401:27a-7: drag po'i gzugs kyis dpa' bo'i dam tshig ci rigs
T02D1401:27a-9: bdud rtsi lnga dang chang du ldan pa'i thod par
T02D1401:27a-10: gtor ma byin la bdag la rnal 'byor mkha' la
T02D1401:27a-11: spyod pa grub pa byin cig ces brjod par bya'o
T02D1401:27a-12: // de nas de'i lus la 'dzags pa'i mar khu
T02D1401:27a-13: blangs la ku ba la sogs pa gang yang rung
T02D1401:27a-14: bar blugs nas rkang mthil du byugs na nam mkha'
T02D1401:27a-15: la spyod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:27a-16: yang sbur ter gyi sa bon la nya skyogs su
T02D1401:27a-17: byi dang ka'i khu ba dang khrag gis yang dang
T02D1401:27a-18: yang du sbags la gang yin pa'i thod par dur
T02D1401:27a-19: khrod kyi sas bkang bar bcug nas gtor ma dang
T02D1401:27a-20: mchod pa la sogs pa sngon bstan pa bzhin du
T02D1401:27a-21: ci rigs par byas la yongs su smin pa'i sa
T02D1401:27a-22: bon blangs la khar bcug na byar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:27a-23: de la sogs pa'i sa bon khrag dang zhag gis
T02D1401:27a-24: yang dang yang du sbags shing sha dang rus phye'i
T02D1401:27a-25: bdug pas bdugs la de'i thod par bskyed de dus
T02D1401:27a-26: su smin pa'i 'bras bu blangs la khar bcug na
