T02D1401:30b-11: bram ze'i thod par sa bon gzugs //
T02D1401:30b-12: de nas shing smin pa dang gza' nyi ma la
T02D1401:30b-13: nyi ma shar ba'i dus su de'i rtsa ba phra
T02D1401:30b-14: mo rnams kha byang du phyogs pas blangs nas sa
T02D1401:30b-15: la ma lhung bar bzung ste ji ltar bstan pa'i
T02D1401:30b-16: rim pas phrag pa dang spyi bor bzung na /
T02D1401:30b-17: rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:30b-18: yang de'i ge sar zho dang lhan cig bza' ste /
T02D1401:30b-19: ji srid mgrin par lud kyi bar du dpa' bos bza'o //
T02D1401:30b-20: de ji srid ma zhu ba de srid du rdo
T02D1401:30b-21: rje 'dzin pa dang 'dra ba'i lus su 'gyur te
T02D1401:30b-22: / de la mtshon chas phog kyang chu'i thigs pa ltar gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:30b-23: yang na sngon gyi go cha'i rim pa'i sngags pas
T02D1401:30b-24: bram ze'i thod bar bcugs pa'i aa shvattha'i rtsa ba
T02D1401:30b-25: blangs la cho ga bzhin du ril bu bya'o //
T02D1401:30b-26: nyi ma zla ba sreg byed pa'i //
T02D1401:30b-27: so so'i cha la gnas pa yi //
T02D1401:30b-28: lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas pa'i //
T02D1401:30b-29: ril bu kha ru gzhug par bya //
T02D1401:30b-30: de nas dpa' bo chen pos mtshon cha thams cad bzlog cing rims dang /
T02D1401:30b-34: gza' rnams de'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis rab tu 'bros te /
T02D1401:30b-35: seng ge'i dris glang po che 'bros pa bzhin no //
T02D1401:30b-36: yang pe ta'i sa bon bram ze'i klad pa la
T02D1401:30b-37: cho ga bzhin du btsugs la sman bzang po blang
T02D1401:30b-38: bar bya ste / skar ma rgyal dang gza' nyi
T02D1401:30b-39: ma dang zla ba la mchod pa dang gtor ma
T02D1401:30b-40: byas na phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i sgrub pa po
T02D1401:30b-41: lha'i rnal 'byor gyis sngags zlos pas snga ma bzhin
T02D1401:30b-42: gcer bu skra grol bar gyur pa mnyam par gzhag
T02D1401:30b-44: rnal 'byor ma'i lag par thod pa sa lam lhung bar gzhag go //
T02D1401:31a-0: de nas dum bu bdun byas la skud pa dkar pos dkris nas gang gi @31a * //
T02D1401:31a-1: spyi bor bzung na sa stengs na ji snyed pa'i mtshon cha du ma rnams brlag bar 'gyur te /
T02D1401:31a-2: dper na nyi mas mun pa bzhin no //
T02D1401:31a-3: de nas 'dam gyi cho ga bshad //
T02D1401:31a-4: nag po chen po sman chen po //
T02D1401:31a-5: rgyal dang nyi ma la btsal nas //
T02D1401:31a-6: mchod dang gtor ma yang dag ldan //
T02D1401:31a-7: dgongs mo'i dus su snyan mnan la //
T02D1401:31a-8: tho rangs lha yi bdag nyid dang //
T02D1401:31a-9: gcer bu skra grol gyur pa yis //
T02D1401:31a-10: shin tu mnyam par gzhag bas blang //
T02D1401:31a-11: khyu mchog rva yis blangs pa yis //
T02D1401:31a-12: phyi nas lhan cig bsre bar bya //
T02D1401:31a-13: gzhon nu ma yis btags nas su //
T02D1401:31a-14: de yis lus ni bsku bar bya //
T02D1401:31a-15: ji srid lus la gnas kyi bar //
T02D1401:31a-16: de srid mtshon chas tshod mi 'gyur //
T02D1401:31a-17: dug kyang lus la mi 'phog ste //
T02D1401:31a-18: bdag nyid chen pos sman bza'o //
T02D1401:31a-19: yang ku m'a ri blangs la gzhon nu ma'i rkang
T02D1401:31a-20: rjes kyi sa dang ldan par byas la lug gi
T02D1401:31a-21: rva dang cha mnyam par byas te btags pa'i 'dam
T02D1401:31a-22: bskus na sum cu pas kyang mi chod do //
T02D1401:31a-23: yang tsa na li'i sdong bu blangs la mtshan gcig
T02D1401:31a-24: pa dang shing gcig pa'i sa dang ldan par byas
T02D1401:31a-25: pa'i sbyor bas byugs pa'i lus ni sum cu pas
T02D1401:31a-27: de dag gi lo gcig gi nus pa can de phyi nas ni gzhan bya'o //
T02D1401:31a-28: de nas sba bya dpa' chen pos //
T02D1401:31a-29: dpa' bo thams cad mchod byas te //
T02D1401:31a-30: mngal nas dang po phyung ba ni //
T02D1401:31a-31: ma yi nu zho ma 'thungs par //
T02D1401:31a-32: shi ba'i ro ni rnyed nas ni //
T02D1401:31a-33: he ru ka dpal gnyis med mchod //
T02D1401:31a-34: gtor ma mnyam par gzhag pas bsrung //
T02D1401:31a-35: ltag pa nas ni gshags nas su //
T02D1401:31a-36: de yi lce ni blang bar bya //
T02D1401:31a-37: bhringga ra dza du du ra //
T02D1401:31a-38: kam kam dza ga gzhan mi thub //
T02D1401:31a-39: rgyal dang nyi ma la blangs nas //
T02D1401:31a-40: lnga po rnams dang ldan pa ni //
T02D1401:31a-41: btags te ril bu byas nas su //
T02D1401:31a-42: grib ma la ni bskams nas kyang //
T02D1401:31a-43: lcags gsum gyis ni dkri bar bya //
T02D1401:31a-44: ra ti phyed brgyad ma sha gsum //
T02D1401:31a-45: ra ti phyed gsum ma sha bzhi //
T02D1401:31a-46: ra ti lnga dang ma sha gsum //
T02D1401:31a-47: rim pa bzhin du dkri bar bya //
T02D1401:31a-48: dkris nas yang dag mchod byas la //
T02D1401:31a-49: stong du bzlas te khar bcug na //
T02D1401:31a-50: ji srid kha nas gnas pa ru //
T02D1401:31b-0: sa gnas @31b mtshon cha du ma yang //
T02D1401:31b-2: dper na 'bar mes rtsva bzhin no //
T02D1401:31b-3: rims dang lto nad dug dang ni //
T02D1401:31b-4: mkha' 'gro ma yi gnod pa dang //
T02D1401:31b-5: gza' rnams thams cad zlog byed pa //
T02D1401:31b-6: rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin no //
T02D1401:31b-7: de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba ;
T02D1401:31b-8: / sems can thams cad rab rmongs pa //
T02D1401:31b-9: rgyal gyi nyin par nan tan du //
T02D1401:31b-10: nags kyi ras bal blangs nas su //
T02D1401:31b-11: bu mo gzhon nu'i skud pas bya //
T02D1401:31b-12: g-yon phyogs su ni bkal nas su //
T02D1401:31b-13: sum sgril du ni skud pa bya //
T02D1401:31b-14: rtsa ba'i sngags ni stong phrag brgyang //
T02D1401:31b-15: mngon par bzlas shing btags nas ni //
T02D1401:31b-16: mdud pa byas na sa lag g-yon gyis //
T02D1401:31b-17: de ru ma mo rnams ni brtag / nyi shu rtsa bzhi gnyis med pa //
T02D1401:31b-19: yang ngag mchod pa byas nas su //
T02D1401:31b-20: lag pa g-yas pa bcing bar bya //
T02D1401:31b-21: mtshon cha thams cad zlog byed pa //
T02D1401:31b-22: ral gri mda' sogs gzhan du min //
T02D1401:31b-23: nags skyes shal ma li yi bal //
T02D1401:31b-24: blo dang ldan pas rgyal la blang //
T02D1401:31b-25: gzhon nu ma yi lag pa ni //
T02D1401:31b-26: sa yis phyi nas bkal bar bya //
T02D1401:31b-27: dge ba'i rgyu skar skar ma dang //
T02D1401:31b-28: zla ba stobs can dag la ni //
T02D1401:31b-29: sngon du gsungs pa'i bya ba yis //
T02D1401:31b-30: shin tu mnyam gzhag mdud pa bya //
T02D1401:31b-31: 'di ni yid la gzung byas pas //
T02D1401:31b-32: sum cu pas kyang mi 'ching zhing //
T02D1401:31b-34: las kyi cho ga blta bar bya //
T02D1401:31b-35: de ltar gsang ba'i lta ba las //
T02D1401:31b-36: gsang chen gsang bas sba bya ste //
T02D1401:31b-37: blo dang ldan pas thams cad du //
T02D1401:31b-38: skal med sems can la mi sbyin //
T02D1401:31b-39: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:31b-40: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu gnyis pa'i
T02D1401:31b-43: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag tu'o //
T02D1401:31b-45: go rims bzhin du bshad bya ba /
T02D1401:31b-47: aom ha na ma: hi sv'a h'a hu boo shat
T02D1401:31b-48: he h'um h'um ho phat ham ste re re zhing
T02D1401:31b-49: ngam sbyor ba'i tshig gi yi ge drug gi gzugs
T02D1401:31b-50: dang dpa' bo'i lha ci rigs par sbyar ro //
T02D1401:31b-51: de la cho ga zlos bzhin du /
T02D1401:32a-0: ya nga ba'i lam du zhugs na zhes bya ba la @32a * //
T02D1401:32a-1: sogs ba ni zlos bzhin pas yid la ci 'dod pa thams cad byed do zhes pa'o //
T02D1401:32a-2: de nas dbus su dpa' bo'i sngags //
T02D1401:32a-3: de nyid rig pa'i bsam gtan gyis //
T02D1401:32a-4: dpa' bo'i 'khor lo rab sbyor bas //
T02D1401:32a-5: de yis bya ba kun bya'o //
T02D1401:32a-6: de la rim pa 'dis bri bar bya ste /
T02D1401:32a-7: zla ba'i dbus gyur rdo rje ni //
T02D1401:32a-8: rtse gsum de bzhin kha drug pa //
T02D1401:32a-9: de yi dbus gyur padma ni //
T02D1401:32a-10: 'dab ma drug la legs gnas pa //
T02D1401:32a-11: sngags pas ze'u 'brur bri bar bya //
T02D1401:32a-12: ji ltar bstan bzhin bsgrub bya'i ming //
T02D1401:32a-13: rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas kyis //
T02D1401:32a-14: ji ltar go cha'i sngags bshad bzhin //
T02D1401:32a-15: sngon sngags dbus su bri bya ste //
T02D1401:32a-16: gzhan ni pad 'dab la de bzhin //
T02D1401:32a-17: ring po drug ni yongs spangs par //
T02D1401:32a-18: rdo rje'i lte bar dgod par bya //
T02D1401:32a-19: gur gum sen rtsi rang khrag dang //
T02D1401:32a-20: ro tsa na yis grog la //
T02D1401:32a-21: rgyal dang nyi dus sgrub pa pos //
T02D1401:32a-22: cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya //
T02D1401:32a-23: dus gsum du ni bzlas byas nas //
T02D1401:32a-24: mchod chen byas nas gzung bya ste //
T02D1401:32a-25: sngags pas lan bdun sngags btab nas //
T02D1401:32a-26: gos kyi tha mar bcing bar bya //
T02D1401:32a-27: lam du zhugs na rkun po dang /
T02D1401:32a-29: / thams cad du ni bsrung 'gyur te //
T02D1401:32a-30: grub pa nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1401:32a-31: yang 'khor lo de nyid kyi lte ba la thig
T02D1401:32a-32: le lta bu'i rgyan byas pa'i thig les bskor nas
T02D1401:32a-33: / bsgrub bya 'khor dang bcas pa mo ha na
T02D1401:32a-34: zhes bya ba'i tshig dang spel la gos kyi tha
T02D1401:32a-36: chos kyi dbyings su bsgoms nas zlos bzhin du 'gro
T02D1401:32a-37: na lha dang mi rnams kyis mthong bar mi 'gyur
T02D1401:32a-38: ro // yang bi sha da ta ka ri'i sa
T02D1401:32a-39: bon bram ze'i thod bar cho ga bzhin btsugs la
T02D1401:32a-40: ro // bskyed pa dang / zla ba gzas zin
T02D1401:32a-41: pa'i dus su byang phyogs su zug pa'i rtsa ba
T02D1401:32a-42: blangs la lcags gsum gyis dkris te lan stong bzlas
T02D1401:32a-44: yang na n+ya gro dha'i 'bras bu khva nag pos
T02D1401:32a-45: zos pa'i rtug pa'i 'bras bu blangs nas nyi ma
T02D1401:32a-46: bzang po la / bram ze'i thod par ro bsregs
T02D1401:32a-47: pa'i sa yis bkang bar btsugs nas bdud rtsi lngas
T02D1401:32b-0: gtor te skyes @32b nas 'dab ma gnyis tsam blangs
T02D1401:32b-1: la lcags gsum gyis dkris la mchod pa rnams kyis
T02D1401:32b-2: mchod nas bsngags te khar bcug na /
T02D1401:32b-3: lha dang mi rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:32b-4: go cha bzlas pa'i lag pas gang la reg pa
T02D1401:32b-5: de zhes bya ba la dur khrod kyi ras la
T02D1401:32b-6: ba ra ci ta ka'i khu ba blangs la ldong
T02D1401:32b-7: ros dang yung ba'i aa shva ka'i smyu gus 'khor
T02D1401:32b-8: lo thig les mtshan pa bris te phyi nas bsgrub
T02D1401:32b-9: bya dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa'i ming dang spel
T02D1401:32b-11: yang bsgrub bya'i rkang rjes kyi rdul dang dur khrod kyi thal ba la bsgrub bya'i gzugs byas te /
T02D1401:32b-12: 'khor lo'i snying gar bcug nas me tog ser pos
T02D1401:32b-13: gtor zhing rkang pa g-yon pas mnan la brgyad brgya
T02D1401:32b-15: de'i steng du snying gar gnas pa'i khang pa byas
T02D1401:32b-16: la gang gi ming gzung ba de mdung bzhin du
T02D1401:32b-18: sum cu rtsa gsum pas kyang bskyod par mi nus so //
T02D1401:32b-19: gzhan gyi dmag tshogs sgrol bar bya ba la ni 'o mas bkus na slar rnal mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:32b-20: rang gi khrag la zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsal lo //
T02D1401:32b-21: khro bo'i rgyal po'i rnam par bsgoms la 'di ltar
T02D1401:32b-22: chu'i rdul phra rab thams cad dkyil 'khor gyi lhar
T02D1401:32b-23: bskyed pa'i dbu rgyan gyi gzugs kyis ni chu'i steng
T02D1401:32b-25: rnal 'byor ma dang dpa' bo'i 'khor lo snyoms par
T02D1401:32b-26: zhugs pa ni lag pa g-yon pa dang g-yas pa
T02D1401:32b-27: gnyis kyis mnyes na rigs drug gi rnal 'byor ma
T02D1401:32b-29: skar ma rgyal la ras byas la zhes bya ba
T02D1401:32b-30: la sprul gyi rgyal po rnyed nas dkar po dang
T02D1401:32b-31: nag po'i ri mo thams cad so sor dum bu
T02D1401:32b-32: dum bur bcang la nag po dang dkar po'i dbye
T02D1401:32b-34: ras bal gyi sa bon blangs nas dkar po'i zla
T02D1401:32b-35: ba la rgyal gyi nyin par dum bu dkar po
T02D1401:32b-36: zhag dang shas bsgos la sa la sbas te gdab
T02D1401:32b-37: po // ji ltar nag po'i dum bu'i zhag dang shas kyang sa bon bsgos shing /
T02D1401:32b-38: zla ba mar ngo'i rgyal gyi nyin par de nyid kyi zhag dang shas sa la yang spag go //
T02D1401:33a-0: dkar po dang nag po'i cha'i bye @33a * //
T02D1401:33a-1: brag gis ji ltar bskyed pa'i ras bal blangs la
T02D1401:33a-2: rgyal gyi nyi ma gzhan la dkar po'i chos bskyed
T02D1401:33a-4: rnal 'byor ma ser skyas bkal ba de'i nyin bar thag pa ser skyas btag go //
T02D1401:33a-5: de ltar nag po'i chas bskyod pa'i ras bal tshes
T02D1401:33a-6: nag po'i skar mo rgyal la rnal 'byor ma sngon
T02D1401:33a-7: mos bkal zhing de nyid kyi nyi ma la thag
T02D1401:33a-8: pa sngon pos ji ltar lus yog par gyur pa
T02D1401:33a-9: de ltar btags par byas la sngon po dang dkar
T02D1401:33a-10: po'i cha yis rgyal gyi nyi ma gzhan la bsgrub
T02D1401:33a-11: par bya ste / ras la stong phrag sum cu
T02D1401:33a-12: rtsa dgu mngon par bsngags la brgyad brgya bzlas shing
T02D1401:33a-14: aa ka ru nag po dang dum bu nag po'i
T02D1401:33a-15: sha dang rus pa zla ba mar ngo la bskyed
T02D1401:33a-17: de ltar zla ba mar ngo la bskyed pa'i ras
T02D1401:33a-18: ni dum bu dkar po'i sha dang rus pa dang
T02D1401:33a-19: sang ka pushpa dang bcas pas bdug par bya'o //
T02D1401:33a-20: de nas gus pas bla ma dang dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod la /
T02D1401:33a-22: rgyal la bsgrub pa'i ras la rnal 'byor ma'i bka' lung gis bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1401:33a-23: de gyon pa'i lus kyis stong phrag bcu bzlas nas 'grub par 'gyur te /
T02D1401:33a-24: grib ma mi mngon zhing dpag tshad stong gi bar
T02D1401:33a-25: du nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang 'ong bar 'gyur
T02D1401:33a-26: la lha de nyid kyis kyang mi mthong ba ste
T02D1401:33a-27: / steng gi phyogs su 'og min gyi mthar thug par 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:33a-28: yang sprul gyi rgyal po'i khar bcug pa'i nang du
T02D1401:33a-29: lig bu mig du ba ma shor bar bsregs pa'i
T02D1401:33a-30: tha la ba rang byung gi me tog gis sprus
T02D1401:33a-31: pa la lan stong phrag sum cu mngon par bsngags
T02D1401:33a-32: nas mig sman du byas na yang mi mthong bar
T02D1401:33a-33: 'gyur ro // yang na mi'i thod par sprul gyi rgyal po bzhag ste /
T02D1401:33a-34: rul nas zags pa'i rus pa blangs la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu bor zhugs te /
T02D1401:33a-35: de'i rus pa'i dum bu la lan stong phrag bcu mngon par bzlas nas bdar te /
T02D1401:33a-36: dpral bar thig le byas na grib ma mi mthong bar byed do //
T02D1401:33a-37: yang na de'i thod pa la mngon par bsngags nas
T02D1401:33a-38: bdar ba'i thig le byas kyang grib ma mi mngon
T02D1401:33b-0: par byed do // dbang po gang dang @33b gang las gyur //
T02D1401:33b-1: de dang de yi rang bzhin 'gro //
T02D1401:33b-2: zhes bya ba ni mig la sogs pa'i dbang po
T02D1401:33b-3: rnams ni gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i rang gi
T02D1401:33b-4: don la dmigs pas na bdag po ste /
T02D1401:33b-5: dbang po de nyid spyod lam kun du rnyed pa
T02D1401:33b-6: de dang de'i rang bzhin gyi ro myong bar byed
T02D1401:33b-7: pa zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:33b-8: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni sngon du don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pas so //
T02D1401:33b-9: mnyam gzhag sbyor ba'i zhes bya ba ni bdag la
T02D1401:33b-10: byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i
T02D1401:33b-11: nga rgyal dang ldan par byas shing bdag nyid rnal
T02D1401:33b-12: 'byor chen po la rnam par gnas pas phyag rgya
T02D1401:33b-13: chen po mngon par byang chub pa la yid kyis
T02D1401:33b-14: goms pas shes rab ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su
T02D1401:33b-15: gyur pa thob cing phul du byung ba'i rnal 'byor
T02D1401:33b-17: thams cad sangs rgyas rang bzhin 'gyur //
T02D1401:33b-19: shing yongs 'du'i khu bcud ces bya ba ji ltar
T02D1401:33b-20: bstan pa'i cho gas ro'i khar bskyed pa'i shing yongs
T02D1401:33b-21: 'du'i khu bcud la lan stong du bzlas nas gang
T02D1401:33b-22: la thig le byas shing bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis sprul
T02D1401:33b-24: cho ga de nyid kyis yungs kar gyi sa bon
T02D1401:33b-25: bram ze'i thod par bskyed pa blangs nas yang glang
T02D1401:33b-26: po che'i thod par bcug nas skyes pa'i 'bras bu'i
T02D1401:33b-27: phye ma dang ldan pa'i glang po che'i rkang rjes
T02D1401:33b-28: kyi rdul la lan stong du bzlas nas gang la
T02D1401:33b-29: bsnun pa de glang po che ru 'gyur la /
T02D1401:33b-30: glang po che de zhon na glang po che stong las rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:33b-31: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:33b-32: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu gsum ba'i
T02D1401:33b-35: // / de nas sgrub thabs bshad bya ba //
T02D1401:33b-36: zhes bya ba 'dis sgrub par byed pas na sgrub thabs chen po'o //
T02D1401:33b-37: bong bu'i rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag //
T02D1401:33b-38: yid kyi shugs kyis bzlog bya'i phyir //

T02D1401:34a-2: bong bu'i rnal 'byor rnal 'byor mchog / sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1401:34a-3: mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
T02D1401:34a-4: padma dpal gyi nags tshogs na //

T02D1401:34a-6: dga' ba kun gyi bde ba yis //
T02D1401:34a-7: nags kyi dbus su rnam par ro la //
T02D1401:34a-8: mkha' 'gro ma dang l'a ma dang //
T02D1401:34a-9: dum skyes ma dang gzugs can ma //
T02D1401:34a-10: sna tshogs gzugs kyis rnam rol zhing //
T02D1401:34a-11: rgyan kun brgyan bzhin 'od gsal ba //
T02D1401:34a-12: sngon du bstan bzhin 'khor dgod bya //
T02D1401:34a-14: mkha' 'gro ma ni bong bu yi //
T02D1401:34a-15: rnam pa'i gdong can khrag mig gam //
T02D1401:34a-16: mkha' 'gro ma'i lag na mdung rtse gsum pa steng

T02D1401:34a-19: mi ro'i gdan la bcibs shing me bzhin 'bar ba spyan gsum pa skra grol ba gcer bu'o //

T02D1401:34a-21: dang rgyan dang gos la sogs pa ni sngar bstan
T02D1401:34a-23: 'on kyang thugs kyi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo thams cad ni nam mkha' lding gi zhal can no //
T02D1401:34a-24: gsung gi 'khor lo'i dpa' bo rnams kyi zhal ni rma bya'i gdong can no //
T02D1401:34a-25: sku'i 'khor lo'i dpa' bo ni seng ge'i gdong can no //
T02D1401:34a-26: khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa ni rang gi ming gi gdong pa'o //
T02D1401:34a-27: gshin rje'i gdong pa la sogs pa mtshams kyi ni ma he dang /
T02D1401:34a-30: de bzhin du gung gi gdong pa'o //
T02D1401:34a-31: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa la spyan
T02D1401:34a-32: dmar zhing snying rje chen pos yongs su gzung ba
T02D1401:34a-33: chos bdag med pa las byung ba'o //
T02D1401:34a-35: sdug bsngal thams cad zad byed pa'o //
T02D1401:34a-36: dbugs rnams lte ba'i rtsa ba nas ;
T02D1401:34a-37: / g-yas dang g-yon pa gnyis dag gis //
T02D1401:34a-38: zla ba nyi ma rnam par bshad //
T02D1401:34a-39: chu shing me tog lta bu ni //
T02D1401:34a-40: lte ba'i rtsa ba nas 'greng pa //
T02D1401:34a-42: bong bur rnam par shes par bya //
T02D1401:34a-44: zla ba'i 'od 'dras rnam ba rgyan pa //
T02D1401:34b-0: @34b de dbus rtag tu stong pa ni //
T02D1401:34b-1: h'um yig rlung gi rang bzhin nyid //
T02D1401:34b-2: 'bar ba mar me lta bu ste //
T02D1401:34b-3: 'og gi rlung ni yongs gang las //
T02D1401:34b-4: snying ga nas ni steng du rgyu //
T02D1401:34b-5: spyi bo phug ste 'gro bar bshad //
T02D1401:34b-6: rnal 'byor pa gang sa gsum mnyam //
T02D1401:34b-7: sems can kun gyi snying gnas pa //
T02D1401:34b-8: sems ni mnyam par song ba ste //
T02D1401:34b-9: sems kun la ni dbang thob pas //
T02D1401:34b-10: mchog gi pha rol phyin thob ste //
T02D1401:34b-11: rab tu 'bar ba'i skad cig la //
T02D1401:34b-12: mun pa'i tshogs kun 'joms byed pa //
T02D1401:34b-13: nyi 'od nor bu ji lta bar //
T02D1401:34b-14: rgyu dang mi rgyu ma lus pa'i //
T02D1401:34b-15: sa gsum gsal bar byed pa ste //
T02D1401:34b-16: bskal pa'i me bzhin gzi brjid 'bar //
T02D1401:34b-17: g-yo ba med cing 'khrul pa med //
T02D1401:34b-18: rgyu dang dpe las rnam par 'das //
T02D1401:34b-19: rnam par mi 'gyur gos pa med //
T02D1401:34b-20: sgrib ba lnga ni rnam par spangs //
T02D1401:34b-21: he ru ka dpal mgon rang bzhin //
T02D1401:34b-22: bdag nyid rig pa med pas na //
T02D1401:34b-23: skad cig de la 'das kun dang //
T02D1401:34b-24: ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung //
T02D1401:34b-25: thams cad mkhyen pa'i rang yid mthong //
T02D1401:34b-27: lag mthil gnas pa bzhin du mthong //
T02D1401:34b-28: de yi don du g-yeng ba kun //
T02D1401:34b-29: spangs nas zla ba drug tsam du //
T02D1401:34b-30: lkugs pa'i dngos por ldan gyur pas //
T02D1401:34b-32: bsgrub pa dang ni ldan pa yis //
T02D1401:34b-34: brtul zhugs bral yang brtul zhugs ldan //
T02D1401:34b-35: dri ma can yang dag par 'gyur //
T02D1401:34b-37: nad pa yin yang nad bral 'gyur //
T02D1401:34b-38: rgas med 'chi ba med rnyed pas //
T02D1401:34b-39: thos pa med par chos ston cing //
T02D1401:34b-40: sdug bsngal du ma'i tshogs la ni //
T02D1401:34b-41: sems can dgrol bar byed pa po //
T02D1401:34b-42: bstan pa bla med ston pa yin //
T02D1401:34b-43: mi snang la sogs dngos grub dang //
T02D1401:34b-44: lha mig mngon shes lnga thob pa //
T02D1401:34b-45: 'jig rten gsum gang cung zad yod //
T02D1401:34b-46: thams cad skad cig de la mthong //
T02D1401:34b-47: tshe zad par ni snang ba dang //
T02D1401:34b-48: de bzhin tshe ring gyur pa nyid //
T02D1401:34b-49: bong bu dang ni glang chen dang //
T02D1401:34b-50: gang dang gang du rigs 'gyur pa //
T02D1401:34b-51: skye ba stong phrag du mar yang //
T02D1401:34b-52: de dang de yi gzugs su ni //
T02D1401:35a-2: gang 'dir skye ba bdun shes nas //
T02D1401:35a-3: de yis gtor ma sbyin sreg bya //
T02D1401:35a-4: rnam bar mi rtog bdag nyid kyis //
T02D1401:35a-5: mtshan mo gsang ba la gnas te //
T02D1401:35a-6: bzang po nyid du sbyar byas nas //
T02D1401:35a-7: lha yi lus su 'gyur ba dang //
T02D1401:35a-8: grub pa nyid du the tshom med //
T02D1401:35a-9: zlos pa zhes bya ba ni dung gi phreng ba la'o //
T02D1401:35a-10: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni skye ba bdun pa'i dang sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyi'o //
T02D1401:35a-11: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:35a-12: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu bzhi pa'i
T02D1401:35a-15: // / de nas brda zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi brda byas pa'o //
T02D1401:35a-16: dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis shes bar bya'o //
T02D1401:35a-17: dang zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:35a-18: bsam pa gcig pa nyid kyi phyir de mnyes par 'gyur ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1401:35a-19: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:35a-20: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bco lnga pa'i
T02D1401:35a-23: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni rim pa bzhin du'o //
T02D1401:35a-24: gsang ba zhes bya ba ni skal ba med pa'i sems can rnams la mi bstan pa'o //
T02D1401:35a-25: dngos grub che zhes bya ba la sgrub pa po
T02D1401:35a-26: de nyid kyi gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya chen
T02D1401:35a-29: bram ze rnam snang bshad pa ste //
T02D1401:35a-30: rin chen tsand'a l'ir shes bya //
T02D1401:35a-31: gar mkhan dpag med mgon po ste //
T02D1401:35a-32: tshos mkhan don yod rdo rje can //
T02D1401:35a-33: mi bskyod pa yi dombi ste //
T02D1401:35a-34: drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' yi //
T02D1401:35a-35: rgyal rigs su ni shes par bya //
T02D1401:35a-36: bdun pa he ru ka yi ni //
T02D1401:35a-37: sna tshogs rigs 'byung dmangs rigs so //
T02D1401:35a-38: g-yon nas 'gro ba'i bud med gang //
T02D1401:35a-39: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla ste /
T02D1401:35a-40: sgrub pa po'i thabs rjes su mthun pa'i phyir des nan tan du shes par bya'o //
T02D1401:35a-41: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:35a-42: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu drug pa'i
T02D1401:35a-45: // / de nas rnyed dka' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1401:35a-46: chags pa chen po'i rang bzhin nyid ni 'dod chags bral ba la sogs pas rnyed par dka' ba'o //
T02D1401:35b-0: bdud rtsi lnga zhes bya ba la lnga ni sa la sogs @35b pa'o ;
T02D1401:35b-1: / dngos bden pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1401:35b-2: ni chos thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
T02D1401:35b-3: // de nas lnga po rnams kyi bdud rtsi ni stong pa nyid kyi snying po ste /
T02D1401:35b-4: yang dag sbyor bas gcig bsdus pa //
T02D1401:35b-5: snying po gang yin de bde ba //
T02D1401:35b-6: rlung zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems //
T02D1401:35b-7: dbang po kun gyi gtso 'di yin //
T02D1401:35b-8: de yi dbus su yang dag bskyed //
T02D1401:35b-9: yi ge la sogs pa yi gzugs //
T02D1401:35b-10: gzugs can ma dang rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1401:35b-11: l'a m'a dang ni dum skyes te //

T02D1401:35b-16: 'dab ma bzhi yis yang dag mtshan //
T02D1401:35b-17: de dbus dpa' bo chen po ste //
T02D1401:35b-18: phyag brgyad kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02D1401:35b-19: dang po'i sha yis yongs bkang ba //
T02D1401:35b-20: de bzhin gnyis pa'i khrag gis te //
T02D1401:35b-21: lhag ma'i phyag gnyis dbang bskur ba'i //
T02D1401:35b-22: dra ba'i phyag rgya 'dzin par mdzad //
T02D1401:35b-23: lnga pa drug pas lha mo 'khyud //
T02D1401:35b-24: gzhan gyis kha tv'am cang te'u //
T02D1401:35b-26: ston ka'i nam mkha' dri med bzhin //
T02D1401:35b-27: dkar po dmar po sngo dang ljang //
T02D1401:35b-29: gshin rje ma dang skrag byed ma //
T02D1401:35b-30: nags tshal ma dang 'jigs ma dang //
T02D1401:35b-31: kun spyod tshe za ba su ra //
T02D1401:35b-32: brgyad pa phag mor yang dag brjod //
T02D1401:35b-33: gru bzhi pa la sgo dang mtshams //
T02D1401:35b-34: brgyad du rnam par 'gyur zhing 'jigs pa nyid //

T02D1401:35b-36: dang po rgyas 'debs phyag rgya ste //
T02D1401:35b-37: gnyis pa snying dral ba yi rgya //
T02D1401:35b-38: gsum pa rmongs byed phyag rgya ste //
T02D1401:35b-39: de bzhin bzhi pa slong ba'i rgya //
T02D1401:35b-40: lnga pa gar gyi phyag rgya ste //
T02D1401:35b-41: de bzhin drug pa gsod pa'i rgya //
T02D1401:35b-42: bdun pa 'jog par byed ba ste //
T02D1401:35b-43: brgyad pa ldang pa'i phyag rgyar nges //
T02D1401:35b-44: phyag rgya brgyad du bshad pa'o //
T02D1401:35b-45: phyag gi mtshon char yang dag ldan //
T02D1401:35b-46: 'od zer phreng ba du ma las //
T02D1401:35b-47: sangs rgyas tshogs kyi sprin 'phro ba //
T02D1401:35b-48: thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni //
T02D1401:35b-49: rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che //
T02D1401:35b-50: yang na sngon du bstan pa bzhin //
T02D1401:35b-51: 'khor lo gsum po 'od kyis nam mkha' rgyas pa ste //
T02D1401:36a-2: dbus su 'khor lo yang dag bri //
T02D1401:36a-3: ge sar dang ni lte bar ldan //
T02D1401:36a-4: 'dab ma bzhi dang ldan par bshad //
T02D1401:36a-5: kha dog sna tshogs yang dag 'bar //
T02D1401:36a-6: de dbus dpa' bo dgod pa'o //
T02D1401:36a-7: shel ltar dag pa dri ma med //
T02D1401:36a-8: dang po'i zhal ni rnam bzhad cing //
T02D1401:36a-9: chags pa'i lta bas rnam par gzigs //
T02D1401:36a-10: khro gnyer rab tu 'bar ba dang //
T02D1401:36a-11: mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs par mdzad //
T02D1401:36a-12: g-yas kyi zhal ni gdengs pa ste //
T02D1401:36a-13: g-yon pa ngo mtshar che ba nyid //
T02D1401:36a-14: rgya ba zhal 'jigs pa che ba ste //
T02D1401:36a-16: dkar dang dmar dang de bzhin sngo //
T02D1401:36a-17: ljang gu rnams kyi gdong can no //
T02D1401:36a-18: phyag brgyad par ni yang dag bri //
T02D1401:36a-19: rgyan kun 'dzin pa dpal dang ldan //
T02D1401:36a-21: 'jig pa'i dus ltar drag shul che //

T02D1401:36a-25: zhal gcig pa dang phyag gnyis su //
T02D1401:36a-26: lha rnams bzhi po bshad pa ste //
T02D1401:36a-27: shar du rdo rje sems dpa' yin //
T02D1401:36a-28: lho ru rnam snang mdzad du brjod //
T02D1401:36a-29: nub tu don yod rgyal po ste //
T02D1401:36a-30: byang du padma gar dbang ngo ;
T02D1401:36a-31: / kha tv'am thod pa phyag bsnams nas //
T02D1401:36a-32: khrag dang khu ba dag gsol mdzad //
T02D1401:36a-33: 'khor lo'i dbus su he ru ka / sngon bstan mtshon cha bsnams nas bzhugs //
T02D1401:36a-34: gnyis pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad che //
T02D1401:36a-36: de la lugs 'byung lugs bzlog pas //
T02D1401:36a-37: dgod pa nyid du rab tu grags //
T02D1401:36a-38: gzugs can ma dang 'o byed ma //
T02D1401:36a-39: l'a ma yongs 'gyur byis bcas mo //
T02D1401:36a-40: mi ldog lha mo d'i pa mo //
T02D1401:36a-41: brgyad pa rdo rje'i gar dbang brjod //
T02D1401:36a-42: nang gi lha mo'i gzugs brgyad ni //
T02D1401:36a-43: sku mdog dkar la 'bar dang bcas //
T02D1401:36a-44: phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa //
T02D1401:36a-45: khrag gis bkang ba'i thod pa dang //
T02D1401:36a-46: kha tv'am ga ni phyag gis 'dzin //
T02D1401:36a-47: spyan gsum rgyan kun 'bar dang bcas //

T02D1401:36a-49: snying rje dga' ba'i mdzes dang ldan //

T02D1401:36b-0: 'khor lo lha @36b rnams dgod par bshad //

T02D1401:36b-3: gsod byed ma dang ser mo dang //

T02D1401:36b-5: ri khrod nyid dang sgrol ma'o //
T02D1401:36b-6: de dag ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i'o //
T02D1401:36b-7: khro gnyer khams gsum rnam rgyal ma //

T02D1401:36b-10: byi la can dang glang chen lce //
T02D1401:36b-11: de dag ni gsung gi 'khor lo'i'o //
T02D1401:36b-12: ba lang sna dang bzhin bzangs ma //
T02D1401:36b-13: dmar gtum ma dang so sngo bsangs //
T02D1401:36b-14: stobs chen nags tshal dri ldan ma //
T02D1401:36b-15: mdog khra mo dang bde na g-yon ma //

T02D1401:36b-18: snying rjes gdungs shing myos dang ldan //
T02D1401:36b-19: rang ming brjod pa'i sngags la ni //
T02D1401:36b-20: aom dang h'um h'um phat sbyor pas //
T02D1401:36b-21: thugs gsung sku yi dbye ba yis //
T02D1401:36b-22: lha mo rnams ni mdog sngo zhing //
T02D1401:36b-23: zangs gri dang ni thod pa can //
T02D1401:36b-24: gang yang sku mdog dmar lha mo //
T02D1401:36b-25: padma dang ni thod pa can //
T02D1401:36b-26: lha mo sku mdog dkar ba dang //
T02D1401:36b-27: mdung thung dang ni kha tv'am thogs //
T02D1401:36b-28: dka' bzlog nyid dang ts'a mund'i //

T02D1401:36b-32: gang gis kha tv'am thod pa ste //
T02D1401:36b-33: khrag dang khu ba gsol mdzad pa'o //

T02D1401:36b-35: skra grol gcer bur gyur pa yi //
T02D1401:36b-36: snying rje dga' ba'i bde ba che //

T02D1401:36b-42: rigs dang mi rigs min de bzhin //

T02D1401:36b-47: mngon par zhen pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /

T02D1401:36b-51: dung can 'o byed mar gsungs te //

T02D1401:37a-13: sor mo thung zhing yan lag mnyen //
T02D1401:37a-14: sen mo 'jam zhing zangs kyi mdog / bzhin ni rab tu zhi ba ste //
T02D1401:37a-16: zhi ba'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:37a-17: glang po can ma glang po'i dri //
T02D1401:37a-18: mchu 'phyang byin pa sbom ma dang //
T02D1401:37a-19: glang chen myos pa'i stabs su 'gro //
T02D1401:37a-20: sor mo ring zhing lus po ring //
T02D1401:37a-21: nu ma 'phyang zhing skra rtsub la //
T02D1401:37a-22: lte ba mtho zhing nu ma rtsub //
T02D1401:37a-23: mig ni phra zhing sbrang rtsi sred //
T02D1401:37a-24: snyan par smra zhing skad 'dzer ba //
T02D1401:37a-25: 'dod ldan ro smad mchu sbom zhing //
T02D1401:37a-26: rkang mthil mnyam par gnas pa ste //
T02D1401:37a-27: chang la dga' zhing dus rtag tu //
T02D1401:37a-28: nor 'dod glang po can ma ste //
T02D1401:37a-29: rgyas pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya //
T02D1401:37a-30: dung can ma ni dung mdog dang //
T02D1401:37a-31: zhib ma'i gdong can byin pa ring //
T02D1401:37a-32: bya rog skad dang bong bu dri //
T02D1401:37a-33: so sbom sor mo ring ba ste //
T02D1401:37a-34: skra rtsub yan lag 'jam pa dang //
T02D1401:37a-35: lus bong mtho zhing mig chung ma //
T02D1401:37a-36: mgrin pa phra zhing so thag ngan //
T02D1401:37a-37: sna mtho mchan khung sbu yod pa //
T02D1401:37a-38: mchu srab gdugs kyi rnam pa can //
T02D1401:37a-39: dung can ma ni khyim thab gsod //
T02D1401:37a-40: dbang gi las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:37a-41: ri mo can ma rtag tu ni //
T02D1401:37a-42: ri mo la dga' sna tshogs mdog / sna tshogs gzugs can nu ma 'phyang //
T02D1401:37a-43: sen mo mnyan zhing skad chung la //
T02D1401:37a-44: lus bong chung zhing byad kyang chung //
T02D1401:37a-45: sgra ngan bya rog rang bzhin can //
T02D1401:37a-46: bya rog sgra skad sha la dga' //
T02D1401:37a-47: tshig rtsub 'dod pa'i nus dang ldan //
T02D1401:37a-48: nag po'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:37a-49: padma can ni lha yi rigs //
T02D1401:37a-50: glang po can ma gnod sbyin rgyud //
T02D1401:37a-51: dung can ma ni mir shes bya //
T02D1401:37a-52: ri mo can ma yi dags rigs //
T02D1401:37a-53: ba ta pa ya lha yi rigs //
T02D1401:37a-54: gdugs kyi dpung pa mgrin pa ring //
T02D1401:37a-55: so snang ba la mchu snum zhing //
T02D1401:37a-56: mig ni padma ltar dmar ba'i //
T02D1401:37a-57: skye gnas yangs shing dbral ba yi //
T02D1401:37b-0: @37b dbyes che skra snum ser skya'o //
T02D1401:37b-1: lus po ran zhing ring ba yi //
T02D1401:37b-2: sna mtho sna ni rno ba ste //
T02D1401:37b-3: yan lag 'jam zhing lag pa'ang ring //
T02D1401:37b-4: ngang pa'i 'gros can ngang pa'i skad //
T02D1401:37b-5: dri dang me tog 'o ma sred //
T02D1401:37b-6: lhug par gtong zhing lha la gus //
T02D1401:37b-7: bud med dbang phyug rnams kyi gtso //
T02D1401:37b-8: nyung du za zhing nor dang ldan //
T02D1401:37b-9: rgyas pa'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:37b-10: pi la pi ni nu rgyas ma //
T02D1401:37b-11: lus bong mtho zhing byin pa sbom //
T02D1401:37b-12: ngo chen mig ni phra ba ste //
T02D1401:37b-13: rna ba 'phyang zhing skra rtsub pa //
T02D1401:37b-14: bung ba'i skad la mchu 'phyang ma //
T02D1401:37b-15: lus rgyas lto ni mang du za //
T02D1401:37b-16: 'dod pa chung zhing rtag stobs ldan //
T02D1401:37b-17: tshogs pa la dga' dbung pa 'phyang //
T02D1401:37b-18: yan lag rtsub cing skra ring ba //
T02D1401:37b-19: so sna sen mo 'jam pa ste //
T02D1401:37b-20: rkang pa mnyam zhing sna ring la //
T02D1401:37b-21: lto ni bum pa ltar sbom zhing //
T02D1401:37b-22: bum pa'i 'phyang ba la mdzes pa'i bzhin //
T02D1401:37b-23: zhi dang rgyas la'ang sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:37b-24: phur bu ma ni mig g-yo zhing //
T02D1401:37b-25: 'og mig can la gdong srab pa //
T02D1401:37b-26: so snang lus kyi sha srab cing //
T02D1401:37b-28: mgo skya bus pa ltar 'gro zhing //
T02D1401:37b-29: sbur zhing lus bong chung ba ste //
T02D1401:37b-30: lag pa thung zhing nu ma mtho //
T02D1401:37b-31: smin sbom dpral chung byin yang sbom //
T02D1401:37b-32: de yis reg na mi 'tsho ste //
T02D1401:37b-33: nye du rnams ni brlag par byed //
T02D1401:37b-34: nag po'i las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:37b-35: brgyad pa ri dags ma skal bzang //
T02D1401:37b-36: lto ba chung zhing rkang pa chung //
T02D1401:37b-37: ri dags mgrin pa ri dags mig / skra ni phra zhing snum pa ste //
T02D1401:37b-38: so yang sral mchu snum pa //
T02D1401:37b-39: gzugs mdzes thig le lta bu'i byang //
T02D1401:37b-40: reg 'jam sred pa mang du smra //
T02D1401:37b-41: sgra ni bya rog skad lta bu //
T02D1401:37b-42: rtag tu gcer bu dbul ba yin //
T02D1401:37b-43: sems rtsub pa la sdig la dga' //
T02D1401:37b-44: skur 'debs ma de yi dags rigs //
T02D1401:37b-45: dbang gi las la sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:37b-46: 'di brgyad du ni rab tu grags //
T02D1401:37b-47: thod pa dang dgra sta la sogs pa'i mtshan ma brgyad ni /
T02D1401:37b-48: ji ltar bstan pa'i rigs kyi go rims bzhin du
T02D1401:37b-49: gzugs can ma la sogs pa'i phyag dang po'i mtshan
T02D1401:37b-50: ma'o // gzhan gyi kha tv'am ga dang thod pa nas khrag dang khu ba gsol ba'o //
T02D1401:37b-51: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:37b-52: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu bdun pa'i
T02D1401:38a-2: // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1401:38a-3: mkha' 'gro ma yi go 'phang mchog / ces bya ba la mchog ni mang po'i rigs te /
T02D1401:38a-4: mang por 'gyur ba'i rigs rnams so //
T02D1401:38a-6: dam pa'i rigs ni rnam pa brgya //
T02D1401:38a-8: rab tu gnas bas na go 'phang ste //
T02D1401:38a-9: gang gi mtshan nyid gsung ba de nyid kyis yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1401:38a-10: dam tshig ces bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug pa ste /
T02D1401:38a-12: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:38a-13: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bco brgyad pa'i
T02D1401:38a-16: // / de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1401:38a-17: zhes bya ba ni mdog dang mtshan ma'i rjes su'o //
T02D1401:38a-18: l'a ma zhes bya ba ni yid du 'ong ba
T02D1401:38a-19: reg pa la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid
T02D1401:38a-21: yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1401:38a-22: gang gi bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:38a-23: srin mo zhes bya ba ni sbyor ba gcig pa'o //
T02D1401:38a-24: padma'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:38a-25: lag pa gnyis padma skor bar sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1401:38a-26: yang na padma'i phyag rgya ni padma'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D1401:38a-28: langs pa'am ni stan dag la //
T02D1401:38a-29: mdun du skal bzang bzhag nas ni //
T02D1401:38a-30: padma rab tu rgyas par bya //
T02D1401:38a-31: myur du gnyis gnyis sbyor ba yis //
T02D1401:38a-32: mkhas pas rdo rjes rgyas gdab bya //
T02D1401:38a-33: rus sbal gyi phyag rgya ni lag pa gnyis thal mo sbyar ba'o //
T02D1401:38a-34: rus sbal phyag rgya bha gar ni //
T02D1401:38a-35: thal mo brdeg dang ldan reg bya //
T02D1401:38a-36: phyag rgya sngags kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D1401:38a-37: sa yis ma mchu btsir bar byed //
T02D1401:38a-38: mi thub ri dags lpags pa'o //
T02D1401:38a-39: yang na 'jam zhing mtshan nyid bzang //
T02D1401:38a-40: mi thub stan du shes par bya //
T02D1401:38a-41: spyi blugs thod pa zhes brjod de //
T02D1401:38a-42: yang na spyi blugs lus su brjod //
T02D1401:38a-43: lag gnyis mgrin par dam 'khyud nas //
T02D1401:38a-44: ji ltar skyil krung bcas nas 'khyud //
T02D1401:38a-45: ji ltar phyag rgya rtogs 'gyur ba //
T02D1401:38a-46: phyag rgya'i lan du brjod pa yin //
T02D1401:38a-47: tshes bcu bzhi zhes bya ba la sogs pa go sla'o //
T02D1401:38a-48: yang na tshes bcu bzhi'i gnas skabs ji ltar rnyed /
T02D1401:38a-49: padma rnam par rgyas shing 'bar dang ldan //
T02D1401:38b-0: @38b dpal ldan gang gi sems ni gang mnyam pa //
T02D1401:38b-1: de ni padma can gyi mtshan nyid yin //
T02D1401:38b-2: mchu gnyis glo zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:38b-3: mdung zhes bya ba ni ser mo gcig bstan pa'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1401:38b-4: de nas rdo rje skyil krung gis //
T02D1401:38b-5: rang gi rdo rje der gnas pa'o //
T02D1401:38b-6: gar nyid kyang ni bstan par bya //
T02D1401:38b-9: byed pas bsdams pa'i phyag rgya rnams //
T02D1401:38b-10: rab tu bskor ba byas nas ni //
T02D1401:38b-11: glang chen ma dang bde sgrub ma'o //
T02D1401:38b-12: bcu bzhi zhes bya ba ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:38b-13: ci nus pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1401:38b-14: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:38b-15: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bcu dgu pa'i
T02D1401:38b-18: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1401:38b-19: lag pa g-yon gyi brda rnams te //
T02D1401:38b-20: zhes bya ba la brda rnams kyi gnyis ka'i rang
T02D1401:38b-21: bzhin gcig tu gyur nas ming po dang sring mo
T02D1401:38b-22: ltar shin tu gdung ba'i dpang du gyur nas bsgom
T02D1401:38b-23: pa thams cad byed do zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1401:38b-24: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:38b-25: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu pa'i
T02D1401:38b-28: // / de nas gsang ba chen po ni //
T02D1401:38b-29: mtshan nyid nga yis bshad par bya //
T02D1401:38b-30: zhes bya ba la nga yis zhes bya ba ni rdo rje 'chang bas te /
T02D1401:38b-31: snying rje chen po'i dbang gis rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1401:38b-32: kyi thabs gang gis sgrub po 'grub par 'gyur ba
T02D1401:38b-33: de nyid ni gsang ba chen po'i mtshan nyid de
T02D1401:38b-34: // nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro ;
T02D1401:38b-35: / bud gang spyi gtsug reg byed pa //
T02D1401:38b-36: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1401:38b-37: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:38b-38: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa
T02D1401:38b-39: gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:38b-41: // / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa //
T02D1401:38b-42: yan lag phyag rgya'i khyad par ni //
T02D1401:38b-43: zhes bya ba ni 'dir gsang ba chen po'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1401:38b-44: gzhan zhes bya ba ni dam pa ste /
T02D1401:38b-45: gang gis rnal 'byor ma rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1401:38b-46: khyad par zhes bya ba la lag pa'i spyi las khyad par ni sor mo rnams so //
T02D1401:39a-1: pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni sgra ji bzhin pa'o //
T02D1401:39a-2: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:39a-3: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa
T02D1401:39a-4: gnyis pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:39a-6: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1401:39a-7: sgra ji bzhin pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1401:39a-8: gzhir ni sa gzhi byas nas su //
T02D1401:39a-9: zhes bya ba ni stan las ldang ba'o //
T02D1401:39a-10: mchod ces bya ba ni dam por 'khyud dang 'o bya ba'o //
T02D1401:39a-11: smin ma g-yo zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:39a-12: cung zad ngo tsha ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:39a-13: rnal 'gyur bskor ba zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:39a-14: phul du byung ba'i bde ba sgrub pa'i don gyis
T02D1401:39a-15: bskor ba ni byang chub kyi sems la yongs su
T02D1401:39a-16: bskor ba ste / srog dang rtsol ba sdom pa'i
T02D1401:39a-17: 'khrul 'khor gyis yang dag par phul du byung ba'i
T02D1401:39a-18: bde ba chen po'i lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du 'bar
T02D1401:39a-19: bas stong pa dbus su chud pa'i sngags pas 'jig
T02D1401:39a-20: rten gsum po dang lhan cig tu 'dre ba ste
T02D1401:39a-21: bskor ba ste / / sa dang chu dang rlung nyid dang //
T02D1401:39a-22: me dang nam mkha' nyid dang ni //
T02D1401:39a-23: bdag dang gzhan du rtag tshor dang //
T02D1401:39a-24: skad cig de la kun mi dmigs //
T02D1401:39a-26: bdag gis bde ba nyams su myong //
T02D1401:39a-28: khyim du zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:39a-30: bha ga'i dbus chung rdo rje ni //
T02D1401:39a-31: shin tu stong par bsgoms pa ni //
T02D1401:39a-32: thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1401:39a-33: ma rig la sogs glo bung ba //
T02D1401:39a-34: rtog pa'i nyes pa rtog las byung //
T02D1401:39a-35: rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam dag pa //
T02D1401:39a-36: sems ni me long bzhin du blta //
T02D1401:39a-37: chos rnams gzugs brnyan lta bu ste //
T02D1401:39a-38: gsal zhing dag pa nam mkha' mtshungs //
T02D1401:39a-39: ral gri nyon mongs gcod byed pa //
T02D1401:39a-40: sems can don byed rno ba'o //
T02D1401:39a-41: bsod nams kyis 'degs rgyal mtshan bzhin //
T02D1401:39a-42: mdung thung nyon mongs 'bigs byed pas //
T02D1401:39a-43: sems ni rtse gcig pa nyid do //
T02D1401:39a-44: de nyid me rtse rnal 'byor pas //
T02D1401:39a-45: kha sbyar bde ba thob pa'o //
T02D1401:39a-46: mtshan ma'i cha byad gsal zhes bya //
T02D1401:39a-47: zhes bya ba ni rdo rje dang 'khor lo dang
T02D1401:39a-48: rin po che dang padma dang ral gri dang sna
T02D1401:39a-49: tshogs rdo rje rnams ni rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D1401:39a-50: mdung thung rnams ji lta ba ste /
T02D1401:39a-51: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dbye bas
T02D1401:39b-0: rdo rje dang rgyal mtshan dang @39b ral gri dang
T02D1401:39b-1: mdung thung ni nas kyi 'bru tshad tsam mo //
T02D1401:39b-2: 'khor lo dang rin po che dang padma dang sna
T02D1401:39b-3: tshogs rdo rje rnams ni sran tsa na ka'i tshad
T02D1401:39b-4: tsam ste / mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i rim
T02D1401:39b-5: pas ji lta ba bzhin rang rang gi mtshan ma
T02D1401:39b-6: kha dog lnga po'i nang du dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor
T02D1401:39b-8: sems brtan pa phra mo'i rnal 'byor sgom pa las /
T02D1401:39b-9: rnal 'byor pas phyag rgya'i dngos grub yid kyi rang bzhin bzang po 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:39b-10: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:39b-11: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa
T02D1401:39b-12: gsum pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:39b-14: // / de nas gzhan yang brda yi skad //
T02D1401:39b-15: ces bya ba la yul sna tshogs kyi khyad par
T02D1401:39b-16: gyi skad ni brda zhes bya ba kla klo ste
T02D1401:39b-17: / rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1401:39b-18: pro tam gi zhes bya ba ni gsang por smra ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1401:39b-19: sgra ji bzhin pa nyid kyis na go sla ba ste /
T02D1401:39b-20: gang zhig brda yi skad rnams shes pa ni //
T02D1401:39b-21: 'dir rnal 'byor pa nyid du the tshom med do //
T02D1401:39b-22: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:39b-23: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa
T02D1401:39b-24: bzhi pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /

T02D1401:39b-27: sba bya brgyad mtha' sbyar byas te //
T02D1401:39b-28: zhes bya ba la brgyad kyi mtha' ni yi ge ha ste /
T02D1401:39b-29: yi ge au dang thig ler bcas pa'o //
T02D1401:39b-30: aom na mo bha ga wa ti b'i re sh'a ya /
T02D1401:39b-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:39b-32: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub

T02D1401:39b-34: lnga pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:39b-36: // / de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i bdag nyid chen po'o //
T02D1401:39b-37: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yis //
T02D1401:39b-38: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor gyi bslab pa'i rim pa las ma 'das pa'o //
T02D1401:39b-39: 'og dang steng gi dngos grub ste //
T02D1401:39b-40: zhes bya ba la 'og ni sa 'og la sogs pa gang ci yod pa'o //
T02D1401:39b-41: steng gis zhes bya ba ni steng gi dngos grub ste phyag rgya chen po'o //
T02D1401:39b-42: pho nya dang 'dra bar gyur pas na pho nya
T02D1401:39b-43: ste byang chub pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad
T02D1401:39b-44: du nges shing thams cad du gnyis su med pa'i
T02D1401:39b-45: dga' ba'i rang bzhin gyis legs par gnas pa'i pho
T02D1401:40a-1: nya ma zhes bya ba ni spyod pa'i mchog lhan cig tu spyod pa'o //
T02D1401:40a-2: kun 'gro zhes bya ba ni skal ba ldan pa'i
T02D1401:40a-3: sems can rnams kyi don bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir
T02D1401:40a-4: 'o bya ba dang rab tu 'khyud pa la sogs
T02D1401:40a-5: pa thams cad ster bas so //
T02D1401:40a-6: rnal 'byor gnas kyi khyad par nyid //
T02D1401:40a-8: gnas ni sa ru rab tu bshad //
T02D1401:40a-10: gnyis med dga' ba'i rang bzhin rgyal //
T02D1401:40a-11: bde chen gang du gnas bas na //

T02D1401:44a-3: rnal 'byor gnas rnams nges bstan zhing //

T02D1401:46b-6: sku mdog dkar mo phyag bzhin //
T02D1401:46b-7: tshangs pa'i sku dang thong ba nyid //
T02D1401:46b-8: gzhu dang mda' ni de bzhin no //
T02D1401:46b-9: srin por gam gis tshogs bdag ma //
T02D1401:46b-10: mdog ljang ma'o phyag bzhi na //
T02D1401:46b-11: mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa'i phyag / bgrang phreng dang ni la du'o //
T02D1401:46b-12: rlung du bam gyis khyab 'jug ma //
T02D1401:46b-13: mdog sngon ma la phyag bzhin //
T02D1401:46b-14: chang dang chu yi thod pa dang //
T02D1401:46b-15: zhags pa kha tv'am de bzhin gzhan //
T02D1401:46b-16: dbang ldan ai yig las byung ma //
T02D1401:46b-17: dbang mo mdog ser phyag bzhi na //
T02D1401:46b-18: rdo rje mdung thung thod pa dang //
T02D1401:46b-19: sdigs mdzub dang ni zhags pa nyid //
T02D1401:46b-20: lha mo thams cad gyen skra 'bar //
T02D1401:46b-21: sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02D1401:46b-22: mi ro'i stan bzhugs spyan gsum ma //
T02D1401:46b-23: stag gi lpags pas rked pa dkris //
T02D1401:46b-25: dbang ldan yam gis gnod sbyin ni //
T02D1401:46b-26: khyu mchog stan la bzhugs pa ste //
T02D1401:46b-27: mdog dkar ba la phyag bzhi na //
T02D1401:46b-28: thod pa dang ni mdud rtse gsum //
T02D1401:46b-29: thal mo sbyar la gzhol ba'o //
T02D1401:46b-30: shar du ai skyes brgya byin ni //
T02D1401:46b-31: glang po'i stan la bzhugs pa ste //
T02D1401:46b-32: mdog ser phyag ni bzhi pa la //
T02D1401:46b-33: rdo rje dang ni thod pa'i phyag / phyag gi thal mo sbyar bar mdzad //
T02D1401:46b-34: me mtshams bam gyis drang srong ni //
T02D1401:46b-35: mdog dmar phyag bzhi ra skyes zhon //
T02D1401:46b-36: me thab dang ni thod pa dang //
T02D1401:46b-37: skrag pas thal mo sbyor la brtson //
T02D1401:46b-38: lho ru yam gis nyi ma'i bu //
T02D1401:46b-39: mdog sngo phyag bzhi ma he zhon //
T02D1401:46b-40: dbyug pa thod pa bsnams pa dang //
T02D1401:46b-41: skrag pas thal mo sbyar la gzhol //
T02D1401:46b-42: bden bral ram gyis srin po ni //
T02D1401:46b-43: mdog ljang phyag bzhi mi ro zhon //
T02D1401:46b-44: ral gri dang ni thong ba thogs //
T02D1401:46b-45: skrag pas thal mo sbyor la brtson //
T02D1401:46b-46: nub tu bam gyis chu yi bdag / mdog dkar phyag bzhi chu srin stan //
T02D1401:46b-47: zhags pa dang ni thod pa thogs //
T02D1401:46b-48: skrag pas thal mo sbyor la gzhol //
T02D1401:46b-49: rlung mtshams yam gis rlung gi bdag / dud kha phyag bzhi ri dags zhon //
T02D1401:46b-50: ba dan dang ni thod pa nyid //
T02D1401:46b-51: de bzhin thal mo sbyor la brtson //
T02D1401:46b-52: byang du kum gis ku be ra //
T02D1401:47a-2: rin po che dang thod pa 'dzin //
T02D1401:47a-3: thal mo sbyar la gzhol bar mdzad //
T02D1401:47a-4: rim pa bzhi pa la ni /
T02D1401:47a-5: shar du nyi ma mdog dmar ba //
T02D1401:47a-7: thal mo sbyor la brtson par mdzad //
T02D1401:47a-8: rta bdun ldan pa'i shing rta zhon //
T02D1401:47a-9: me mtshams sam gis pa bsangs //
T02D1401:47a-10: kha dog dkar po 'bar ba ste //
T02D1401:47a-11: g-yon pa pad stengs me nor bu //
T02D1401:47a-12: g-yas pa de bzhin thod pa ste //
T02D1401:47a-13: thal sbyar ba la ra skyes zhon //
T02D1401:47a-14: lho ru aam gis mig dmar ni //
T02D1401:47a-15: mdog dmar ro yi gdan la gnas //
T02D1401:47a-16: ral gri dang ni zhags pa 'dzin //
T02D1401:47a-17: thal mo sbyor la gzhol bar byed //
T02D1401:47a-18: srin por ram gyis sgra gcan 'dzin //
T02D1401:47a-19: g-yas pa nyi ma g-yon zla ba //
T02D1401:47a-20: dud kha thal mo sbyar byas la //
T02D1401:47a-21: lus phyed rang gi stan la gnas //
T02D1401:47a-22: nub tu sam gis spen pa sngo //
T02D1401:47a-23: phyag gnyis thod pa thogs pa dang //
T02D1401:47a-24: thal mo sbyar ba byas pa'i phyag / me yi thab kyi steng du ni ;
T02D1401:47a-26: rlung du sham gis zla ba dkar //
T02D1401:47a-27: g-yon du padma zla nor bu //
T02D1401:47a-28: g-yas pa padma'i steng du zla //
T02D1401:47a-29: thal mo sbyar byas ngang pa zhon //
T02D1401:47a-30: byang du bam gis phur bu ser //
T02D1401:47a-31: g-yon du ril ba spyi blugs te //
T02D1401:47a-32: g-yas su de bzhin thod pa'o //
T02D1401:47a-33: thal sbyar rin chen stan la gnas //
T02D1401:47a-34: dbang ldan bum gyis gza' lag dkar //
T02D1401:47a-35: g-yas pa na ni rin chen mda' //
T02D1401:47a-36: g-yon pa na ni thod pa'o //
T02D1401:47a-37: thal sbyar bum pa'i stan la gnas //
T02D1401:47a-38: kam gis rgyal mtshan sprul gzugs dmar //
T02D1401:47a-39: phyag gnyis ral gri thal sbyar ba //
T02D1401:47a-40: de bzhin rgyu skar rnams bud med kyi gzugs can te //
T02D1401:47a-43: smin drug ni sngo bsangs so //
T02D1401:47a-57: lha mtshams ni sngo bsangs so //
T02D1401:47b-0: byi bzhin ni sngo bsangs @47b so ;
T02D1401:47b-6: thams cad ni gser gyi stod g-yogs can la thal mo sbyar bar bsam mo //
T02D1401:47b-8: shar sgor bam las tshangs pa ni //
T02D1401:47b-9: mdog dkar zhal bzhi phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02D1401:47b-10: thod pa dang ni bgrang phreng dang //
T02D1401:47b-11: spyi blugs dang ni padma nyid //
T02D1401:47b-12: byang sgor bim las skyes pa yi //
T02D1401:47b-13: khyab 'jug ces bya phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1401:47b-14: mdung dang de bzhin 'khor lo dang //
T02D1401:47b-15: thod pa nyid dang dbyug pa'o //
T02D1401:47b-16: nub tu sam las drag po ni //
T02D1401:47b-17: dud pa'i mdog la phyag bzhi pa //
T02D1401:47b-18: mdung rtse gsum dang thod pa nyid //
T02D1401:47b-19: de bzhin zhags pa bgrang phreng 'dzin //
T02D1401:47b-20: lho ru kam las skem byed ni //
T02D1401:47b-21: mdog ser phyag ni bzhi pa la //
T02D1401:47b-22: mdung thung dbyug pa thod pa dang //
T02D1401:47b-24: de dag kun kyang bu dang bu mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dang bcas shing /
T02D1401:47b-25: sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1401:47b-26: yang dkyil 'khor chen po'i de nyid kyi sa'i dbus su /
T02D1401:47b-27: shar du ru dra nag po ste //
T02D1401:47b-28: byang du ru dra chen po'o //
T02D1401:47b-29: nub tu lha sbyin zhes bya ba //
T02D1401:47b-30: lho ru de bzhin nag po'o //
T02D1401:47b-31: dbang ldan du ni gtsigs pa ste //
T02D1401:47b-32: me mtshams su ni mi sdug pa'o ;
T02D1401:47b-33: / bden bral dga' las 'das pa ste //
T02D1401:47b-34: rlung mtshams su ni log 'dren no //
T02D1401:47b-35: de kun zhal gcig spyan gsum pa //
T02D1401:47b-36: phyag bzhi gri dang thod pa dang //
T02D1401:47b-37: kha tv'am mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag / gnag dang ser dang dmar dang ljang //
T02D1401:47b-38: mtshams na gnas pa rnams ni yid 'phrog pa gzugs gnyis pa'o //
T02D1401:47b-39: ru dra nag po'i mdun du ni ts'a mund'i'o //
T02D1401:47b-42: g-yas su dka' bzlog lha mo'o //
T02D1401:47b-43: de dag ni mkha' 'gro ma'i gdong can phyag gnyis mchod pa lngas gang ba'i thod pa bsnams pa'o //
T02D1401:47b-44: ru dra chen po'i mdun du ni //
T02D1401:47b-48: gzhan gyis mi thub ma rnams te /
T02D1401:47b-49: bca' ba dang btung ba 'dzin pa /
T02D1401:47b-51: nub tu lha sbyin gyi btsun mo /
T02D1401:48a-1: mdog can phyag na mchod pa lngas bkang ba'o //
T02D1401:48a-2: lho ru nag po'i btsun mo dbang po dang /
T02D1401:48a-3: zla ba mo dang drag mo dang ldan ma rnams te /
T02D1401:48a-4: gzugs can ma'i mdog can phyag na bza' btung thogs pa'o //
T02D1401:48a-5: dbang ldan du ni gtsigs pa'i btsun mo 'phyang ma dang /
T02D1401:48a-9: ts'a mund'i'i mdog can phyag na bza' btung thogs pa'o //
T02D1401:48a-10: me mtshams su ni mi sdug pa'i gzugs dang /
T02D1401:48a-11: grong khyer du gnas pa'i rnal 'byor ma dang /
T02D1401:48a-12: drag po'i gzugs can ma dang /
T02D1401:48a-14: dbang mo'i mdog can sngon du bstan ba bzhin du phyag na ston mo thogs pa /
T02D1401:48a-15: bden bral du dga' ba las 'das pa'i chung ma mche ba'i gzugs dang /
T02D1401:48a-16: gtsigs ma dang thod pa'i phreng ba can ma gshin rje'i kha tv'am ga 'phyar ba'o //
T02D1401:48a-17: nag mo bzang ba'i mdog can bza' ba dang btung ba lag na thogs pa'o //
T02D1401:48a-18: rlung du log 'dren gyi chung ma lag na ral gri dang dgra sta ma dang /
T02D1401:48a-19: lag na rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1401:48a-20: lag na padma can ma rnams te /
T02D1401:48a-21: rgyal ma la sogs pa'i mdog can lag na bza' ba dang btung ba la sogs pa thogs pa'o //
T02D1401:48a-22: yang shar phyogs kyi rta babs kyi mdun gyi dur
T02D1401:48a-23: khrod du 'jigs byed thod phreng can dang srin po
T02D1401:48a-24: dang tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang dril rna ste /
T02D1401:48a-25: bzhi po de dag chung ma dang bcas shing mkha' 'gro ma'i mdog can no //
T02D1401:48a-26: byang gi dur khrod du ni gtum pa'i dbang phyug dang /
T02D1401:48a-27: dza yig rngam dang rked pa'i ru dra dang /
T02D1401:48a-28: sbom pa'i dbang phyug chung ma dang bcas pa l'a ma'i mdog can no //
T02D1401:48a-29: nub phyogs kyi dur khrod du da ma ra dang
T02D1401:48a-30: 'dam ka dang pheg dang 'jigs su rung ba rnams
T02D1401:48a-31: chung ma dang bcas pa khanda ro h'a'i mdog can
T02D1401:48a-32: no // lho phyogs kyi dur khrod du ni sku'i dbang phyug dang /
T02D1401:48a-33: sgra chen dang mche ba gtsigs pa dang mda' 'dzin
T02D1401:48a-34: zhes bya ba rnams chung ma dang bcas pa gzugs
T02D1401:48a-36: de dag thams cad kyang zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa kha tv'am ga dang thod pa dang /
T02D1401:48a-37: mdung rtse gsum pa dang lha mo la 'khyud pa ste /
T02D1401:48a-38: sdar bstan pa'i shing brgyad la yang gnas par blta bar bya'o //
T02D1401:48b-0: de dag thams cad 'jig rten gsum na grub pa @48b dang rig pa 'dzin pa dang /
T02D1401:48b-1: lha'i bu mo dang mi la sogs pa rnams kyis phyogs bzhin kun du mdun du bdar ba /
T02D1401:48b-2: yi dags sha za la sogs pa 'du ba /
T02D1401:48b-3: ki li ki li'i sgra sgrogs par yid kyis blta bar bya zhing //
T02D1401:48b-4: sgrub pa po la yang mchog ster bas mngon par phyogs pa /
T02D1401:48b-5: rang gi ming gi yi ge snying gar dgod cing lus ngag yid gsum /
T02D1401:48b-6: aom a'a: h'um dang bcas pas rigs gsum las byung ba'o //
T02D1401:48b-7: de nas cho ga bzhin du bsang gtor dang zhabs
T02D1401:48b-8: bsil byin la dam tshig dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas
T02D1401:48b-9: / rang gi 'khor lo la kha zas dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1401:48b-10: phyag 'tshal dbus su aa dang ldan //
T02D1401:48b-11: yi ge h'um byas sbar ba yis //
T02D1401:48b-12: yi ge hr'i: las me 'bar ba //
T02D1401:48b-13: ji srid bya ba rdzogs bar du //
T02D1401:48b-14: rdo rje thal mo gyen kha dbye //
T02D1401:48b-15: gsang sngags 'di ni brjod par bya //
T02D1401:48b-16: kha kha kh'a hi la sogs pa'i sngags kyis me
T02D1401:48b-17: tog dang bdug pa dang byug pa la sogs pas
T02D1401:48b-18: mchod do // de nas sems yang dag par mnyes nas mchog ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:48b-19: gtso bor bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs la rnam par gnas par bsam mo //
T02D1401:48b-20: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:48b-21: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa
T02D1401:48b-22: bdun pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:48b-25: // / de nas mchod pa rnam dag bdag / ces bya ba la /
T02D1401:48b-26: rnam dag ces bya ba ni dngos po thams cad las so so ma yin pa nyid de /
T02D1401:48b-27: gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'o //
T02D1401:48b-28: de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi sku'o //
T02D1401:48b-29: de las nges par byung ba ni dpa' bo'o zhes
T02D1401:48b-30: bya ba la srid pa dang zhi ba dag la
T02D1401:48b-31: mi gnas pa'i phyir te longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'o
T02D1401:48b-32: // de yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rjes su spyod pa ste /
T02D1401:48b-33: tshogs ma lus pa bsags pa las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:48b-34: sangs rgyas kyi tshogs spros nas sems can gyi don
T02D1401:48b-35: byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya
T02D1401:48b-36: ba ste / de'i ngo bo nyid kyi bdag nyid
T02D1401:48b-37: kyis bdag nyid mchod par bya ba ni rang gi
T02D1401:48b-38: lha'i sbyor ba yis ji ltar sbyor bas so //
T02D1401:48b-39: spun dang sdug pa'ang mchod par bya ste zhes bya
T02D1401:48b-40: ba ni lhan cig tu mnyam pa dang bsam pa
T02D1401:48b-41: dag pa dang nges par sbyor ba dang gcig tu
T02D1401:49a-1: 'ang gi sgras ni rnal 'byor ma nges par bzung ste /
T02D1401:49a-2: gang gi phyir de rnams ma gtogs par de'i phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:49a-3: de nyid kyis na nges par gnas //
T02D1401:49a-5: lha mo dang 'dus ba'i sbyor bas so //
T02D1401:49a-6: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni chang ngo //
T02D1401:49a-7: yang na zhi ba'i bde ba'o //
T02D1401:49a-8: rtag tu shar ba 'od gsal ba //
T02D1401:49a-9: snying ga'i padmar nges brten nas //
T02D1401:49a-11: sems nyid bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02D1401:49a-13: spun dang bu dang lhan cig tu //
T02D1401:49a-14: zhes bya ba la brtse gdung gi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par bya ste /
T02D1401:49a-15: sngags dang phyag rgya mchod cing dkyil 'khor dang tshogs
T02D1401:49a-16: kyi 'khor lo bstan pa dang rdo rje'i glu yang
T02D1401:49a-17: thos pas dam tshig la skur zhing slob dpon la
T02D1401:49a-18: smod pa dang / sems can thams cad sun 'byin
T02D1401:49a-19: par byed pa de'i phyir na rdo rje slob dpon
T02D1401:49a-20: gyi bu dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur zhing /
T02D1401:49a-21: de'i 'dus pa'i sems can gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems dri ma can du 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:49a-22: de rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zas la spyad par bya ba zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1401:49a-24: khyad par du ji lta bu zhe na /
T02D1401:49a-25: gang gi phyir snying rje'i dbang gis byang chub tu
T02D1401:49a-26: sems bskyed pa ji lta ba de ltar de rnams
T02D1401:49a-27: la yang bstan par mi bya ste /
T02D1401:49a-28: dad pa'i dbang gis de rnams kyi byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gzhan nyid du 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:49a-29: gsang sngags su la'ang sbyin mi bya //
T02D1401:49a-30: zhes bya ba ni sems can yongs su ma smin pa rnams la'o //
T02D1401:49a-31: sbyin par bya zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:49a-33: pho nya zhes bya ba la sogs pa la lam dang 'dra bas lam ste /
T02D1401:49a-35: de yang mtha' yas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang skye ba spyong ba ste /
T02D1401:49a-36: nyon mongs pa glo bur ba nyid kyi phyir nam
T02D1401:49a-37: mkha' la sprin dang khug rna dang du ba dang
T02D1401:49a-38: 'khrul pa tsam zhig bsal bas tshe 'di nyid la
T02D1401:49a-40: de bas na de spangs nas rnal 'byor gzhan la brten par ni /
T02D1401:49a-41: nyan thos kyi spyod pa dang /
T02D1401:49a-42: kri ya dang spyod pa'i rgyud la sogs pa rnams
T02D1401:49a-43: su ji skad bshad pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'dod
T02D1401:49a-44: pa de dag rmongs pas dngos grub med cing bde
T02D1401:49b-1: / rgyal srid shor ba'i skyes bu bzhin //
T02D1401:49b-2: dad pa'i nor dang phral phyir ro //
T02D1401:49b-3: zhes pa ni zhen pa'i lta bas blta ba'o //
T02D1401:49b-4: thar pa ni grol ba ste /
T02D1401:49b-5: pho nya la zhen pa des grol ba'o //
T02D1401:49b-7: bde ba yis kyang longs spyod bya //
T02D1401:49b-9: bde ba thams cad ni bha ga las byung ba'i bdud rtsi nyid du nges pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:49b-10: bsnyen bkur kho na bya ba min //
T02D1401:49b-12: bsnyen bkur gyi ni don can min //
T02D1401:49b-13: chags pas 'dus pa dga' ba ste //
T02D1401:49b-14: de phyir 'khyud par rab tu bya //
T02D1401:49b-15: rjes su chags dang ldan pas thob //
T02D1401:49b-16: gzhan du bde bar mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:49b-17: skye gnas dman pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rdo rje'i rigs la sogs pa'o //
T02D1401:49b-18: 'ang gi sgras ni bram ze mchog la sogs pa bsdu ba'o //
T02D1401:49b-19: de rnams kyang ma dang srid mo la sogs pa ltar shin tu gdung ba'i dbang gis so //
T02D1401:49b-20: dka' thub bdag nyid chen po yis //
T02D1401:49b-21: gang zhig rtag tu mchod byed pa //
T02D1401:49b-22: bshung zhing dman pa'i sems kyis ni //
T02D1401:49b-23: dka' thub nges par zad par 'gyur //
T02D1401:49b-24: 'khor lo de bzhin grub pa yis //
T02D1401:49b-25: zhes bya ba ni gang gi dam tshig dang sdom
T02D1401:49b-26: pa nyams pa rnams kyi yang phyis blang ba la
T02D1401:49b-29: dam tshig sdom pa bla na med //
T02D1401:49b-30: nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus gnas par //
T02D1401:49b-31: dam tshig dkyil 'khor bla na med //
T02D1401:49b-32: de yi dbus su 'khor lo che //
T02D1401:49b-33: dkyil 'khor lnga yis brgyan pa ni //
T02D1401:49b-34: dbus su nyi stan yi dags la //
T02D1401:49b-35: a'i li k'a lir yang dag ldan //
T02D1401:49b-36: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshon 'chang zhing //
T02D1401:49b-37: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan //
T02D1401:49b-38: byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig byas nas //
T02D1401:49b-39: yi ge hi las yang dag byung //
T02D1401:49b-41: spyan gsum mche ba gtsigs pa'o //
T02D1401:49b-42: ljags 'dril khro dang bcas bzhad zhal //
T02D1401:49b-43: lha chen thams cad gsol mdzad pa //
T02D1401:49b-44: bskal pa'i me ltar yang dag 'khrug / ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan zhing //
T02D1401:49b-45: 'jigs byed pags pas rked pa dkris //
T02D1401:49b-46: g-yas brkyang zhabs kyis legs bzhugs pas //
T02D1401:49b-47: 'jigs byed dus mtshan kun du mnan //
T02D1401:49b-48: dpral bar rdo rje phreng ba dang //
T02D1401:50a-0: @50a * // sna tshogs rdo rje zla phyed brgyan //
T02D1401:50a-1: sku la rgyan drug rgyan du byas //
T02D1401:50a-2: phyag drug zhal na lnga pa ste //
T02D1401:50a-3: sna tshogs nyams dang ro mchog ldan //
T02D1401:50a-4: sngo dang ser dang de bzhin dmar //
T02D1401:50a-5: ljang dang steng dkar zhi ba'o //
T02D1401:50a-6: shi ba'ang gso bar byed pa'i mchog / sdang ba thams cad nges gnas pa'i //
T02D1401:50a-7: rdo rje dril bu snyoms zhugs shing //
T02D1401:50a-8: phag mo'i sku la yang dag 'khyud //
T02D1401:50a-9: sa srungs pags pa na bza' 'dzin //
T02D1401:50a-10: steng du gdugs dkar gzung ba ste //
T02D1401:50a-11: thod pa dang ni kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02D1401:50a-12: drug pa na ni cang te'u'o //
T02D1401:50a-13: de dang 'dra ba'i phag mo yi //
T02D1401:50a-14: dbu skra grol zhing gcer bu la //
T02D1401:50a-15: mi rus rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02D1401:50a-16: 'on kyang pags pa'i gos kyi gnas su gri dang tshangs pa'i mgo dgod par bya'o //
T02D1401:50a-17: de shar sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro ste //
T02D1401:50a-18: de bzhin byang du las mkha' 'gro //
T02D1401:50a-19: nub tu chos kyi mkha' 'gro ste //
T02D1401:50a-20: lho ru rin chen mkha' 'gro nyid //
T02D1401:50a-21: dkar dang sngo dang dmar po dang //
T02D1401:50a-22: ljang gu dang steng dmar ser po //
T02D1401:50a-23: 'khor lo dang dril bus snyoms par 'jug cing phyag
T02D1401:50a-24: gnyis kyis tshangs pa'i pags pa'i gos bsnams pa dang
T02D1401:50a-25: gzhan gyis thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang cang
T02D1401:50a-26: te'u'o // g-yas brkyang pas tshangs pa khyo shug mnan pa'o //
T02D1401:50a-27: yang ljang gu dang ser po dang dmar po dang sngon po dang /
T02D1401:50a-28: de bzhin du lnga pa steng ma dkar po ste /
T02D1401:50a-29: sna tshogs rdo rje dang dril bus snyoms par 'jug pa /
T02D1401:50a-30: tshogs kyi bdag po'i pags pa bsnams pa dang /
T02D1401:50a-32: kha tv'am ga dang cang te'u bsnams pa'o //
T02D1401:50a-33: g-yas brkyang gi gnas pas tshogs kyi bdag po khyo shug mnan pas 'jigs shing myos pa'o //
T02D1401:50a-34: yang dmar po dang sngon po dang ser po dang ljang gu dang steng ma dkar po ste /
T02D1401:50a-35: padma dang dril bus snyoms par 'jug cing 'dod pa'i lha'i pags pa dral ba bsnams pa dang /
T02D1401:50a-39: g-yas brkyang pa'i gnas pas 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bus khyo shug mnan pa'o //
T02D1401:50a-40: yang ser po dang sngon po dang dmar po dang
T02D1401:50a-41: ljang gu dang de bzhin du steng ma dkar po
T02D1401:50b-0: ste / rin po che dang dril bus snyoms @50b
T02D1401:50b-1: par 'jug cing dbang po dral ba'i pags pa bsnams
T02D1401:50b-2: pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang cang
T02D1401:50b-3: ste / te'u'o // g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas dbang po khyo shug mnan pa ste /
T02D1401:50b-4: kun kyang spyan gsum pa phyag drug pa ral pa'i cod pan dar gyis bcings pa /
T02D1401:50b-5: me mtshams dang bden bral dang ;
T02D1401:50b-6: rlung mtshams dang dbang ldan gyi mtshams rnams su ni sangs rgyas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang /
T02D1401:50b-9: las kyi mkha' 'gro ma rnams te /
T02D1401:50b-10: dkar po dang sngon po dang dmar po'o //
T02D1401:50b-11: yang sngon po dang dkar po dang ser po'o //
T02D1401:50b-12: yang dmar po dang sngon po dang ser po'o //
T02D1401:50b-13: yang ljang gu dang sngon po dang ser po ste /
T02D1401:50b-14: kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1401:50b-15: spyan gsum gcer bu ska grol la //
T02D1401:50b-16: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1401:50b-17: nga rgyal bcas shing gar mdzad pa //
T02D1401:50b-18: snying rje chags pa'i dga' dang ldan //
T02D1401:50b-19: 'khor lo'i mda' dang rdo rje'i mda' //
T02D1401:50b-20: padma'i mda' dang rin chen mda' //
T02D1401:50b-21: rang gi mtshan mas mtshan ma'i mda' //
T02D1401:50b-22: g-yon pa thams cad na gzhu'o //
T02D1401:50b-23: thod pa kha tv'am ga dang da ma du'o //
T02D1401:50b-24: gzhan gyis zhags pa dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1401:50b-25: shin tu zlum zhing re mig dgu //
T02D1401:50b-26: phyi rol gru bzhi sgo bzhir ldan //
T02D1401:50b-27: de la shar sgor ni gzugs mang ngo //
T02D1401:50b-28: byang du ni gzugs bzang ngo //
T02D1401:50b-29: nub tu ni rdo rje dbyig pa can no //
T02D1401:50b-30: lhor ni rdo rje snang ba'o //
T02D1401:50b-31: kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1401:50b-32: rgyan rnams kun gyis bklubs pa ste //
T02D1401:50b-33: sngon bstan sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro sogs //
T02D1401:50b-34: rim bzhin mtshan ma thogs pa'o //
T02D1401:50b-35: de yi phyi rol yul du yang //
T02D1401:50b-36: gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1401:50b-37: rta babs bzhi yis brgyan pa dang /
T02D1401:50b-38: dang dang me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba ste /
T02D1401:50b-39: de la lha'i snam bu gru bzhi pa'i me'i mtshams
T02D1401:50b-40: la sogs pa'i g-yon skor gyis dgod par bya ba
T02D1401:50b-41: ni rdo rje'i kha dang drag po'i kha dang /
T02D1401:50b-42: rdo rje phag sna ma dang /
T02D1401:50b-44: rdo rje pho nya mo dang /
T02D1401:50b-46: rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang /
T02D1401:50b-47: rdo rje dung can ma dang /
T02D1401:51a-4: sna tshogs kyi gzugs ma dang /
T02D1401:51a-5: rdo rje lus can ma dang /
T02D1401:51a-10: de ltar lha mo nyi shu'o //
T02D1401:51a-11: shar phyogs kyi sgor ni rdo rje 'bar ba ma dang ;
T02D1401:51a-12: byang du ni rdo rje 'khyil ma'o //
T02D1401:51a-13: nub tu ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma'o //
T02D1401:51a-14: lhor ni rdo rje grub ma'o //
T02D1401:51a-15: de dag ni mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor grub pa'o //
T02D1401:51a-16: sgo srung ba thams cad kyang spyan gsum pa /
T02D1401:51a-17: zhal rnam par 'gyur ba gsus pa 'phyang ba'o //
T02D1401:51a-18: gzhan dag ni sna tshogs kyi gzugs can rol ba
T02D1401:51a-19: mo thams cad phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa thod pa'i
T02D1401:51a-20: phreng bas brgyan pa zhal gsum pa dpa' ba dang
T02D1401:51a-21: sgeg pa dang snying rje'i ros gang ba nu ma
T02D1401:51a-22: rgyas shing skal ba dang ldan ma gcer bu skra
T02D1401:51a-23: grol ba snying rje chen pos chags pa'i dga' ba'i
T02D1401:51a-24: dam pa ro'i gdan la bzhugs pas gar byed pa'i
T02D1401:51a-25: mchog ste / thod pa dang kha tv'am ga dang rde'u chung gi bdag nyid can /
T02D1401:51a-26: zhags pa dang lcags kyu can rdo rje gsor zhing dril bu dkrol ba'o //
T02D1401:51a-27: de nas sku dang gsung dang thugs byin gyis brlabs
T02D1401:51a-28: la go cha gnyis kyis brgyan nas ye shes kyi
T02D1401:51a-29: 'khor lo de la dgug pa ste /
T02D1401:51a-30: dbang bskur ba la yang dag par mchod nas /
T02D1401:51a-31: bstod pa byas la sngags bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1401:51a-32: aom shr'i badzra d'a ka aa ham h'um d'a ki
T02D1401:51a-33: ni dz'a la samba ra hum h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D1401:51a-34: / gus pa'i bsam pas rtag tu bzlas par bya ste /
T02D1401:51a-35: rdo rje mi smra ba'i brtul zhugs chen po spro ba dang bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1401:51a-36: aom shr'i buddha d'a ka aa bhr'um h'um d'a ki
T02D1401:51a-37: ni dz'a la samba nga hum h'um phat sv'a h'a
T02D1401:51a-38: / aom shr'i karma d'a ka aa kham h'um d'a
T02D1401:51a-39: ki ni dz'a la samba ra hum h'um phat sv'a
T02D1401:51a-40: / h'a / aom shr'i padma d'a ka aa dhri
T02D1401:51a-41: h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la samba ra hum h'um
T02D1401:51a-42: / h'a / phat sv'a h'a / aom shr'i ratna
T02D1401:51a-43: d'a ka aa aam h'um d'a ki ni dz'a la
T02D1401:51a-44: samba ra hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1401:51a-45: aom shr'i badzra w'a r'a h'i bam hum h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1401:51a-46: de ltar mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi bzlas pa'i sngags rab tu bshad pa'o //
T02D1401:51a-47: sngom pa 'di rnam par nges par bzung na rdo
T02D1401:51a-48: rje dang mnyam pa'i dngos grub bzang po gdon mi
T02D1401:51a-49: za'o // mchog dang tha ma zhes bya ba la
T02D1401:51b-0: @51b sogs pa ni gang yang gzhan dag sngon du
T02D1401:51b-1: grub pa dam tshig can byin gyis brlab pa'i go
T02D1401:51b-3: mchog tu zhes bya ba ni lhan cig skyes ma'o //
T02D1401:51b-4: dbus ma ni zhing las skyes ma'o //
T02D1401:51b-5: tha ma ni sngags skyes ma'o //
T02D1401:51b-6: des lhan cig skyes pa de'i rdzas ni rnam bar nges pa yin zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1401:51b-7: rtsar chud pa'i dbang po thams cad las byung ba'i
T02D1401:51b-8: rdzas gang de rnams kyi rkyen gyis rtag tu bskyed
T02D1401:51b-9: pa'i bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pa gnas pa'i thod
T02D1401:51b-10: pa la khrag dang chang du ldan pas dkyil 'khor
T02D1401:51b-12: steng dang dbus dang 'og rnams su //
T02D1401:51b-13: phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ji ltar gsungs //
T02D1401:51b-14: de nas kha zas bza' bya ste //
T02D1401:51b-15: de nyid gsum ni mngon bsngags la //
T02D1401:51b-16: dam tshig mchog ni btung zhing sbyin //
T02D1401:51b-17: bla ma rdo rje 'dzin gtso dang //
T02D1401:51b-18: rnal 'byor ma tshogs bdag la gson //
T02D1401:51b-19: sngom pa ma lus bzung byas nas //
T02D1401:51b-20: rtag tu bdag gis bskyang bar bgyi //
T02D1401:51b-22: 'jig rten la rtag g-yon nas sbyong //
T02D1401:51b-23: ces bya ba la g-yon pa'i kun du spyod pa
T02D1401:51b-24: rnams ni bde ba'i 'byung gnas yin pas grub pa'i
T02D1401:51b-25: don du rnam par spyod do //
T02D1401:51b-26: rnal 'byor chen po 'di nyid bde ba can dang nam mkha'i pho brang dang /
T02D1401:51b-27: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'gro ba'i bdag po'o //
T02D1401:51b-28: gang g-yon pas g-yon pa las skyes pa rnams pa
T02D1401:51b-29: rgyan na mchog gi don thams cad ster bar nus
T02D1401:51b-30: shing rgyas par byed la bde ba ster bas na
T02D1401:51b-31: g-yon gyis bkur sti bya ste /
T02D1401:51b-32: rnal 'byor pa thabs thams cad la mkhas pas so //
T02D1401:51b-33: gang gi phyir bde mchog gtso bo'i nges pa thams cad g-yon ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:51b-34: phyag rgya chen pos mchod med par //
T02D1401:51b-35: gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa mchod //
T02D1401:51b-36: de yis ngal ba don med de //
T02D1401:51b-38: brtul zhugs ma nyams zhes bya ba la brtul zhugs ni dus kyi nges pa dang /
T02D1401:51b-39: sbyangs pa'i yon tan bcu gnyis la sogs pas bskal
T02D1401:51b-40: pa du mas brgya lam na sangs rgyas pa de
T02D1401:51b-41: dag thams cad zil gyis gnon cing brtul zhugs spong
T02D1401:51b-42: pa ste / tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:52a-1: pa po bya ba la brtson pa ni 'jig rten
T02D1401:52a-2: pa'i spyod pa las rnam par grol ba ste brtul
T02D1401:52a-3: zhugs rdzogs pa'o // dam tshig ces bya ba la
T02D1401:52a-4: sogs pa la 'dis grangs su bgrangs pas ni rigs
T02D1401:52a-5: te drug dang lnga la sogs par gsungs pa'o /
T02D1401:52a-6: lhan cig ces pa ni sngon du bstan pa bzhin no //
T02D1401:52a-7: rigs lnga las ni kun spyod pa //
T02D1401:52a-8: zhes bya ba la rin po che'i rigs mi bskyod
T02D1401:52a-9: pa nang du 'dus pas rigs bzhi ru rab tu
T02D1401:52a-10: gtogs so // mthar thug pa yang sems kyi bdag po'i rigs su gcig pa'o //
T02D1401:52a-11: dkyil 'khor pa rnams der mnyam pa'o //
T02D1401:52a-12: rnam par mi rtog kun spyod bya //
T02D1401:52a-14: longs spyod min pa'i zas rnams dang //
T02D1401:52a-15: 'dod pa'i yon tan rnam pa lnga //
T02D1401:52a-16: kha na ma tho med bsten bya //
T02D1401:52a-17: me la ji ltar bzang ba mnyam spyod yul //
T02D1401:52a-18: ji ltar nyi ma'i snang bas mnyam par ston //
T02D1401:52a-19: rlung gis ji ltar dri ma mnyam par bsdus //
T02D1401:52a-20: rnam rtog rmongs pa'i rgya mtsho rigs spangs la //
T02D1401:52a-21: dam tshig ma lus kun tu spyod par bya //
T02D1401:52a-22: dkyil 'khor gru gsum zhes bya ba la //
T02D1401:52a-23: sa phyogs rtsub cing snying po ma yin pa /
T02D1401:52a-24: gas shing mdog gnag pa la /
T02D1401:52a-26: zabs su sor bcu pa'i thab khung byang du mgo bstan pa byas la las kyi rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:52a-27: de bzhin du mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D1401:52a-28: rdo rje tho ba'i mtshan ma rnams rtse mo steng
T02D1401:52a-29: du bltas pas gsad pa'i las la mdung gi rtse
T02D1401:52a-30: mo steng du blta bar bya ste /
T02D1401:52a-31: phyag mtshan 'dir sor bzhi pa'i tshad du bri bar bya'o //
T02D1401:52a-32: de'i steng du sor gsum bor nas zheng dang dpangs
T02D1401:52a-33: sor gsum pa'i kha khyer gyis thab khung bskor bar
T02D1401:52a-34: bya'o // de nas sa nag po nyid dang bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa dang /
T02D1401:52a-35: mi rus dang 'bras kyi phub ma dang /
T02D1401:52a-36: sol ba byugs la dri mi zhim pa'i me tog dang bdug pas mchod la /
T02D1401:52a-37: shing dri mi zhim zhing rtsub pa tsher ma can gyi shing ngam /
T02D1401:52a-39: bong bu dang rnga mo'i rtug pa skam pos bya
T02D1401:52a-40: zhing nim pa dang seng ldeng dang tsher ma can
T02D1401:52a-41: nam / ba lu te ka tsher ma can la
T02D1401:52a-42: sogs pa'i shing rnams kyi yam shing sor bcu pa'i
T02D1401:52b-0: tshad tsam rtsa ba'i cha @52b las byas pa'am /
T02D1401:52b-1: ro bsregs pa'i rtsub shing gshags pa las byung ba 'ang rung ste /
T02D1401:52b-2: dug dang khrag dang mar khu la bdug pa bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1401:52b-3: yang yungs kar tsha ba'i mar khu dang khrag dang
T02D1401:52b-4: lan tshva dang ske tshe dang ni ma pa'i 'dab
T02D1401:52b-6: rkang rjes kyi sa dang bong bu dang rnga mo
T02D1401:52b-7: la sogs pa'i rtug pa dang skra dang zhag dang
T02D1401:52b-8: bya rog dang 'ug pa'i sgro dang bshang ba dang
T02D1401:52b-9: gci ba dang mi rus kyi phye ma dang spu
T02D1401:52b-10: dang sha la sogs pa re re zhing ji skad
T02D1401:52b-11: rnyed pa'i rdzas dug dang khrag dang smyo byed kyi
T02D1401:52b-13: thal ba dang sol ba dang 'bras kyi phub ma
T02D1401:52b-14: la sogs pas dgra bo'i gzugs brnyan byas la mtshon
T02D1401:52b-15: rnon pos mgo bo nas brtsams te /
T02D1401:52b-16: lus dum bu dum bur gtubs la /
T02D1401:52b-17: mngon spyod kyi las la sbyin sreg dbul te /
T02D1401:52b-18: lcags kyi snod du khrag dang chu dang mi dang
T02D1401:52b-19: bong bu'i gcin la yi ge phat kyi mtha' dang
T02D1401:52b-20: ldan pa'i mngon spyod yi ge bdun pa lan bdun
T02D1401:52b-21: bzlas la / bsreg rdzas la bsang gtor byas la /
T02D1401:52b-22: dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa rnams dang /
T02D1401:52b-23: dam tshig las 'da' bar byed pa rnams spyar bar bya'o //
T02D1401:52b-24: de nas gos nag pos brgyan zhing lcags kyi rgyan
T02D1401:52b-25: dang ldan pas khro bo'i sems kyis gshin rje'i phyogs
T02D1401:52b-26: su kha bltas la sngags pas khro bo'i skyil krung
T02D1401:52b-27: gis stan mkhrang po la gnas shing mtshan phyed dang
T02D1401:52b-28: nyin phyed na bsgrub bya rnam par bsams te /
T02D1401:52b-29: rang gis bskyed pa'i dkyil 'khor du /
T02D1401:52b-30: yi ge h'um phat mtha' na yod pa'i 'brug sgra ltar sngags brjod la /
T02D1401:52b-31: des rab dang 'bring dang tha ma'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1401:52b-32: 'dir mngon spyod kyi me ni dur khrod kyi me'am
T02D1401:52b-33: rus pa las byung ba 'am rdo las skyes pa
T02D1401:52b-34: 'am gdol pa'i khyim nas byung bas gong ma thab
T02D1401:52b-35: khung du ji ltar bstan pa'i bud shing la rlung
T02D1401:52b-36: g-yab kyis ba ba ka sbar te /
T02D1401:52b-37: h'um dzva la dzva la h'um zhes brjod cing chog bzhin du me sbar ro //
T02D1401:52b-38: de nas lag pa g-yon pa ku sha dang bcas
T02D1401:52b-39: pa'i mthe bong srin lag gi rtsa bar btsugs la
T02D1401:52b-40: me lha spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D1401:52b-41: aom ae hye ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri
T02D1401:52b-42: shi dvi dza satva ma gri hi tva a'a hu
T02D1401:52b-43: ti a'a ha ram aa smin sanni hi to bha
T02D1401:53a-1: me'i phyogs nas spyan drangs te /
T02D1401:53a-2: byon nas 'bar ba'i snying bo'i dbus su khro bo
T02D1401:53a-3: mi bzad ces bya ba'i klog ltar phun sum tshogs
T02D1401:53a-4: pa dang ldan pa ba spu kham pa de bzhin
T02D1401:53a-5: du du ba'i mdog can mig g-yo ba steng du
T02D1401:53a-7: mche ba bzhi pa stobs che zhang rlung gi dkyil
T02D1401:53a-8: 'khor la bzhugs pa 'jigs pa'i yi ge h'um gis
T02D1401:53a-9: h'um zhes mdzad pas spyan gsum pa la phyag bzhi
