T02D1401:56a-37: dbus nas 'phyang ba der shes bya //
T02D1401:56a-38: rtsub cing yan lag rtsub pa dang //
T02D1401:56a-39: lha sbyin lta bus gzhan la smod //
T02D1401:56a-40: skra ni 'khyil zhing kham par gnas //
T02D1401:56a-41: mdog ngan yan lag rtsub pa dang //
T02D1401:56a-42: skyes pa lta bur nu ma spangs //
T02D1401:56a-43: s'a la lta bu'i dri yang bro //
T02D1401:56a-45: rtag tu chang la dga' ba ste //
T02D1401:56a-46: dam tshig spyod pa phun sum tshogs //
T02D1401:56a-47: bsam pa rtogs la nan tan byed //
T02D1401:56a-48: khyad par can gyi dri zhi ma pa //
T02D1401:56a-49: chang gi rjes su 'gro ba ste //
T02D1401:56a-50: chang gi khyad par dag dang ni //
T02D1401:56a-51: chang gis shin tu myos pa dang //
T02D1401:56a-52: de bzhin khu ba mang po'o //
T02D1401:56a-53: dngos grub kun gyis thun mong du //
T02D1401:56a-54: zhes bya ba ni dge ba'i ba shes gnyen gyis
T02D1401:56a-55: khyad par rnyed nas thar pa'i don du thams cad
T02D1401:56b-0: dran zhes bya ba ne 'di'i mtshan nyid rnams @56b so ;
T02D1401:56b-1: / yang dag ldan zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor ma'o //
T02D1401:56b-2: pho nya la sogs go 'phang bcas //
T02D1401:56b-3: zhes bya ba la go 'phang ni rab tu gnas zhes pa ste /
T02D1401:56b-4: yon tan gyi gnas zhes bya ba yin la de dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1401:56b-6: mkha' 'gro ma mchog nyi shu bzhi //
T02D1401:56b-7: zhes bya ba ste de rnams kyis ma lus pa rnams bsdus pa'o //
T02D1401:56b-8: gang gi phyir de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum du khyab pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1401:56b-9: de dag rnyed nas mchod pa byas pas ni sgrub
T02D1401:56b-10: pa po la longs spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu
T02D1401:56b-12: rtsa ba'i sngags ni rtag tu zlos //
T02D1401:56b-13: zhes bya ba la lam ngan pa thams cad las yid skyob pas na sngags te //
T02D1401:56b-14: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes yin la /
T02D1401:56b-15: de rnam par dag pa'i sngags zlos pa'o //
T02D1401:56b-16: 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub byed pa //
T02D1401:56b-17: zhes bya ba la 'dod par bya bas 'dod pa ste /
T02D1401:56b-18: sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1401:56b-19: de'i sgrub pa po ste tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid thob pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:56b-20: de nyid kyis na sngags 'di las byung ba yin te zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:56b-21: shin tu goms pa rnyed par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:56b-23: rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum //
T02D1401:56b-25: 'jig rten gsum ni yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngo //
T02D1401:56b-26: rgyu ba ni sems can gyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1401:56b-27: mi rgyu ba ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
T02D1401:56b-28: de'i tshe de dag lhan cig rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ror ro gcig ces bya'o //
T02D1401:56b-29: yang na 'jig rten gsum ni sku rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1401:56b-30: de rnams kyi rgyu pa zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi sems rdo rje ste /
T02D1401:56b-31: bde ba 'dod pas skyed pa'i phyir rgyu'o //
T02D1401:56b-32: mi rgyu ba ni de thob pa ste de dag lhan cig 'jug pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
T02D1401:56b-33: de su'i zhe na sgrub pa po ni zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1401:56b-34: gang gi phyir 'di sngags dang phyag rgya yang dag
T02D1401:56b-35: par ldan zhing dngos grub la brtson pa nyid do
T02D1401:56b-37: phyag rgya dang bral byin mi rlob //
T02D1401:56b-39: sku gsung thugs la 'debs pa ste //
T02D1401:56b-40: shes rab phyag rgyar rab tu brjod //
T02D1401:56b-41: de dang bral ba ni nyan thos ltar dad pa'i
T02D1401:56b-42: nor med pa'i phyir lus can de la sngags kyis
T02D1401:56b-43: byin gyis rlob par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:57a-2: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1401:57a-3: rdo rje 'dzin pa thob ces bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:57a-5: shin tu sbyar bas rtogs par bya //
T02D1401:57a-7: yid gzhan du ma yengs pa ste shin tu brtson pas so //
T02D1401:57a-8: ji srid dro ba'i bya ba dag / ces bya ba la /
T02D1401:57a-9: dang po shes rab dro ba ste //
T02D1401:57a-10: gnyis pa du ba ldan par 'gyur //
T02D1401:57a-12: bzhi pa mar me ltar 'bar ba //
T02D1401:57a-13: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
T02D1401:57a-14: sprin med pa yin ma mkha' bzhin //
T02D1401:57a-15: don 'di nyid gsal bar gsungs pa //
T02D1401:57a-16: snang ba cung zad gsal ba ni //
T02D1401:57a-17: dro bar gyur ba zhes bya'o //
T02D1401:57a-18: ye shes kyi snang ba de nyid 'bring por gsal ba ni rtse mor gyur pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1401:57a-19: gang gi tshe phyi rol gyi don gsal nas ye
T02D1401:57a-20: shes kyi snang ba mched nas rnam pa rig pa
T02D1401:57a-21: tsam gyi gnas skabs su rtog pa'i tshogs las grol
T02D1401:57a-22: ba'i rgyun mi chad par 'od gsal ba ni bzod
T02D1401:57a-23: pa zhes bya'o // de nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos
T02D1401:57a-24: rnams mchog tu gyur pa ni chos kyi mchog ces
T02D1401:57a-26: gang zhig sdang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni
T02D1401:57a-27: rmongs shing sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'dus pas sun
T02D1401:57a-28: 'byin 'og tu phyogs pas mnar med par 'gro bar
T02D1401:57a-29: 'gyur ro // rnal 'byor che mchog ces bya ba la /
T02D1401:57a-30: sogs pa la yul de yongs su brtags pa ste /
T02D1401:57a-31: zhes bya ba ni ci nas kyang de'i rtsa lag rnams kyang mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1401:57a-32: de rung ni zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa'i snying la gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:57a-33: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:57a-34: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u nyi shu rtsa
T02D1401:57a-35: dgu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:57a-37: // / de nas gzhan yang zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:57a-38: he ru ka las gzhan pa ste //
T02D1401:57a-39: khro bo'i rgyal po gnod mdzes zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:57a-41: dgor pa ni dbyangs dang yi ge rnams go rims ji lta ba bzhin rgyas par byas pa'o //
T02D1401:57a-42: sa'i cha ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma byin pa'o //
T02D1401:57a-43: kun du 'gyur ba'i sa bon ni //
T02D1401:57a-44: yi ge h'um gi cha gzugs can //
T02D1401:57a-45: mi 'gyur ba ni bde ba ste //
T02D1401:57a-46: nam mkha' dang mnyam gnas med pa //
T02D1401:57a-47: de nas go cha bcings byas nas //
T02D1401:57b-0: thams @57b cad stong pa rten med pa //
T02D1401:57b-1: rdza rnga zhes bya'i yi ge gsum //
T02D1401:57b-2: sku gsung thugs kyi dbye bas sku gsum mo //
T02D1401:57b-3: rlung gis shin tu bskor ba yi //
T02D1401:57b-4: ri mo brgyad la yang dag brten //
T02D1401:57b-5: ri mo dgu pa dbus gnas pa //
T02D1401:57b-6: stong pa'i rnam pa dri med dgod //
T02D1401:57b-7: a'a li k'a li mnyam rgyas bya //
T02D1401:57b-8: dga' ba bzhi yi rang bzhin can //
T02D1401:57b-9: chos kyi rnga chen mi shigs pa //
T02D1401:57b-10: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis pa //
T02D1401:57b-11: chos kyi yi ge yongs rdzogs pa //
T02D1401:57b-12: de nas grangs kyi nang song bas //
T02D1401:57b-13: chos bdag med pa yang dag bsten //
T02D1401:57b-14: zhal bzhi par ni rnam par grags //
T02D1401:57b-16: rlung la zhon nas spro byed cing //
T02D1401:57b-17: khams gsum pa ni yang dag sdud //
T02D1401:57b-18: rlung gi de nyid shin tu rig / rim bzhin 'byung dang ri ma min pa'i //
T02D1401:57b-19: a'a li k'a li las byung ba //
T02D1401:57b-20: rjod dang brjod bya'i yi ge ste //
T02D1401:57b-21: sgra brnyan lta bu'i rnam par rtog / re mig sum cu gnyis pa blang //
T02D1401:57b-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ji lta ba bzhin te go sla'o //
T02D1401:57b-23: aom su mbha ni sumbha hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:57b-24: aom gri hna grihna hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:57b-25: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:57b-26: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'an badzra r'a dza hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:57b-27: 'di ni khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1401:57b-28: sngags tshig bzhi yis rnam par brgyan //
T02D1401:57b-29: dkyil 'khor bsrung ba'i don du ni //
T02D1401:57b-30: gdug pa thams cad nges gnon pas //
T02D1401:57b-31: khro bo bzhi dang yang dag ldan //
T02D1401:57b-32: skad cig gi se ni sku brgyad 'gyur //
T02D1401:57b-33: zhes bya ba la sngags re re zhing sku gnyis gnyis spro bar bya ste /
T02D1401:57b-34: shin tu drag cing bgegs thams cad sel bar byed
T02D1401:57b-35: ba'i 'khor lo chen po'i khor yug gi mthar thug
T02D1401:57b-36: par khva'i gdong pa la sogs pa brgyad /
T02D1401:57b-37: zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa la zangs gri dang
T02D1401:57b-38: kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa 'od zer dmar po 'bar
T02D1401:57b-39: ba'i spyan gsum pa drag cing 'jigs par byed pa
T02D1401:57b-41: gzhon zhing rnam par 'gyur ba'i zhal can stag gi
T02D1401:57b-42: pags pas rked pa dkris pa smad kyi cha phur
T02D1401:57b-43: bu'i rnam par rno zhing 'bar la bskal pa 'jig
T02D1401:57b-44: pa'i me dang 'dra bar 'od zer 'bar ba la
T02D1401:57b-45: gnas pa'o // de nas phyogs mtshams brgyad du bgegs
T02D1401:57b-46: kyi tshogs rnams dong gi nang du chud par byas
T02D1401:58a-1: lugs las bzlog bas khro bo'i phur bu rnams sngags 'dis dgod par bya ste /
T02D1401:58a-2: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba dusht'am h'um phat /
T02D1401:58a-3: k'i la ya k'i la ya sarba p'a pam h'um phat /
T02D1401:58a-4: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la ya badzra dhar a'a
T02D1401:58a-5: dzny'a pa ya ti k'a ya b'aka tsitta badzra k'i
T02D1401:58a-6: la ya h'um phat khro bo'i lta bas nges par
T02D1401:58a-7: bltas la / rdo rje'i tho bas ba rdung bar bya'o //
T02D1401:58a-8: aom badzra mungga ra badzra k'i la ya /
T02D1401:58a-9: a'a lo ta ya h'um phat /
T02D1401:58a-10: yi ge bhr'um gyis bskyed pa'i 'khor lo la rdo rje gtum po dang /
T02D1401:58a-16: rdo rje stobs po che dang /
T02D1401:58a-18: de bzhin du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
T02D1401:58a-19: 'og tu gnod mdzes rab tu grags /
T02D1401:58a-20: sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba dang 'gog ba dang lam dang zad pa dang /
T02D1401:58a-25: sgra ji bzhin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa la khro bo bcu spro bar bya'o //
T02D1401:58a-26: dbus su ni rdo rje sems dpa' yongs su gyur
T02D1401:58a-27: pa las bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bskyed
T02D1401:58a-28: par bya ste / mdog sngo zhing drag shul che ba /
T02D1401:58a-29: gzi brjid che zhing mche ba gtsigs pa dang bcas
T02D1401:58a-30: shing 'jigs par byed pa zhal g-yas dang g-yon pa
T02D1401:58a-31: ser po dang ljang gu dpa' bo dang mi sdug
T02D1401:58a-32: pa ljags 'dril ba'i zhal dang smin ma bsnyer ba'i
T02D1401:58a-33: khro gnyer gyis gtsigs pa ste /
T02D1401:58a-34: spyan ni dmar zhing zlum pa ste //
T02D1401:58a-35: khro bo 'bar ba'i phreng 'khyug drag / rdo rje h'um yig h'um mdzad pa //
T02D1401:58a-36: mi rus rgyan gyis rnam par bklubs //
T02D1401:58a-37: mgo yi me tog phreng ba can //
T02D1401:58a-38: sangs rgyas lnga ni spro ba'i bdag / phyag gnyis rdo rje dril bu dang //
T02D1401:58a-39: 'jig rten gsum rgyal phyag rgya bcings //
T02D1401:58a-40: shes rab dang ni snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1401:58a-41: lhag ma'i phyag gis lcags kyu zhags //
T02D1401:58a-42: ral gri thod pa kha tv'am 'dzin //
T02D1401:58a-43: g-yas brkyang pa yis gdan la bzhugs //
T02D1401:58a-44: 'jigs byed dang ni dus mtshan dag / zhabs kyi padma'i 'og tu byas //
T02D1401:58a-45: de'i shar gyi rtsibs la rdo rje gtum po ste /
T02D1401:58a-46: mdog sngo zhing g-yas pa dang /
T02D1401:58a-47: g-yon pa'i zhal ser po dang ljang gu /
T02D1401:58a-48: phyag g-yas na rdo rje dang tho ba dang sdigs mdzub po //
T02D1401:58b-0: g-yon na thod @58b dang kha tv'am ga phyag gnyis
T02D1401:58b-1: kyis rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud pa'o
T02D1401:58b-2: // byang phyogs su ni nyi ma ste /
T02D1401:58b-3: mdog ser zhing zhal g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag
T02D1401:58b-4: sngon po dang ljang gu rang dang 'dra ba'i shes
T02D1401:58b-6: rdo rje dang dbyug pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1401:58b-7: nub phyogs su rdo rje gtsug tor te mdog dmar
T02D1401:58b-8: zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag dkar po dang
T02D1401:58b-9: ljang gu rang dang 'dra ba'i shes rab la 'khyud
T02D1401:58b-10: cing padma dmar po dang thod pa dang kha tv'am
T02D1401:58b-11: ga 'dzin pa'o // rdo rje 'khyil pa ni lho phyogs su ste /
T02D1401:58b-12: mdog ljang gu rang dang 'dra pa'i shes rab la
T02D1401:58b-13: 'khyud cing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po
T02D1401:58b-14: dang dkar po / sna tshogs rdo rje thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1401:58b-15: me'i mtshams su rdo rje gnod spyin du ba'i mdog
T02D1401:58b-16: can g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang
T02D1401:58b-17: ljang gu mdzes shing rang gi shes rab ma la
T02D1401:58b-18: 'khyud pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
T02D1401:58b-19: thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1401:58b-20: bden bral du ni rdo rje nag po mdog dmar
T02D1401:58b-21: zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang
T02D1401:58b-22: ljang gu rang gi shes rab dang snyoms par zhugs
T02D1401:58b-23: pa dang / dgra sta dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1401:58b-24: rlung mtshams su ni rdo rje stobs po che mdog
T02D1401:58b-25: sngo zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa ser po dang
T02D1401:58b-26: ljang gu ste rang gi shes rab la snyoms par
T02D1401:58b-27: zhugs pa dang / mdung rtse gsum pa dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1401:58b-28: dbang ldan du ni rdo rje 'jigs byed mdog sngo
T02D1401:58b-29: zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po dang
T02D1401:58b-30: ljang gu'i mdog rang gi shes rab ma la 'khyud
T02D1401:58b-31: cing ral gri dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga
T02D1401:58b-32: 'dzin pa'o // steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba ste /
T02D1401:58b-33: mdog dkar zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag sngon
T02D1401:58b-34: po dang ljang gu rang gi shes rab la 'khyud
T02D1401:58b-35: cing 'khor lo dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga
T02D1401:58b-36: 'dzin pa'o // 'og tu ni gnod mdzes rdo rje ste /
T02D1401:58b-37: sngo zhing g-yas pa dang g-yon pa dag ser po
T02D1401:58b-38: dang ljang gu rang gi shes rab la 'khyud cing
T02D1401:58b-39: / rdo rje gtun shing dang klu'i zhags pa thogs nas sdigs mdzub byed pa'o //
T02D1401:58b-40: khro bo thams cad kyang sna tshogs padma dang nyi
T02D1401:58b-41: ma'i dbus su gyur pa'i 'jig rten skyong ba brgya
T02D1401:58b-42: da g-yas brkyang bas mnan nas bzhugs pa ste /
T02D1401:59a-6: rlung bdag dang dbang ldan gyi lha'o //
T02D1401:59a-7: steng du ni lha'i bdag po tshangs pa'o //
T02D1401:59a-8: 'og tu ni thags bzangs ris te /
T02D1401:59a-9: de dag gi snying gar lugs su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pa dgod do //
T02D1401:59a-10: khro bo thams cad kyang skra kham pa gyen du
T02D1401:59a-11: 'bar zhing smin ma bsnyer ba'i khro gnyer rnam par
T02D1401:59a-12: gtsigs pa'i zhal can thung zhing gsus pa 'phyang ba
T02D1401:59a-13: spyan gsum ba dmar zhing zlum pa mgo bo'i phreng
T02D1401:59a-14: pas do shal byas shing mi rus kyi rgyan gyis
T02D1401:59a-15: bklubs pa / mtha' yas sngon po'i sbrul gyi spyi gtsug gi nor bu byas shing /
T02D1401:59a-16: 'jog po dmar po'i 'od bsgyings pas rna cha byas pa'o //
T02D1401:59a-17: padma dkar po do shal byas pas brgyan zhing /
T02D1401:59a-18: stobs kyi rgyu ljang gus ni mchod phyir thogs byas pa'o //
T02D1401:59a-19: dung skyong ser pos ni lag gdub byas pa'o //
T02D1401:59a-20: rigs ldan sna tshogs kyi mchog can ni dpung rgyan du yang dag par btags pa'o //
T02D1401:59a-21: padma dkar pos ske rags su byas pa'o //
T02D1401:59a-22: nor rgyas kyi bu mdog padma'i rtsa dang 'dra bas rkang gdub byas pa ste /
T02D1401:59a-23: skad cig tsam gyis sku dang gsung dang thugs brgyan zhing ;
T02D1401:59a-24: byang chub kyi sems kyi chus dbang bskur bas rang
T02D1401:59a-25: gi rigs las byung ba'i dbu rgyan can rdo rje
T02D1401:59a-26: 'bar ba'i 'od 'khrug cing drag po rang gi lus
T02D1401:59a-27: las rnam par spro ba nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor g-yogs
T02D1401:59a-28: pa / phyogs bcu'i mthar thug par khro bo 'bar ba'i rigs kyis 'khrug pa'o ;
T02D1401:59a-31: de nyid rig pas g-yon du bskor //
T02D1401:59a-32: lha rnams sems kyis brtan byas nas //
T02D1401:59a-33: de nas bgegs ni med par 'gyur //
T02D1401:59a-34: shin tu rnam dag de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1401:59a-35: 'di ni rnyed pa tsam gyis su //
T02D1401:59a-37: nyon mongs bdud dgra 'joms par byed //
T02D1401:59a-40: dpal ldan rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi //
T02D1401:59a-41: 'khor lor sbyor bdag rdza rngar bcas //
T02D1401:59a-42: bstan pa'i las rnams brtsam byas nas //
T02D1401:59b-1: / dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel
T02D1401:59b-2: sgrub pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu
T02D1401:59b-5: // / de nas sha chen thams cad kyi //
T02D1401:59b-6: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la thams cad ni
T02D1401:59b-7: zhe sdang la sogs pa nyon mongs pa rnams te
T02D1401:59b-8: / dam tshig rnams kyi mthus de rnams 'jigs par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1401:59b-10: rdo rje skyes zhes bya ba ni rdo rje ni dbyer med pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1401:59b-11: de las skyes pa ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku'o //
T02D1401:59b-12: 'di ni zhes bya ba ni 'di rnams te /
T02D1401:59b-13: gdug pa thams cad kyis zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang la sogs pa'i 'jigs byed mi bzad pa'o //
T02D1401:59b-14: rdo rje skyes zhes bya ba'i nye bar bsdus pa'o //
T02D1401:59b-15: 'di ltar khyi dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T02D1401:59b-16: bza' ba yang yin la sbyin sreg kyang yin pas
T02D1401:59b-17: na / bza' ba sbyin sreg gtor ma bya //
T02D1401:59b-19: rtog dang bral bas bya zhes bya ba ni rang gi rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:59b-20: de yang kha na ma thob med pa rnyed nas /
T02D1401:59b-21: rdo rje'i rnal 'byor can gyis bya ba ste /
T02D1401:59b-22: gzhan du na sems can la gnod pa byas par 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:59b-24: sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1401:59b-25: phyag rgya'i dngos grub thob mi 'gyur //
T02D1401:59b-26: rnam par mi rtog sems gang zhig / thab khung
T02D1401:59b-27: sgra ni rab tu grag / rnam dben me ni
T02D1401:59b-28: rab sbar la // ma lus rnam par rtog pa yis //
T02D1401:59b-29: sha dang sha chen spyin sreg bya //
T02D1401:59b-30: skye bo smad pa gang ci'ang rung //
T02D1401:59b-31: srog chags yan lag las byung dang //
T02D1401:59b-32: sna tshogs chang ni btung bar bya //
T02D1401:59b-34: ma lus pa ni 'jig rten gsum po'o //
T02D1401:59b-35: de dang de rnams su gang bcom ldan 'das kyis
T02D1401:59b-36: gsungs pa de ni lus pa med pa ste dngos
T02D1401:59b-37: grub ces bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:59b-38: rgyal srid thams cad ces bya ba ni rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do //
T02D1401:59b-39: dung dang nya phyis mu tig rnams //
T02D1401:59b-40: gsum char rgyu las byung yin na //
T02D1401:59b-41: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la rgyu ni las
T02D1401:59b-42: mi dge ba rnams te de las yang dag par
T02D1401:59b-43: byung ba'o // des ni 'gro ba drug las mi'i 'gro ba bsod nams 'phags par ston te /
T02D1401:59b-45: chos kyi ye shes lus can gyi //
T02D1401:59b-46: thod pa la ni su zhig smod //
T02D1401:59b-48: smad par mi bya ba kho na'o zhes bya ba'i don no //
T02D1401:60a-1: ba'i las kyis skye ba 'bras bu dang bcas pa
T02D1401:60a-2: ni mi nyid de bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po
T02D1401:60a-3: las byung bas na shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'o
T02D1401:60a-4: // ye shes dang thar pa rab tu sgrub pas na /
T02D1401:60a-5: chos kyi dbyings kyi lus can gyi thod pa ste mi'i'o //
T02D1401:60a-6: gzugs mdzes yon tan gnas yin pas //
T02D1401:60a-7: phyag rgya lnga ni rab tu spras //
T02D1401:60a-8: rus phreng shin tu nges par ni //
T02D1401:60a-9: dag byed rgyan ni bzang po'o //
T02D1401:60a-12: dpa' bo rnams kyis dbang phyug bshad //
T02D1401:60a-14: brda zhes bya ba ni kla klo ste sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1401:60a-15: 'di ni dpa' bo'i gnas yin te //
T02D1401:60a-16: zhes bya ba la sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin can
T02D1401:60a-17: 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid brtan pa dang g-yo ba'i
T02D1401:60a-18: 'gro ba ma lus pa sna tshogs pa rnams rtsa
T02D1401:60a-19: lnga'i rang bzhin las skyes pa'i bde ba'i bdag nyid
T02D1401:60a-20: ji lta bde bzhin du mngon par byang chub du
T02D1401:60a-21: yang dag pa'i don ston no //
T02D1401:60a-22: g-yon pa ni shes rab ste rang bzhin med pa'i ngo bo'o //
T02D1401:60a-23: de nyid kun rdzob pa yongs su dris pa ni
T02D1401:60a-24: chos rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid
T02D1401:60a-25: nye bar mtshon par byed pa'o //
T02D1401:60a-26: mdza' ba thams cad 'dus pa zhes bya ba ni
T02D1401:60a-27: dpal he ru ka dang phag mo gnyis su med
T02D1401:60a-28: pa'i bde ba mngon par byang chub pa ni snying
T02D1401:60a-29: po la mngon par phyogs shing mya ngan las 'das
T02D1401:60a-32: rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin slob dpon //
T02D1401:60a-33: dpal ldan sangs rgyas kun gyi pha //
T02D1401:60a-34: rigs drug go rims ji bzhin du //
T02D1401:60a-35: lag pa g-yon par bkod de bzla //
T02D1401:60a-36: a'a li k'a li mnyam sbyar la //
T02D1401:60a-37: sde tshan grangs kyi go rims bzhin //
T02D1401:60a-41: srin lag ni tha ltag go //
T02D1401:60a-42: tha ma ni mthe chung ngo //
T02D1401:60a-43: rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:60a-44: dpa' bo zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'o //
T02D1401:60a-45: gang du gnas pa'i sngags kyi yi ge de nyid kyi rigs kyi ming nas 'bod cing /
T02D1401:60a-46: de'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
T02D1401:60a-47: kye che ge mo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o //
T02D1401:60a-48: de la rigs kyi go rims ni 'di yin no //
T02D1401:60a-49: aa a'a ka tsa ta ta pa ya sha zhes
T02D1401:60a-50: bya ba 'di rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad rgyal
T02D1401:60a-51: po sde tshan gyi yi ge dgu'i bdag nyid do
T02D1401:60b-0: // ai a'i kha @60b tsha tha tha pha ra
T02D1401:60b-1: sha ni sde tshan gnyis pa ste rin chen rgyal
T02D1401:60b-2: // po'o // au a'u ga dza da da ba
T02D1401:60b-3: la sa ni sde tshan gsum pa ste 'od dpag
T02D1401:60b-4: // po'o // med kyi'o // ae aee gha dzha
T02D1401:60b-5: dha dha bha ha'i sde tshan ni bzhi pa ste
T02D1401:60b-6: // po'o // med kyi'o // don yod pa'i'o //
T02D1401:60b-7: ao aoo aam aa: nga nya na na ma'i sde
T02D1401:60b-8: tshan ni mi bskyod pa'i ste lnga pa'i'o //
T02D1401:60b-9: de ltar de dag ni 'jig rten thams cad skye ba dang 'jig pa dang gnas pa'o //
T02D1401:60b-10: des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bdag po'i rdo rje'i
T02D1401:60b-11: ming dang rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyar
T02D1401:60b-12: bar bya ste / drug pa rdo rje sems dpa' ni cod pan no //
T02D1401:60b-14: rgyu la 'bras bus rgyas btab cing //
T02D1401:60b-15: 'bras bu la yang rgyu rgyas gdab //
T02D1401:60b-20: rdo rje rtag pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs kyi ming ngo //
T02D1401:60b-21: shes rab myu gu'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-22: rdo rje myu gu'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-23: mchog tu dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-24: bde bar dga' ba'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-25: 'bebs pa'i rdo rje rnams ni las kyi rigs kyi ming ngo //
T02D1401:60b-26: rdo rje bde ba'i myu gu dang /
T02D1401:60b-28: rdo rje padma'i myu gu dang /
T02D1401:60b-29: dga' ba'i rdo rje rnams ni rin po che'i rigs kyi ming ngo //
T02D1401:60b-31: yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-32: yan lag med pa'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-33: spyan ras gzigs rdo rje rnams ni padma'i rigs kyi ming ngo ;
T02D1401:60b-34: / bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-37: shes rab kyi rdo rje dang /
T02D1401:60b-38: pha rol tu phyin pa'i rdo rje rnams ni zhe sdang gi rigs kyi ming du gyur pa ste /
T02D1401:60b-39: phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi bde ba can gyi zhing du byin gyis brlabs pa'o //
T02D1401:60b-40: de bzhin du 'di dag kyang phyag rgya chen po'i ming du gyur pa ste /
T02D1401:60b-43: rdo rje ae ma bde dang /
T02D1401:60b-44: rdo rje bdag med ma dang /
T02D1401:60b-45: rdo rje'i spyan te de rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs can no //
T02D1401:60b-48: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02D1401:60b-49: rdo rje mdza' ma rnams ni rin po che'i rigs can ma'i ming ngo //
T02D1401:60b-52: rdo rje do shal ma dang /
T02D1401:60b-53: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02D1401:60b-54: rdo rje bzhad ma rnams ni padma'i rigs can ma'i ming ngo //
T02D1401:61a-0: rdo rje rgod ma rnams ni las kyi @61a * //
T02D1401:61a-4: rdo rje phreng ba ma dang /
T02D1401:61a-6: rdo rje blo gros ma dang /
T02D1401:61a-7: rdo rje kong ka ma dang /
T02D1401:61a-8: rdo rje la la n'a dang /
T02D1401:61a-10: rdo rje lag pa rnams ni zhe sdang gi rigs
T02D1401:61a-11: can ma'i phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi ming
T02D1401:61a-12: ngo // 'di dag ni lag tu dgod par bya ste /
T02D1401:61a-13: g-yon pa shes rab las byung ba //
T02D1401:61a-14: 'gro ba skyed byed rgyu yin te //
T02D1401:61a-15: rtsa lnga 'byung ba lnga dag gsungs //
T02D1401:61a-16: sa ni spyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
T02D1401:61a-21: dar ma ste de rnams su legs par gnas pa'o //
T02D1401:61a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa ni bzhi'o //
T02D1401:61a-25: chos kyi skye gnas bde 'dzin ma //
T02D1401:61a-26: gang zhig dngos med nyid shes rab //
T02D1401:61a-27: dngos po'i mtshan nyid 'dir thabs so //
T02D1401:61a-30: he ru ka yi thugs rje'o //
T02D1401:61a-31: des na thabs ni skyes bur brjod //
T02D1401:61a-32: stong pa bud med gzugs rnams la //
T02D1401:61a-33: bsam med lhun gyis grub pa yis //
T02D1401:61a-34: 'dod chags chos ni rten byed pa //
T02D1401:61a-35: de yi de la brten bzhin pas //
T02D1401:61a-36: mngal 'dzin pa las blang bar bya //
T02D1401:61a-37: mdun du rdo rje 'dzin gnyis pas //
T02D1401:61a-38: de yi cho ga sbyor ba yis //
T02D1401:61a-39: dpa' po dam pa mchod par bya //
T02D1401:61a-40: mchod pa sna tshogs nyer bsdus pas //
T02D1401:61a-41: de nas rjes su gnang ba sbyin //
T02D1401:61a-42: byang chub snying po mthar thug par //
T02D1401:61a-43: phyogs kyi 'khor lo ma lus kun //
T02D1401:61a-44: chos kyi 'khor lo bla med pa //
T02D1401:61a-45: sems can mchog la yang dag bskor //
T02D1401:61a-46: shes rab thabs dag rigs pa yis //
T02D1401:61a-47: yid bzhin nor bu ji lta bar //
T02D1401:61a-48: zhum pa'i 'dus pa yongs spangs nas /
T02D1401:61a-49: deng nas brtsams te 'gro don gyis //
T02D1401:61a-50: dbang bskur thob cing rjes gnang ba'i //
T02D1401:61a-51: bya ba byas pa rab dga' bas //
T02D1401:61a-52: 'gro kun dga' bar byed pa ni //
T02D1401:61a-53: 'jam pa'i tshig gis smra bar bya //
T02D1401:61a-54: deng du bdag tshe 'bras bur bcas //
T02D1401:61a-55: mi yi gson pa 'bras bu yod //
T02D1401:61a-56: de ring bdag gis bdag nyid rig / de ring bdag gis bde longs spyad //
T02D1401:61b-0: mkha' 'gro mas gsungs bsam mi @61b khyab ;
T02D1401:61b-1: / rgyud ni de ring bdag gis rnyed //
T02D1401:61b-2: de ring bdag la lha mnyes shing //
T02D1401:61b-3: de ring bdag gis dngos grub ldan //
T02D1401:61b-4: de ring sangs rgyas rigs su skyes //
T02D1401:61b-5: sangs rgyas sras por deng bdag gyur //
T02D1401:61b-6: slob ma'i bya ba yongs rdzogs nas //
T02D1401:61b-7: rgyab tu zhes bya ba ni phyi nas te /
T02D1401:61b-8: gshegs su gsol bar bya ba ni /
T02D1401:61b-13: gar dang mchod pa rnams kyis /
T02D1401:61b-14: de ltar nye bar bsdu ba nas /
T02D1401:61b-15: lhan cig zas la brtsam par bya //
T02D1401:61b-16: zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid du dbang bskur ba rnams dang lhan cig tu'o //
T02D1401:61b-17: 'di ni mi bshad ces bya ba ni yang dag par sbyin pa shin tu sba ba'o //
T02D1401:61b-19: dpa' bo thams cad mnyam sbyor bas //
T02D1401:61b-20: mkha' 'gro dra ba'i bde mchog yin //
T02D1401:61b-22: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:61b-23: pa'i thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa
T02D1401:61b-24: gcig pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:61b-26: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1401:61b-27: sbyin sreg bza' bca' 'dus pa yi //
T02D1401:61b-29: las gang gis ni sems can rnams //
T02D1401:61b-31: thabs chen rnams dang ldan pa la //
T02D1401:61b-33: phyugs zhes bya ba ni bong bu la sogs pa ste /
T02D1401:61b-34: sangs rgyas lnga'i rnam par dag pa yin la /
T02D1401:61b-35: de dag kha na ma tho ba med par bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1401:61b-36: mi rnams ji ltar phyugs yin zhe na /
T02D1401:61b-37: rigs rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T02D1401:61b-38: phyugs kyi sgras ni dam pa bzung bas na /
T02D1401:61b-39: rigs rnams las rigs kyi mchog phyugs bzung ste /
T02D1401:61b-40: yon tan thams cad ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:61b-41: sngar bstan rim pa zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:61b-42: skye ba bdun pa shin tu mtshon pa'o //
T02D1401:61b-43: yang na thun mong ba ste nad kyis ma myos
T02D1401:61b-44: shing shu ba dang mdze la sogs pa dang bral
T02D1401:61b-45: ba thob pa'o // yang na sngar bstan zhes bya
T02D1401:61b-46: ba ni lag pa'i brda ji ltar bstan pa de'i
T02D1401:61b-47: ba thob pa'o // bya bas so // gnas dang nye gnas zhing rnams su //
T02D1401:61b-48: dngos grub sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1401:61b-49: 'khor chen mdun du bdar byas la //
T02D1401:61b-50: gus par byas te bzung byas nas //
T02D1401:62a-0: he ru ka dpal sbyor ba'i @62a * //
T02D1401:62a-1: bdag / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor grub par 'gyur //
T02D1401:62a-2: krishna shva na'i thug pa ni //
T02D1401:62a-3: ma sha 'bras ni nag po ldan //
T02D1401:62a-4: zhes bya ba ni ro langs chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i don du /
T02D1401:62a-5: dang por ting nge 'dzin dang mchod pa rnam pa
T02D1401:62a-6: lnga la sogs pas yang dag par mchod de snying
T02D1401:62a-8: phyi nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya'o //
T02D1401:62a-10: rma med cing ma nyams pa gzugs mdzes pa rnyed nas mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dang bcu bzhi la /
T02D1401:62a-11: dben pa'i yul phyogs su song nas ri'i rtse mo 'am dur khrod du /
T02D1401:62a-12: dur khrod kyi rdzas thams cad kyi phye mas rim
T02D1401:62a-13: pa ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor bri bar
T02D1401:62a-14: bya ste / gru ba zhi pa la sgo bzhi pa //
T02D1401:62a-15: ka ba brgyad dang rta babs ldan //
T02D1401:62a-16: dbus su 'dab brgyad bris byas te //
T02D1401:62a-17: kha dog sna tshogs nyi mas mtshan //
T02D1401:62a-18: de nas sgrub pa'i grogs mchog snying stobs can dang lhan cig tu bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1401:62a-19: me tog dang bdug pa chal du bkram zhing rgyal
T02D1401:62a-20: mtshan gyis mdzes par mchod pa dang gtor ma rab
T02D1401:62a-21: tu rgyas par byas la dri'i chu bdud rtsi lnga
T02D1401:62a-22: dang bcas pas ro bkru bar byas la /
T02D1401:62a-23: til mar chen pos byugs la yi dags kyi me tog gis mchod par bya'o //
T02D1401:62a-24: bum pa gcig gam brgyad khrag dang zhag dang shas dgang bar bya'o //
T02D1401:62a-25: dur khrod kyi ras kyis mgrin pa dkri bar bya ste /
T02D1401:62a-26: zhag dang khrag la sogs pa'i lha bshos dang sre
T02D1401:62a-27: mong gi lus phye mar byas pa gu gul chen
T02D1401:62a-28: po dang bcas pa'i bdug pa dang /
T02D1401:62a-29: yam shing aarka'i bal gyi sdong pu la ra tshil
T02D1401:62a-30: gyis lan bdun byugs la til mar chen pos thod
T02D1401:62a-31: par me sbar ba'i du bas de'i mig byugs la
T02D1401:62a-32: / go cha gnyis kyis bsrung ba dang phur bu
T02D1401:62a-33: dang ra ba'i bsam gtan ji lta ba bzhin 'dir
T02D1401:62a-34: yang byas nas dril bu dang cang te'u'i sgra dang
T02D1401:62a-35: yi ge h'um gi sgras brjod par bya ste /
T02D1401:62a-36: zan dang ma sha'i sran thug dang /
T02D1401:62a-37: khrag dang bcas pa'i gtor ma yi dags rnams la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1401:62a-38: de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mgo shar du
T02D1401:62a-39: bzhag nas de'i snying gar dpa' bo kha shar du
T02D1401:62a-40: bltas te 'dug la g-yon logs su aarka'i snod bzhag
T02D1401:62b-0: go // gzhan yang khyi nag po'i @62b 'o ma'am /
T02D1401:62b-1: ba nag po'i 'o ma bdud rtsi lnga dang bsres
T02D1401:62b-2: pa ma sha nag po dang 'bras dang bcas pa'i
T02D1401:62b-3: thug pa zhag dang sha dang khrag dang bcas pa
T02D1401:62b-4: dur khrod kyi kham phor du thod pa'i steng du
T02D1401:62b-5: legs par bzhag nas de'i kha cung zad phye la
T02D1401:62b-6: / shing la sogs pas me sbar ba mchog ster bar mngon par phyogs par bya'o //
T02D1401:62b-7: de nas de'i snying gar dpal he ru ka'i bka'i
T02D1401:62b-8: 'khor lo bsgoms la snying po'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa
T02D1401:62b-9: brgyad dam brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bya zhing /
T02D1401:62b-10: dpal he ru ka dang phag mo'i mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1401:62b-11: bye ba snyed kyis ha ha zhes cher bzhad pas
T02D1401:62b-12: bskor zhing ce spyang bye bas bskor ram /
T02D1401:62b-13: phyogs bcur sdigs par byed dam /
T02D1401:62b-14: srin po'i tshogs rnams 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyangs sgrogs pa dag mthong yang 'jigs par mi bya ste /
T02D1401:62b-15: brtson 'grus brtan pos mnyam par gzhag par bya zhing g-yas phyogs su sgrub pa'i grogs bzhag la /
T02D1401:62b-16: dril bu gsil zhing phyag na rdo rje'i dbang byed par bya'o //
T02D1401:62b-17: bdug pas rgyun mi 'chad par bdugs na /
T02D1401:62b-18: de nas ro de langs nas ni //
T02D1401:62b-19: ci bgyi zhes ni smra bar 'gyur //
T02D1401:62b-20: de la aargha sbyin byas la //

T02D1401:68b-44: bla ma dang thub pa la gsol cig ces de'i
T02D1401:68b-45: sdig pa nye bar bsgrags la /
T02D1401:68b-46: de nas rang gi lus khro bo chen po dur
T02D1401:68b-47: khrod kyi me 'jig pa'i dus ltar 'bar ba la
T02D1401:68b-48: gnas pa spros nas bsgrub bya'i snying gar zhugs te
T02D1401:68b-49: / kha sbyor gyi padma snying rje'i bdag nyid kyis
T02D1401:68b-50: dral nas de'i bsrung ba'i lha rang gi lus la
T02D1401:68b-51: / gzhug par bya'o // de nas rnam par shes
T02D1401:68b-52: pa'i lha khu tshur gyis bzung la za ma tog
T02D1401:68b-53: gi nang du bzhag nas bde ba can gyi zhing
T02D1401:68b-54: khams su khyer nas mi bskyod pa'i sku thob ste
T02D1401:69a-2: aom phat aa mu kam bha ksha phat ksha zhes
T02D1401:69a-3: brjod la mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bskor nas za
T02D1401:69a-4: bar bsams te / khro bo'i lcags kyus drangs te
T02D1401:69a-5: h'um gi khro bo'i khab kyi lte ba'i rtsa ba
T02D1401:69a-6: dbyung bar bya zhing snying dang rkang dang sha dang
T02D1401:69a-7: khrag rnams drangs la dum bu dum bur byas nas
T02D1401:69a-8: sgro'i chun po ltar bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1401:69a-9: de bzhin du khro bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs
T02D1401:69a-10: du ma mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pas
T02D1401:69a-11: gcod cing btub par blta ba dang mkha' 'gro ma
T02D1401:69a-12: rnams khros shing / mche ba gtsigs pas 'jigs par byed par bsam mo //
T02D1401:69a-13: zhag bdun du ni rab sbyor bas //
T02D1401:69a-14: blo ldan rdo rje 'ang lhung 'gyur te //
T02D1401:69a-15: nyin phyed dang ni mtshan phyed na //
T02D1401:69a-16: las 'di rab tu brtsam par bya //
T02D1401:69a-17: skra grol gcer bur gyur pa yis //
T02D1401:69a-18: khros pas gshin rje'i phyogs bltas la //
T02D1401:69a-19: mkhrang ba'i stan la gnas nas ni //
T02D1401:69a-20: dus me'i byin za bzlas par bya //
T02D1401:69a-21: h'um phat ram ram ram aa mu ka panytsa aa nan tarya ka ri ram ram ram h'um phat /
T02D1401:69a-22: 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis kyang //
T02D1401:69a-23: bsgrub bya gom pa gcig mi 'gro //
T02D1401:69a-24: nyin mtshan bcu bzhi tsam gyis ni //
T02D1401:69a-25: gal te rdo rje 'dzin pa yang //
T02D1401:69a-27: de nas 'di'i zhi ba bya ste /
T02D1401:69a-28: ji srid sdig pa dor gyi bar du sngags 'di brjod par bya'o //
T02D1401:69a-30: bam aa mu ka p'a pa tshi ra to bh'u
T02D1401:69a-31: ta ta sye ba sh'antirbha ba tu bam aam aa
T02D1401:69a-32: aom sv'a h'a / gos dkar po gyon la lus
T02D1401:69a-33: dri dkar pos byugs la 'o ma 'thung zhing lha
T02D1401:69a-34: khang stong par bzlas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1401:69a-35: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:69a-36: thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa lnga
T02D1401:69a-39: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni /
T02D1401:69a-40: dus ma yin par 'chi ba bslu ba'i rjes thogs su'o //
T02D1401:69a-41: mchod par bya ba nyid mchod pa ste las kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1401:69a-42: de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'o //
T02D1401:69a-44: sngags dgod mchod par rab tu grags //
T02D1401:69a-45: zhes bya ba'i sngags ni gnyis su med pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1401:69a-46: de'i rnam par dag pa ni yi ge dgod pa yang sngags so //
T02D1401:69a-47: des na 'di mchod par rab tu grags so //
T02D1401:69a-48: de'i rab tu 'jug pa'i rgyu gsungs pa /
T02D1401:69a-49: myur du dngos grub byed par zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T02D1401:69b-0: mchod pa @69b 'dis myur du dngos grub byed pas
T02D1401:69b-1: na de'i don gyis dngos grub 'dod pa rnams kyis
T02D1401:69b-2: byed pa ste bstan par bya ba'o //
T02D1401:69b-3: mtshan ma gnyis la sngags rab sbyar //
T02D1401:69b-4: zhes bya ba la yi ge h'um gis ni rtag tu rdo rje bskyed pa'o //
T02D1401:69b-5: yi ge aa yis ni 'dam skyes so //
T02D1401:69b-6: yi ge bam gyis ni ze'u 'bru'o //
T02D1401:69b-7: phat kyis ni bu ga bkag nas ye shes mtshon pa'o //
T02D1401:69b-8: mkha' 'gro ni rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02D1401:69b-9: dpa' bo ni dpal he ru kar ro //
T02D1401:69b-10: gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab tu 'jug pa'o //
T02D1401:69b-11: rnal 'byor ma bsrub bya zhes bya ba ni snyoms par 'jug pa'o //
T02D1401:69b-12: blo ldan ni las la mkhas pas so //
T02D1401:69b-13: dag pa'i lus zhes bya ba ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa las rnam par grol ba'o //
T02D1401:69b-14: rang 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni rang nyid kyi 'dod pa ste /
T02D1401:69b-15: rigs dang tshul khrims dang ldan zhing ma dang bu
T02D1401:69b-16: mo la sogs pa lta bu'i nang nas gcig bzung
T02D1401:69b-17: bar byas nas dpa' bo dang nye bar bsu bar
T02D1401:69b-18: bya'o // rnam dbye zhes bya ba ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ba thams cad la so sor dbye'o //
T02D1401:69b-19: phyin ci log tu nges par sbyar //
T02D1401:69b-20: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor mas skyes pa ltar byas pa'o //
T02D1401:69b-22: tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs phyir //
T02D1401:69b-23: las kyi dngos por rnam par bsgom //
T02D1401:69b-24: zhes bya ba la nyon mongs pa rnams tshar gcod
T02D1401:69b-25: pa dang sems can rnams rjes su gzung ba'i phyir
T02D1401:69b-26: ro // las ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid yin la /
T02D1401:69b-27: 'di'i dngos por snang bsgom pa ni /
T02D1401:69b-28: phyin ci log tu spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1401:69b-29: de nyid dbye bas phye nas ni //
T02D1401:69b-30: zhes pa la de nyid ni rigs lnga ste /
T02D1401:69b-31: mig la sogs pa rnam par dag pa'i gti mug rdo rje la sogs pa'o //
T02D1401:69b-32: rtsa yi lam du sbyar bar bya //
T02D1401:69b-34: rtsa'i sngags kyis de kho na nyid kyi khyad par gyis so //
T02D1401:69b-35: yang na sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin nyid gnyis
T02D1401:69b-36: su med pa'i rang rig pas sbyar bar bya ba
T02D1401:69b-37: ste / ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang ;
T02D1401:69b-39: 'di yis zhes bya ba ni bde ba chen po'i rab tu sbyor bas so //
T02D1401:69b-40: lha dang lha min rnams dang ni //
T02D1401:69b-41: mi dang bcas pa'ang zhes bya ba ni phyag rgyar gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T02D1401:69b-42: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:69b-43: thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1401:70a-2: // / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba //
T02D1401:70a-3: zhes bya ba ni rnal 'byor pa chung du'i thabs chen po'o //
T02D1401:70a-4: tshar gcod ces bya ba ni /
T02D1401:70a-5: sman bzang po dang bcas pa'i sngags kyis tshar gcod pa'o //
T02D1401:70a-6: gnon pa zhes bya ba ni bud med thams cad
T02D1401:70a-7: mnan pa ste sgyu can dang g-yo can dang gdul
T02D1401:70a-8: dka' ba ma lus pa dang lhan cig tu bsgrub
T02D1401:70a-9: pa'o // 'dod pa'i yon tan longs spyod pa'i //
T02D1401:70a-10: phan tshun sbyar ba'i gsang sngags ni //
T02D1401:70a-11: zhes bya ba ni sgrub thabs kyi yan lag gsungs pa ste /
T02D1401:70a-12: phan tshun ni byi dang nang ngo //
T02D1401:70a-13: mkha' 'gro ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag nyid sngags dang 'dra bas na sngags so //
T02D1401:70a-14: mkha' 'gro ma dang gcig tu sbyar //
T02D1401:70a-15: zhes bya ba ni gnyi ga bsdus par gyur pa'o //
T02D1401:70a-16: yang na sngags ni khyad par can gyi dbyangs yig go //
T02D1401:70a-17: de nyid ci lta bu zhe na /
T02D1401:70a-18: dang po dbyangs yig thig le dang bcas pa padma'i
T02D1401:70a-19: steng du bsams na de skad cig tsam gyis 'bar
T02D1401:70a-20: bar 'gyur zhing yul rnams su yang nye bar rgyu
T02D1401:70a-22: bde ba thams cad kyi ni mchog / chos kyi dbyings ni mi shigs pa //
T02D1401:70a-23: au dang thig ler yang dag ldan //
T02D1401:70a-24: sngags dang rgyud rnams btus pas te //
T02D1401:70a-26: bza' dang btung bar yang dag ldan ;
T02D1401:70a-27: / zhes bya ba'i bar du gsal lo //
T02D1401:70a-29: ser skya'i mar ni 'thungs nas su //
T02D1401:70a-30: bzlas pa'i mthar ni skyug par bya //
T02D1401:70a-31: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go sla'o //
T02D1401:70a-32: til mar zhes bya ba la sogs pa la s'a
T02D1401:70a-33: lu btags pas dri ma dril ba ni lus bskus
T02D1401:70a-34: pa'o // snum khur zhes bya ba la sogs pa'ang go sla'o //
T02D1401:70a-35: til nag po ni zos nas su //
T02D1401:70a-36: ske tshe bcas pas skyug par bya //
T02D1401:70a-37: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yang cho ga de nyid kyis te gsal lo //
T02D1401:70a-38: ba lang sha zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni nang gi sbyin sreg ste /
T02D1401:70a-39: lte ba'i thab khung nyid du ni //
T02D1401:70a-40: padma yi ni dbus su lha //
T02D1401:70a-41: mthe bo'i tshigs tshad tsam du blta //
T02D1401:70a-42: phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar ba la //
T02D1401:70a-43: nyi ma'i stan la bzhugs pa ni //
T02D1401:70a-44: 'od kyi snang bas legs gnas pas //
T02D1401:70a-45: yang na nas kyi tshad tsam la //
T02D1401:70a-46: dbugs kyis bkug ste bsreg par bya //
T02D1401:70a-47: de yi bsam gtan chud sems kyis //
T02D1401:70a-48: dbang dang dgug pa nyid du 'gyur //
T02D1401:70b-0: de'i @70b mod la zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1401:70b-1: rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya //
T02D1401:70b-2: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la spa ba ni gsang ba ste /
T02D1401:70b-3: dam tshig spyod pa'i mtshan nyid cher //
T02D1401:70b-4: 'bad cing rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya ba mi gsal bar byed pa'o //
T02D1401:70b-5: dper na dmus long gi lag tu nor bu mchog
T02D1401:70b-6: bzhag pa bzhin du cho ga khyad par can 'di
T02D1401:70b-7: yang skal ba dman pas mthong bar mi 'gyur ro
T02D1401:70b-8: // bsod nams chud ba'i sgrub pa pos kyang ste /
T02D1401:70b-9: bla ma mnyes par byas pas ni rnyed par 'gyur zhing gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T02D1401:70b-10: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:70b-11: thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa bdun
T02D1401:70b-14: // / de nas brda zhes bya ba ni brdar gdags pa'o //
T02D1401:70b-15: de bzhin du mkha' 'gro ma'i lus kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1401:70b-16: ni gang yin dang zhes bya ba la mkha' 'gro
T02D1401:70b-17: ma ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi'o //
T02D1401:70b-18: lus ni rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis rnal 'byor gyi lus so //
T02D1401:70b-19: dpa' bo'i yan lag dbye zhes bya ba ni pulli
T02D1401:70b-20: ra dang m'a la ya la sogs pa'i gnas nyi
T02D1401:70b-21: shu rtsa bzhi'o // 'dis ni 'khor lo dgod pa ston to //
T02D1401:70b-22: de bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T02D1401:70b-23: ji ltar sgom pa bzhin du dgod pa'o //
T02D1401:70b-24: dpa' bo'i dbang phyug mi dri zhes bya ba la
T02D1401:70b-25: sogs pa ni de'i gzugs kyis su la'ang bstan par
T02D1401:70b-26: mi bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste go

T02D1401:70b-28: de dang zhes bya ba ni tshad mar gyur pa dang ngo //
T02D1401:70b-29: gang zhig gis zhes bya ba ni dpal he ru ka'i rnal 'byor can no //
T02D1401:70b-30: bsod nams mthong ba yin zhes bya ba ni bsod nams des grol bar 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1401:70b-32: legs skyes pa zhes bya ba ste /
T02D1401:70b-33: lnga pa'i don la drug pa yin no //
T02D1401:70b-34: 'dis ni ngan 'gro las rnam par grol bar bstan to //
T02D1401:70b-35: gnas ji lta ba bzhin du gnas pa ni rnal
T02D1401:70b-36: 'byor ma dang gsang ba mi zhes bya ba ste
T02D1401:70b-37: / dam tshig skyong ba rnams dang mnyam pa'i bdag
T02D1401:70b-38: nyid ni gsang ba'i mi ste de dang lhan cig
T02D1401:70b-39: / pa'o // dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i
T02D1401:70b-40: dka' 'grel sgrub thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum
T02D1401:70b-41: cu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D1401:70b-43: // / de nas zhes bya ba ni rol pa'i rjes la ste /
T02D1401:70b-44: thams cad brdzun pa nyid du shes nas bshad pa'o //
T02D1401:71a-0: sngags kyis zhes bya ba ye shes @71a * //

T02D1401:71a-8: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:71a-9: thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u sum cu rtsa dgu
T02D1401:71a-12: // / de nas zhes bya ba la sogs pa la

T02D1401:71a-14: ba'o // dpa' bo ni dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'o //

T02D1401:71a-17: gang gi bya ba yin zhe na /

T02D1401:71a-22: thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u bzhi bcu ba'i rnam
T02D1401:71a-24: / de nas las kyi rab mchog ni //

T02D1401:71a-27: bya ba ni sngags kyis te rnyed par dka' zhing
T02D1401:71a-30: bshad pa'i rgyud las bla ma'i bka' las shes par bya'o ;
T02D1401:71a-32: gang du las ni yod gyur pa //

T02D1401:71a-34: der ni spyi yi rgyud dag las //
T02D1401:71a-35: gsungs pa cho ga mkhas pas bsten //
T02D1401:71a-37: rdo rje dang ni rta yi 'gros //

T02D1401:71a-42: stong pa'i sgo ni nges non pa //
T02D1401:71a-43: rdo rje thod pa grvar ldan pa //
T02D1401:71a-44: sngags kyi phreng bas khyad par byas //
T02D1401:71a-46: dngos grub sgrub pa po la ni //
T02D1401:71a-47: dran pa'i mchog ni ster bar 'gyur //

T02D1401:71a-50: dbang ldan la sogs g-yas skor gyi //
T02D1401:71a-51: sbyor ba so sor re mig la //
T02D1401:71a-52: aom sumbha ni sumbha hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:71a-53: aom grihna grihna hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:71a-54: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya hum h'um phat /
T02D1401:71a-56: bha ga p'am bi dy'a r'a dza hum h'um phat /

T02D1401:71b-9: bid de ba ya phat hum h'um /

T02D1401:71b-40: bsgrub bya 'thab par byed pa ro langs kyis mnan
T02D1401:71b-42: rta dang ma he cho ga bzhin du bum par bzhag la /

T02D1401:71b-45: mi rus kyi smyu gus dur khrod kyi ras sam
T02D1401:71b-46: dpa' bo'i ro'i bum pa la sngags pa kha lhor
T02D1401:71b-47: bltas pas 'khor lo gnyis bri bar bya'o //

T02D1401:71b-49: gsad pa la ni gshin rjes mnan cing za bar byed pa'o //

T02D1401:78a-14: de rnams kyi stong pa ni bzhi pa bya ba grub pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1401:78a-15: sngon 'gro zhes bya ba ni gsum pa so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1401:78a-16: 'jug pa sgra la sogs pa nas //
T02D1401:78a-17: zhes bya ba la rgyu rdo rje 'dzin pa ni 'jug pa'o //
T02D1401:78a-18: 'jug pa'i rgyu ni sgra ste gnas skabs bzhi pa'i yi ge h'um ngo //
T02D1401:78a-19: sogs pa zhes bya ba ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang mtshan ma'i bar du'o //
T02D1401:78a-20: ji srid bsdus pa'i sbyor ldan pa //
T02D1401:78a-21: zhes bya ba ni gsum po de dag gong bu'i
T02D1401:78a-22: gzugs su bsdus pa'i sbyor ba ste bya ba grub
T02D1401:78a-24: bdud rtsis tshim byed ces bya ba shin tu rnam
T02D1401:78a-25: par dag pa'i ye shes kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa
T02D1401:78a-27: mya ngan 'da' zhes bya ba ni nye bar bsdus pa'o //
T02D1401:78a-28: lag pa'i mchod pa zhes bya ba ni bshad zin to //
T02D1401:78a-30: gal te bag med pas ma grub na /
T02D1401:78a-31: de 'pho ba'i tshe rnal 'byor pa rnams zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te go sla'o //
T02D1401:78a-32: dpal he ru ka zhes bya ba'i dka' 'grel sgrub
T02D1401:78a-33: thabs kyi gleng gzhi las le'u lnga bcu rtsa gcig
T02D1401:78a-36: // / sna tshogs bla ma'i zhal snga nas kyi bka' drin dang //
T02D1401:78a-37: slob dpon du ma'i gzhung lugs rnam par bltas pa yis //
T02D1401:78a-38: bdag nyid dran par bya phyir sgrub thabs gleng gzhi ni //
T02D1401:78a-39: mchog tu gsal zhing 'bar ba dad pas bris pa yin //
T02D1401:78a-40: bdag gis rnal 'byor mi gnyis kyi //
T02D1401:78a-41: dka' 'grel rdzogs par byas pa las //
T02D1401:78a-42: gyur pa'i dge ba gang yin des //
T02D1401:78a-43: rnal 'byor can gyi don byed shog / dpal 'khor
T02D1401:78a-44: lo sdom pa'i dka' 'grel sgrub thabs kyi gleng gzhi
T02D1401:78a-45: zhes bya ba / slob dpon chen po la wa pa'i zhal snga nas kyis mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1401:78a-47: // / yang dag ye shes snang byed pa //
T02D1401:78a-48: sbas pa'i nyi ma'i zhal snga nas //
T02D1401:78a-49: la wa pa yis dka' 'grel ni //
T02D1401:78a-51: rgya gar gyi mkhan po s'u rya gupta dang /
